engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: First the bus accident, then the monsters, and now we've got a bicycle thief? Hard to recall a day like this out here.
engSearchText:
First the bus accident, then the monsters, and now
we've got a bicycle thief? Hard to recall a day like this
out here.
jpnChrName: 交通事故と魔獣騒ぎの次は、自転車泥棒か。 一日にこうも問題が何度もあるのは珍しいな。
jpnSearchText:
交通事故と魔獣騒ぎの次は、自転車泥棒か。
一日にこうも問題が何度もあるのは珍しいな。

engChrName: This is the kind of rush I'd expect from the city— back in my bureau days, we'd always have new reports coming in.
engSearchText:
This is the kind of rush I'd expect from the city—
back in my bureau days, we'd always have new reports
coming in.
jpnChrName: 都市部で勤務していた時代は 毎日のように事件の処理に追われていたものだが。
jpnSearchText:
都市部で勤務していた時代は
毎日のように事件の処理に追われていたものだが。

engChrName: But out here, crime of any kind is rare. I'm gonna get to the bottom of this as soon as I can so that it stays that way.
engSearchText:
But out here, crime of any kind is rare. I'm gonna get
to the bottom of this as soon as I can so that it stays
that way.
jpnChrName: さて……未遂とはいえ、久しぶりの犯罪者だ。 ここは手厳しく取り調べを進めないとな。
jpnSearchText:
さて……未遂とはいえ、久しぶりの犯罪者だ。
ここは手厳しく取り調べを進めないとな。

engChrName: I used to work in the city bureau, you know. We had no shortage of cases back there.
engSearchText:
I used to work in the city bureau, you know. We had
no shortage of cases back there.
jpnChrName: 昔は都市部で勤務をしていてな。 あの頃は毎日のように事件の処理に追われていたよ。
jpnSearchText:
昔は都市部で勤務をしていてな。
あの頃は毎日のように事件の処理に追われていたよ。

engChrName: Meanwhile, Creil Village is as peaceful as can be. That's why today's incident was such a shock.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, Creil Village is as peaceful as can be.
That's why today's incident was such a shock.
jpnChrName: それに比べて、クレイユ村は平穏そのもの…… だからこそ、今日の事故には驚かされてしまった。
jpnSearchText:
それに比べて、クレイユ村は平穏そのもの……
だからこそ、今日の事故には驚かされてしまった。

engChrName: I think I started taking that peace for granted. This is a good reminder that an officer's work is never done.
engSearchText:
I think I started taking that peace for granted. This is
a good reminder that an officer's work is never done.
jpnChrName: 平和慣れし過ぎるのもいかんよな。 この村を守る為にも気を引き締めねば。
jpnSearchText:
平和慣れし過ぎるのもいかんよな。
この村を守る為にも気を引き締めねば。

engChrName: We're finally making some progress here, now that it's looking like the bus will be back on the road tomorrow.
engSearchText:
We're finally making some progress here, now that
it's looking like the bus will be back on the
road tomorrow.
jpnChrName: バスは明日の出発という事で色々と 固まってきているようだな。
jpnSearchText:
バスは明日の出発という事で色々と
固まってきているようだな。

engChrName: But we're not out of the woods yet—the night is plenty dangerous, and we're not in great shape here as is.
engSearchText:
But we're not out of the woods yet—the night is
plenty dangerous, and we're not in great shape here
as is.
jpnChrName: まあ、夜間はただでさえ危ないからな。 疲労なんかも加味すれば仕方ないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、夜間はただでさえ危ないからな。
疲労なんかも加味すれば仕方ないだろう。

engChrName: The monsters, though, I think we'll have a bracer down here soon to handle those.
engSearchText:
The monsters, though, I think we'll have a bracer
down here soon to handle those.
jpnChrName: 魔獣に関しても、思ったより早く遊撃士が 来そうだし、何とか治まるんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣に関しても、思ったより早く遊撃士が
来そうだし、何とか治まるんじゃないかな。

engChrName: There's not much I can do about bracers, as the one officer out here.
engSearchText:
There's not much I can do about bracers, as the one
officer out here.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士との折り合いはまあ、正直言えば 駐在一人じゃ限界もあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士との折り合いはまあ、正直言えば
駐在一人じゃ限界もあるからな。

engChrName: I know the top brass doesn't like them sticking their noses in our business, but I'm not one to look a gift horse in the mouth, personally.
engSearchText:
I know the top brass doesn't like them sticking their
noses in our business, but I'm not one to look a gift
horse in the mouth, personally.
jpnChrName: 上の縄張り意識もわかるが、 負担を分散して悪い事は無いだろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
上の縄張り意識もわかるが、
負担を分散して悪い事は無いだろうよ。

engChrName: (Used to be that we'd see Beauty's Blade or the Immovable around these parts...)
engSearchText:
(Used to be that we'd see Beauty's Blade or the
Immovable around these parts...)
jpnChrName: （……しかし、以前には《剣の乙女》さんや   《不動》さんも村に来てくれた事があるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……しかし、以前には《剣の乙女》さんや
《不動》さんも村に来てくれた事があるが……）

engChrName: (...but I never heard of this guy. He's supposed to be a C-rank?)
engSearchText:
(...but I never heard of this guy. He's supposed to be
a C-rank?)
jpnChrName: （今回来た彼は、聞いた事も無いな。   Ｃ級とは聞くけど、どんなものかねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（今回来た彼は、聞いた事も無いな。
Ｃ級とは聞くけど、どんなものかねぇ。）

engChrName: First the bus accident, then the monsters, and now we've got a bicycle thief? Hard to recall a day like this out here.
engSearchText:
First the bus accident, then the monsters, and now
we've got a bicycle thief? Hard to recall a day like this
out here.
jpnChrName: 交通事故と魔獣騒ぎの次は、自転車泥棒か。 一日にこうも問題が何度もあるのは珍しいな。
jpnSearchText:
交通事故と魔獣騒ぎの次は、自転車泥棒か。
一日にこうも問題が何度もあるのは珍しいな。

engChrName: Brings me back to my bureau days...and not in a good way.
engSearchText:
Brings me back to my bureau days...and not in a
good way.
jpnChrName: 都市部で勤務していた時代を思い出すものだ。
jpnSearchText: 都市部で勤務していた時代を思い出すものだ。

engChrName: I thought I was gonna leave all that behind when I took this post out here...
engSearchText:
I thought I was gonna leave all that behind when I
took this post out here...
jpnChrName: ここに赴任して、喧騒から逃れられたと 思っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
ここに赴任して、喧騒から逃れられたと
思っていたが……

engChrName: At any rate, I can't just sit back and expect this to solve itself.
engSearchText:
At any rate, I can't just sit back and expect this to
solve itself.
jpnChrName: ……とはいえ、こののどかさを享受する だけじゃダメなのは判っているさ。
jpnSearchText:
……とはいえ、こののどかさを享受する
だけじゃダメなのは判っているさ。

engChrName: I'm still a cop, and the village needs me. Time to do my job and keep the peace!
engSearchText:
I'm still a cop, and the village needs me. Time to do
my job and keep the peace!
jpnChrName: 自分も一応は警官だ、この平穏を 保つ努力はしないとな。
jpnSearchText:
自分も一応は警官だ、この平穏を
保つ努力はしないとな。

engChrName: They're good at handling monsters, I'll give the bracers that. But I can't let them show me up on police work, too.
engSearchText:
They're good at handling monsters, I'll give the
bracers that. But I can't let them show me up on
police work, too.
jpnChrName: 魔獣なんかはともかく、こういう事まで 遊撃士に遅れを取る訳にもいかん。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣なんかはともかく、こういう事まで
遊撃士に遅れを取る訳にもいかん。

engChrName: We really don't see monster attacks much, especially not on buses.
engSearchText:
We really don't see monster attacks much, especially
not on buses.
jpnChrName: しかし、バスが魔獣に襲われるとは 最近じゃ珍しいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、バスが魔獣に襲われるとは
最近じゃ珍しいかもな。

engChrName: I'll make sure to relay that to my superiors, though monsters are usually the bracers' problems anyway.
engSearchText:
I'll make sure to relay that to my superiors, though
monsters are usually the bracers' problems anyway.
jpnChrName: 一通り上には報告するが、魔獣に関しては 遊撃士の担当になるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
一通り上には報告するが、魔獣に関しては
遊撃士の担当になるかもな。

engChrName: There should be one coming down for a patrol soon, so hopefully they can clean things up.
engSearchText:
There should be one coming down for a patrol soon,
so hopefully they can clean things up.
jpnChrName: そろそろ定期の見回りに来る頃合いだし、 その時に何かしらするんじゃないかね。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ定期の見回りに来る頃合いだし、
その時に何かしらするんじゃないかね。

engChrName: Who knows, maybe it'll be Beauty's Blade or some other big shot?
engSearchText:
Who knows, maybe it'll be Beauty's Blade or some
other big shot?
jpnChrName: はは、また《剣の乙女》さんとか 有名人にお目にかかれたりしてな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、また《剣の乙女》さんとか
有名人にお目にかかれたりしてな。

engChrName: What that jaeger needed so much gas for, Aidios only knows. Maybe her group got caught up in something?
engSearchText:
What that jaeger needed so much gas for, Aidios
only knows. Maybe her group got caught up
in something?
jpnChrName: ガソリンをあれだけ買うなんて今時珍しいとは 思ってはいたが……何か面倒事でもあったのか？
jpnSearchText:
ガソリンをあれだけ買うなんて今時珍しいとは
思ってはいたが……何か面倒事でもあったのか？

engChrName: She looked pretty grim back there, thinkin' about it...
engSearchText: She looked pretty grim back there, thinkin' about it...
jpnChrName: そういや確かに、あの女猟兵は 思い詰めていたようにも見えたが……
jpnSearchText:
そういや確かに、あの女猟兵は
思い詰めていたようにも見えたが……

engChrName: Either way, you watch out if you decide to poke your nose in there, you hear?
engSearchText:
Either way, you watch out if you decide to poke your
nose in there, you hear?
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、あんたらもそういう事に首を つっこむのなら気をつけろよ？
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、あんたらもそういう事に首を
つっこむのなら気をつけろよ？

engChrName: We'll help out however we can, if you need it.
engSearchText: We'll help out however we can, if you need it.
jpnChrName: まあ、何かあったら俺達も頼ってくれ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、何かあったら俺達も頼ってくれ。

engChrName: I did finally get to have a sit-down with Kaina while I was takin' a break from the bus repairs.
engSearchText:
I did finally get to have a sit-down with Kaina while I
was takin' a break from the bus repairs.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、今日はバスの修理に専念してたが…… 今、ようやく弟子と色々話せていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、今日はバスの修理に専念してたが……
今、ようやく弟子と色々話せていたんだ。

engChrName: I hope I got it through to her that professional training ain't something she can just speed through. It takes more time than that.
engSearchText:
I hope I got it through to her that professional
training ain't something she can just speed through.
It takes more time than that.
jpnChrName: 焦っているようだし、職人の道ってのが 一昼夜で成るモンでもないって話していてな。
jpnSearchText:
焦っているようだし、職人の道ってのが
一昼夜で成るモンでもないって話していてな。

engChrName: Now, she's awful skilled, and she's always lookin' for ways to improve. It's rare to find that knack for learning.
engSearchText:
Now, she's awful skilled, and she's always lookin' for
ways to improve. It's rare to find that knack
for learning.
jpnChrName: カイナは腕も確かだし、理想も高いし 向上心は今時じゃ珍しい程のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
カイナは腕も確かだし、理想も高いし
向上心は今時じゃ珍しい程のモンだ。

engChrName: But she can't skip the basics, or she'll just trip over herself. She needs to take it step by step—that's how she'll find her way forward.
engSearchText:
But she can't skip the basics, or she'll just trip
over herself. She needs to take it step by step—that's
how she'll find her way forward.
jpnChrName: だからこそ基礎を忘れず、地道にやるんだ。 どの道その先は、コイツ自身が切り開く道だしな。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ基礎を忘れず、地道にやるんだ。
どの道その先は、コイツ自身が切り開く道だしな。

engChrName: Been a while since I worked on something this big. All this gear's been collectin' dust in my storehouse for ages, but now's their time to shine!
engSearchText:
Been a while since I worked on something this big.
All this gear's been collectin' dust in my storehouse
for ages, but now's their time to shine!
jpnChrName: 大型車の本格的な整備は久しくてな…… 倉庫で眠らせてた工具も引っ張ってきた。
jpnSearchText:
大型車の本格的な整備は久しくてな……
倉庫で眠らせてた工具も引っ張ってきた。

engChrName: All righty, almost done here. Should have this wrapped up within the day!
engSearchText:
All righty, almost done here. Should have this
wrapped up within the day!
jpnChrName: どれ、あと一仕事ってところだ。 何とか今日中には終わるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
どれ、あと一仕事ってところだ。
何とか今日中には終わるだろう。

engChrName: As any professional could tell you, you can't skimp on the details—not even the minor stuff.
engSearchText:
As any professional could tell you, you can't skimp on
the details—not even the minor stuff.
jpnChrName: 職人として、客の要件を片手間に 聞くってのはしない主義なんでね。
jpnSearchText:
職人として、客の要件を片手間に
聞くってのはしない主義なんでね。

engChrName: Gotta do the best job I can here so that these passengers'll be confident the bus is safe.
engSearchText:
Gotta do the best job I can here so that these
passengers'll be confident the bus is safe.
jpnChrName: バスの人らが安心して明日を迎えるためにも、 少しでも手は抜かねぇつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
バスの人らが安心して明日を迎えるためにも、
少しでも手は抜かねぇつもりだ。

engChrName: Sorry, can't talk much right now. Need to fix up the bus here.
engSearchText:
Sorry, can't talk much right now. Need to fix up the
bus here.
jpnChrName: 悪いが今はバスの修理に集中したくてな。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが今はバスの修理に集中したくてな。

engChrName: My apprentice, Kaina, she's over in the factory. She can help you out if you need something.
engSearchText:
My apprentice, Kaina, she's over in the factory.
She can help you out if you need something.
jpnChrName: 用があるなら工房にいる 弟子に言ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
用があるなら工房にいる
弟子に言ってくれ。

engChrName: She's still learning, but you wouldn't know it, lookin' at her. She can get your orbments sorted out in a jiffy!
engSearchText:
She's still learning, but you wouldn't know it, lookin'
at her. She can get your orbments sorted out in a jiffy!
jpnChrName: 半人前だが、オーブメントの 調整くらいは問題無くこなせる。
jpnSearchText:
半人前だが、オーブメントの
調整くらいは問題無くこなせる。

engChrName: I'd appreciate it, actually—it'd be nice for her to get some real-world experience.
engSearchText:
I'd appreciate it, actually—it'd be nice for her to get
some real-world experience.
jpnChrName: まあ、経験を積ませてやってくれ。 あいつのためにもなるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、経験を積ませてやってくれ。
あいつのためにもなるはずだ。

engChrName: My factory's over 'round the back side of the church.
engSearchText: My factory's over 'round the back side of the church.
jpnChrName: 俺の工房なら教会の裏手の方だ。
jpnSearchText: 俺の工房なら教会の裏手の方だ。

engChrName: My apprentice should be there runnin' the store, so she can help with whatever you need.
engSearchText:
My apprentice should be there runnin' the store, so
she can help with whatever you need.
jpnChrName: 弟子が番をしてるから、そっちを頼ると良い。
jpnSearchText: 弟子が番をしてるから、そっちを頼ると良い。

engChrName: Oh, right, we've got weapons, too. Just basic stuff, though. If you've got a use for 'em, you can take that stuff off our hands.
engSearchText:
Oh, right, we've got weapons, too. Just basic
stuff, though. If you've got a use for 'em, you can take
that stuff off our hands.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、うちの工房は最低限だが武器も 扱っているから、必要なら活用してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、うちの工房は最低限だが武器も
扱っているから、必要なら活用してくれ。

engChrName: I was just talking with the officer about what we should do.
engSearchText:
I was just talking with the officer about what we
should do.
jpnChrName: 駐在さんと今後の予定について 話していたところだ。
jpnSearchText:
駐在さんと今後の予定について
話していたところだ。

engChrName: No one was at fault for the accident, but nonetheless, the passengers' itineraries have been disrupted.
engSearchText:
No one was at fault for the accident, but nonetheless,
the passengers' itineraries have been disrupted.
jpnChrName: 事故そのものは不可抗力だけど、予定が 狂ってしまった客がいるのは事実だからな。
jpnSearchText:
事故そのものは不可抗力だけど、予定が
狂ってしまった客がいるのは事実だからな。

engChrName: Ideally, I'd like to get back on the road and get them through customs by noon tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Ideally, I'd like to get back on the road and get them
through customs by noon tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 何とか明日の昼前には国境検問に 着けるように頑張りたいものだね。
jpnSearchText:
何とか明日の昼前には国境検問に
着けるように頑張りたいものだね。

engChrName: Don't worry about what that bracer says—I'll make sure the company pays you for your help.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about what that bracer says—I'll
make sure the company pays you for your help.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の彼は色々言ってるようだが、 謝礼の件は気にしなくていいよ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士の彼は色々言ってるようだが、
謝礼の件は気にしなくていいよ。

engChrName: If you add up all the different expenses, I guess combat can really cost a lot of money.
engSearchText:
If you add up all the different expenses, I guess
combat can really cost a lot of money.
jpnChrName: 考えてみれば、そりゃあ 戦うのにも経費はかかるもんな。
jpnSearchText:
考えてみれば、そりゃあ
戦うのにも経費はかかるもんな。

engChrName: I was worried I'd have to sleep in the bus, but the mayor very kindly offered me a room! I'll happily take it for tonight.
engSearchText:
I was worried I'd have to sleep in the bus, but the
mayor very kindly offered me a room! I'll happily take
it for tonight.
jpnChrName: 最悪車中泊も覚悟していたが……村長さんが 部屋を貸してくれるなら、お言葉に甘えるとするよ。
jpnSearchText:
最悪車中泊も覚悟していたが……村長さんが
部屋を貸してくれるなら、お言葉に甘えるとするよ。

engChrName: I'm sure the company will compensate you as well...so in a way, things are all working out. The Goddess works in mysterious ways.
engSearchText:
I'm sure the company will compensate you as well...so
in a way, things are all working out. The Goddess
works in mysterious ways.
jpnChrName: あんた達への謝礼も会社が出してくれるし、 何やかんや俺も女神様に見捨てられちゃいないな。
jpnSearchText:
あんた達への謝礼も会社が出してくれるし、
何やかんや俺も女神様に見捨てられちゃいないな。

engChrName: Of all the times for monsters to crop up, though...
engSearchText: Of all the times for monsters to crop up, though...
jpnChrName: しかし、故障中に魔獣に襲われるとは……
jpnSearchText: しかし、故障中に魔獣に襲われるとは……

engChrName: I keep hearing on the news about how there are fewer and fewer of them...and yet there they were. I never imagined I'd come face to face with one...
engSearchText:
I keep hearing on the news about how there are fewer
and fewer of them...and yet there they were. I never
imagined I'd come face to face with one...
jpnChrName: 最近じゃ減ってる話だけど、まさか自分が 当事者になっちゃうとはな……
jpnSearchText:
最近じゃ減ってる話だけど、まさか自分が
当事者になっちゃうとはな……

engChrName: Oh, right, I did remember to get in touch with the company about compensating you.
engSearchText:
Oh, right, I did remember to get in touch with the
company about compensating you.
jpnChrName: ああ……あと、謝礼の件なら会社に連絡したよ。 忘れちゃいないから安心してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……あと、謝礼の件なら会社に連絡したよ。
忘れちゃいないから安心してくれ。

engChrName: It's looking like they'll be working on the bus well after sundown... I can only hope they get it fixed in time.
engSearchText:
It's looking like they'll be working on the bus well
after sundown... I can only hope they get it fixed
in time.
jpnChrName: しかし、この分だと修理が終わるころには日が 暮れてしまうかもしれないな……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、この分だと修理が終わるころには日が
暮れてしまうかもしれないな……

engChrName: We were bound for Remiferia before we got derailed. We still have a ways to go after crossing the border.
engSearchText:
We were bound for Remiferia before we got derailed.
We still have a ways to go after crossing the border.
jpnChrName: このバスはレミフェリア行きの国際便でね、 国境を越えた後もそれなりに先があるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
このバスはレミフェリア行きの国際便でね、
国境を越えた後もそれなりに先があるんだ。

engChrName: Driving at night is too dangerous... We'll have to wait until tomorrow to get back on the road. If we can stay the night here, at least...
engSearchText:
Driving at night is too dangerous... We'll have to wait
until tomorrow to get back on the road. If we can stay
the night here, at least...
jpnChrName: 夜中に長距離を走るのは危険だし、 この村に一泊した方が良いかもな……
jpnSearchText:
夜中に長距離を走るのは危険だし、
この村に一泊した方が良いかもな……

engChrName: These attacks are pretty rare, from what I understand...
engSearchText:
These attacks are pretty rare, from what
I understand...
jpnChrName: 聞く限り、確かにあまり聞かないケースだな。
jpnSearchText: 聞く限り、確かにあまり聞かないケースだな。

engChrName: ...but if we start to see more of these, I might ask the guild about fielding some more patrols out here.
engSearchText:
...but if we start to see more of these, I might ask the
guild about fielding some more patrols out here.
jpnChrName: こういう事もあるなら、ギルドの見回りも もう少し増やした方が良いかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
こういう事もあるなら、ギルドの見回りも
もう少し増やした方が良いかもしれない。

engChrName: I must say, the air here is quite lovely—not at all like the city.
engSearchText:
I must say, the air here is quite lovely—not at all like
the city.
jpnChrName: それにしても、ここは空気が良いよね。
jpnSearchText: それにしても、ここは空気が良いよね。

engChrName: There's a certain...pungency that gives the town an honest, homely atmosphere.
engSearchText:
There's a certain...pungency that gives the town an
honest, homely atmosphere.
jpnChrName: 自然な空気だけど、少し腐ったような香りも 混ざってるのが飾らない感じでさ。
jpnSearchText:
自然な空気だけど、少し腐ったような香りも
混ざってるのが飾らない感じでさ。

engChrName: (Not sure what he means by that.)
engSearchText: (Not sure what he means by that.)
jpnChrName: （？　そんな匂いは感じないですが……）
jpnSearchText: （？　そんな匂いは感じないですが……）

engChrName: (Perhaps he means the fertilizer? It does smell...natural.)
engSearchText:
(Perhaps he means the fertilizer? It does
smell...natural.)
jpnChrName: （肥料の匂いの事では……？）
jpnSearchText: （肥料の匂いの事では……？）

engChrName: (...I shouldn't've asked.)
engSearchText: (...I shouldn't've asked.)

engChrName: This town feels like the ruins, in a sense—they both invoke the simple joys of nature.
engSearchText:
This town feels like the ruins, in a sense—they both
invoke the simple joys of nature.
jpnChrName: 例の遺跡もそうだけど…… フフ、色々ありのままってところかな。
jpnSearchText:
例の遺跡もそうだけど……
フフ、色々ありのままってところかな。

engChrName: I say, we could all stand to reconnect with our roots.
engSearchText: I say, we could all stand to reconnect with our roots.
jpnChrName: フフ、人も空気も ありのままってのは良いよね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、人も空気も
ありのままってのは良いよね。

engChrName: I'm grateful to the villagers for welcoming us for the night. It's incredibly kind of them.
engSearchText:
I'm grateful to the villagers for welcoming us for
the night. It's incredibly kind of them.
jpnChrName: 宿に泊まれてよかった……村の人たちも 親切で助かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
宿に泊まれてよかった……村の人たちも
親切で助かったわ。

engChrName: I live in Altair, and I visit Crossbell quite often, but this village has a certain charm I've never experienced before.
engSearchText:
I live in Altair, and I visit Crossbell quite often, but
this village has a certain charm I've never
experienced before.
jpnChrName: アルタイル住みだし、クロスベルにはよく行くけど、 この村は全然違った魅力があるわ。
jpnSearchText:
アルタイル住みだし、クロスベルにはよく行くけど、
この村は全然違った魅力があるわ。

engChrName: It's nothing like the hustle and bustle of the city—I feel at ease here.
engSearchText:
It's nothing like the hustle and bustle of the city—I
feel at ease here.
jpnChrName: ありのままの雰囲気なのに、穏やかで 心休まるというか……
jpnSearchText:
ありのままの雰囲気なのに、穏やかで
心休まるというか……

engChrName: I'm looking forward to Remiferia, but I'm kind of glad we ended up stopping here.
engSearchText:
I'm looking forward to Remiferia, but I'm kind of
glad we ended up stopping here.
jpnChrName: レミフェリアも楽しみだけど、 この村もまた来てみたいわね。
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリアも楽しみだけど、
この村もまた来てみたいわね。

engChrName: They're saying the bus will depart tomorrow. I'm not sure what to make of my new schedule, but I understand safety comes first.
engSearchText:
They're saying the bus will depart tomorrow. I'm not
sure what to make of my new schedule, but I
understand safety comes first.
jpnChrName: バスが出るのは明日になるんだって。 予定は狂っちゃうけど安全第一だものね。
jpnSearchText:
バスが出るのは明日になるんだって。
予定は狂っちゃうけど安全第一だものね。

engChrName: I did at least get in touch with the hotel I'm staying at, so that's taken care of.
engSearchText:
I did at least get in touch with the hotel I'm staying
at, so that's taken care of.
jpnChrName: 向こうのホテルにも連絡できたし、 まずは安心だわ。
jpnSearchText:
向こうのホテルにも連絡できたし、
まずは安心だわ。

engChrName: And honestly, of all the places to make an impromptu stop, we could do far worse than this!
engSearchText:
And honestly, of all the places to make an impromptu
stop, we could do far worse than this!
jpnChrName: この村なら一泊するのも 満更じゃないしね。
jpnSearchText:
この村なら一泊するのも
満更じゃないしね。

engChrName: I've really come to like this town, in what little time I've spent here...
engSearchText:
I've really come to like this town, in what little time
I've spent here...
jpnChrName: 半日見て回って、この穏やかな感じを すごく気に入ってしまったの……
jpnSearchText:
半日見て回って、この穏やかな感じを
すごく気に入ってしまったの……

engChrName: Creil Village has its own sort of charm, don't you think?
engSearchText:
Creil Village has its own sort of charm, don't
you think?
jpnChrName: せっかくのレミフェリア旅行だったのに、 まさか足止めになるなんてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくのレミフェリア旅行だったのに、
まさか足止めになるなんてねぇ。

engChrName: I might as well take in the sights and sounds some more while we're stopped here!
engSearchText:
I might as well take in the sights and sounds some
more while we're stopped here!
jpnChrName: まあ、この際前向きに この村を楽しんでみるとするわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、この際前向きに
この村を楽しんでみるとするわ。

engChrName: I don't really make plans when I travel... I like to just let things happen to me. So I don't mind the chance to learn about new people and places.
engSearchText:
I don't really make plans when I travel... I like to just
let things happen to me. So I don't mind the chance
to learn about new people and places.
jpnChrName: もとより、初めての旅先を 開拓するつもりの旅行だったしね。
jpnSearchText:
もとより、初めての旅先を
開拓するつもりの旅行だったしね。

engChrName: The villagers have been chatting with me, asking if I'm a new hire.
engSearchText:
The villagers have been chatting with me, asking if
I'm a new hire.
jpnChrName: 新しい従業員が増えたのかと 村の者達に声をかけられたりするんだ。
jpnSearchText:
新しい従業員が増えたのかと
村の者達に声をかけられたりするんだ。

engChrName: Makes them sad when I explain it, but...they've been encouraging me, too.
engSearchText:
Makes them sad when I explain it, but...they've been
encouraging me, too.
jpnChrName: 事情を説明すると呆れられるが…… 皆、頑張るようにと言ってくれてね。
jpnSearchText:
事情を説明すると呆れられるが……
皆、頑張るようにと言ってくれてね。

engChrName: It's kinda... It's been a while since someone said something nice to me.
engSearchText:
It's kinda... It's been a while since someone said
something nice to me.
jpnChrName: はは……人に優しい言葉を かけられたのはいつぶりだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
はは……人に優しい言葉を
かけられたのはいつぶりだろうな。

engChrName: Maybe this is my chance to start over—start living smartly instead of racking up debts.
engSearchText:
Maybe this is my chance to start over—start living
smartly instead of racking up debts.
jpnChrName: 借金ばかりしてないで、もう少し真っ当に 生きてみてもいいかもしれないな……
jpnSearchText:
借金ばかりしてないで、もう少し真っ当に
生きてみてもいいかもしれないな……

engChrName: Ugh... Wasn't expecting to end up a dishwasher. I'm really not good at chores like this.
engSearchText:
Ugh... Wasn't expecting to end up a dishwasher.
I'm really not good at chores like this.
jpnChrName: はぁ……皿洗いを任されるとはな。 家事は得意な方ではないんだが……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……皿洗いを任されるとはな。
家事は得意な方ではないんだが……

engChrName: But I'm just glad you didn't hand me over to the police...
engSearchText:
But I'm just glad you didn't hand me over to
the police...
jpnChrName: ……とはいえ、警察に突き出されないだけ 良かったと思うべきなんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……とはいえ、警察に突き出されないだけ
良かったと思うべきなんだろう。

engChrName: Guess I can't complain... Gotta work until I can pay for the bike.
engSearchText:
Guess I can't complain... Gotta work until I can pay
for the bike.
jpnChrName: 仕方ない、自転車の修理費が稼げるまで 頑張るとするか……
jpnSearchText:
仕方ない、自転車の修理費が稼げるまで
頑張るとするか……

engChrName: O-Oh! Uhm... I'm good, I swear. Just...
engSearchText: O-Oh! Uhm... I'm good, I swear. Just...
jpnChrName: ……ひっ！ ち、違うんだ、自分は……
jpnSearchText:
……ひっ！
ち、違うんだ、自分は……

engChrName: Er... N-Never mind, it's nothing! P-Please, pay me no mind...!
engSearchText:
Er... N-Never mind, it's nothing! P-Please, pay me
no mind...!
jpnChrName: い、いや……やっぱり何でもない…… か、構わないでくれ……ください……
jpnSearchText:
い、いや……やっぱり何でもない……
か、構わないでくれ……ください……

engChrName: (Huh? Thought he was givin' me a funny look, there.)
engSearchText: (Huh? Thought he was givin' me a funny look, there.)
jpnChrName: （何だ、俺を見て言ってんのか？）
jpnSearchText: （何だ、俺を見て言ってんのか？）

engChrName: (He seems quite on edge... Do you know him from somewhere?)
engSearchText:
(He seems quite on edge... Do you know him
from somewhere?)
jpnChrName: （どうやら怯えているようですが……   お知り合いですか？）
jpnSearchText:
（どうやら怯えているようですが……
お知り合いですか？）

engChrName: (Never seen the guy in my life.)
engSearchText: (Never seen the guy in my life.)
jpnChrName: （いや、知らんな……）
jpnSearchText: （いや、知らんな……）

engChrName: (Dude's a bit fishy, but we got bigger fish to fry.)
engSearchText: (Dude's a bit fishy, but we got bigger fish to fry.)
jpnChrName: （事情がありそうだが、俺たちにも優先順位がある。）
jpnSearchText: （事情がありそうだが、俺たちにも優先順位がある。）

engChrName: (Let's leave him be for now.)
engSearchText: (Let's leave him be for now.)
jpnChrName: （一旦はそっとしておいてやろう。）
jpnSearchText: （一旦はそっとしておいてやろう。）

engChrName: Why...? Why are they out here? Th-They can't be, can they...? I don't wanna cross him. He's not your average guy...
engSearchText:
Why...? Why are they out here? Th-They can't be,
can they...? I don't wanna cross him. He's not your
average guy...
jpnChrName: こ、こんなところまでもう……？ いや、でもまさか……だがタダ者では……
jpnSearchText:
こ、こんなところまでもう……？
いや、でもまさか……だがタダ者では……

engChrName: (Dude's rubbin' me the wrong way. Sounds like he's got somethin' to hide.)
engSearchText:
(Dude's rubbin' me the wrong way. Sounds like he's
got somethin' to hide.)
jpnChrName: （こいつはあからさまに   後ろめたい事がある怯え方だな……）
jpnSearchText:
（こいつはあからさまに
後ろめたい事がある怯え方だな……）

engChrName: (I'll keep him in my peripheral.)
engSearchText: (I'll keep him in my peripheral.)
jpnChrName: （一応注意しておくとするか。）
jpnSearchText: （一応注意しておくとするか。）

engChrName: The police just got done questioning me.
engSearchText: The police just got done questioning me.
jpnChrName: 僕の取り調べはさっき終わった所だよ。
jpnSearchText: 僕の取り調べはさっき終わった所だよ。

engChrName: Sounds like they're gonna go talk to Nathan next, based off what I told them.
engSearchText:
Sounds like they're gonna go talk to Nathan next,
based off what I told them.
jpnChrName: 僕の話を元に、これからあの人の 取り調べが始まるんだって。
jpnSearchText:
僕の話を元に、これからあの人の
取り調べが始まるんだって。

engChrName: Yeesh... I was sweating bullets. That was my first time talking to the cops.
engSearchText:
Yeesh... I was sweating bullets. That was my first
time talking to the cops.
jpnChrName: はぁ……警察にお世話になるのは 初めてだから緊張しちゃったよ。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……警察にお世話になるのは
初めてだから緊張しちゃったよ。

engChrName: Once Nathan's earned his next check, he'll wire the cost to my account.
engSearchText:
Once Nathan's earned his next check, he'll wire the
cost to my account.
jpnChrName: ネイソンさんが働き終わったら 僕の口座に振り込んでもらう予定なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ネイソンさんが働き終わったら
僕の口座に振り込んでもらう予定なんだ。

engChrName: It makes me feel better knowing I don't have to pay that out of pocket. Thanks a million!
engSearchText:
It makes me feel better knowing I don't have to pay
that out of pocket. Thanks a million!
jpnChrName: 修理費を自分で払わなくて済むと思うと気が楽だよ。 本当にありがとう！
jpnSearchText:
修理費を自分で払わなくて済むと思うと気が楽だよ。
本当にありがとう！

engChrName: It's more than just a bike to me—it's my life!
engSearchText: It's more than just a bike to me—it's my life!
jpnChrName: あれは僕の相棒みたいな自転車なんだ。
jpnSearchText: あれは僕の相棒みたいな自転車なんだ。

engChrName: I'm sorry to dump this on you, but I'm begging you, please! Bring that bike thief to justice!
engSearchText:
I'm sorry to dump this on you, but I'm begging
you, please! Bring that bike thief to justice!
jpnChrName: 悪いけど、どうかあの自転車泥棒から 取り返して来てくれ……！
jpnSearchText:
悪いけど、どうかあの自転車泥棒から
取り返して来てくれ……！

engChrName: Since my bike got stolen, I wasn't able to go fishing this afternoon...
engSearchText:
Since my bike got stolen, I wasn't able to go
fishing this afternoon...
jpnChrName: 自転車を盗まれたせいで午後は 釣りができずじまいだったけど……
jpnSearchText:
自転車を盗まれたせいで午後は
釣りができずじまいだったけど……

engChrName: But y'know, I got to experience a lot of things you just can't find back in the city. And I found some good spots here, too!
engSearchText:
But y'know, I got to experience a lot of things you
just can't find back in the city. And I found some
good spots here, too!
jpnChrName: まあ、都会じゃ中々体験できないくらい 目一杯遊んだし、良いスポットも見つけられた。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、都会じゃ中々体験できないくらい
目一杯遊んだし、良いスポットも見つけられた。

engChrName: I don't mind the time I spent one bit. Maybe I'll come back with friends some time!
engSearchText:
I don't mind the time I spent one bit. Maybe I'll
come back with friends some time!
jpnChrName: 何やかんやで有意義だったな…… また友人たちと一緒に来たいものだね。
jpnSearchText:
何やかんやで有意義だったな……
また友人たちと一緒に来たいものだね。

engChrName: Thank you so much, man! I can't tell you how happy I am to have my bike back.
engSearchText:
Thank you so much, man! I can't tell you how happy
I am to have my bike back.
jpnChrName: 自転車を取り返してくれて本当にありがとう。
jpnSearchText: 自転車を取り返してくれて本当にありがとう。

engChrName: This thing's like an old partner of mine, second only to my fishing rod.
engSearchText:
This thing's like an old partner of mine, second only
to my fishing rod.
jpnChrName: 今や、あいつは釣り竿の次の相棒だからね。
jpnSearchText: 今や、あいつは釣り竿の次の相棒だからね。

engChrName: Normally I stick to the capital, but with my trusty bike? I can go out as far as my legs can take me.
engSearchText:
Normally I stick to the capital, but with my
trusty bike? I can go out as far as my legs can take me.
jpnChrName: 普段は首都で釣りをしているけど、自転車の お陰でこうして郊外にも遠征できるのさ。
jpnSearchText:
普段は首都で釣りをしているけど、自転車の
お陰でこうして郊外にも遠征できるのさ。

engChrName: I hope the rest of my group takes note: bikes and fishing are a match made in heaven.
engSearchText:
I hope the rest of my group takes note: bikes and
fishing are a match made in heaven.
jpnChrName: サークルの仲間にも、釣りだけじゃなく 自転車の良さも知ってもらいたいものだね。
jpnSearchText:
サークルの仲間にも、釣りだけじゃなく
自転車の良さも知ってもらいたいものだね。

engChrName: Come to think of it, I heard about this 'Fisherman's Guild' that set up a branch in Calvard recently...
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I heard about this 'Fisherman's
Guild' that set up a branch in Calvard recently...
jpnChrName: そういえば、少し前まではこの国にも 《釣公師団》ってのが来ていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、少し前まではこの国にも
《釣公師団》ってのが来ていたけど……

engChrName: But the port city they ran out of has gotten pretty sketchy lately. Word is, they closed down for the time being.
engSearchText:
But the port city they ran out of has gotten pretty
sketchy lately. Word is, they closed down for the
time being.
jpnChrName: 支部があった港町が物騒になったらしくて、 今は活動を控えてるんだってさ。
jpnSearchText:
支部があった港町が物騒になったらしくて、
今は活動を控えてるんだってさ。

engChrName: Not a bad call, really. If they end up ruffling any feathers, it won't be pretty. We're fishers, not fighters...
engSearchText:
Not a bad call, really. If they end up ruffling any
feathers, it won't be pretty. We're fishers,
not fighters...
jpnChrName: 俺たちもそうならないように、 少しでもトラブルは避けないとな……
jpnSearchText:
俺たちもそうならないように、
少しでもトラブルは避けないとな……

engChrName: I just came back from a little fishing trip. Did something happen?
engSearchText:
I just came back from a little fishing trip.
Did something happen?
jpnChrName: 外での釣りから帰って来てみれば、 何かあったみたいだね……
jpnSearchText:
外での釣りから帰って来てみれば、
何かあったみたいだね……

engChrName: Hope it's not too dangerous outside the village now...
engSearchText: Hope it's not too dangerous outside the village now...
jpnChrName: 当分は村の外は危なかったりするのかな。
jpnSearchText: 当分は村の外は危なかったりするのかな。

engChrName: Anyway, I'll be heading back to the capital tomorrow evening. Gotta make the best of these local fishing spots while I've got time!
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'll be heading back to the capital
tomorrow evening. Gotta make the best of these local
fishing spots while I've got time!
jpnChrName: 明日の午後には首都に帰るし、 釣りの機会が減るのは困るなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
明日の午後には首都に帰るし、
釣りの機会が減るのは困るなぁ。

engChrName: I've been back on the fishing train as of late—some of my friends got me back into it.
engSearchText:
I've been back on the fishing train as of late—some of
my friends got me back into it.
jpnChrName: 最近、友達の影響で 釣り熱が再燃しちゃってさ。
jpnSearchText:
最近、友達の影響で
釣り熱が再燃しちゃってさ。

engChrName: I decided to bike out here for some fresh air and fresh fish, and boy, did this place deliver!
engSearchText:
I decided to bike out here for some fresh air and fresh
fish, and boy, did this place deliver!
jpnChrName: 自転車にハマってたのと合わさって、 こうして郊外での釣りが捗るんだ。
jpnSearchText:
自転車にハマってたのと合わさって、
こうして郊外での釣りが捗るんだ。

engChrName: He's really grabbed my attention. I feel like if I take my eyes off him, he'll vanish into thin air...
engSearchText:
He's really grabbed my attention. I feel like if I take
my eyes off him, he'll vanish into thin air...
jpnChrName: あの人、少し目を離してたら またどこかに行っちゃったね。
jpnSearchText:
あの人、少し目を離してたら
またどこかに行っちゃったね。

engChrName: You don't see many mysterious types like him around this village... He's very intriguing.
engSearchText:
You don't see many mysterious types like him around
this village... He's very intriguing.
jpnChrName: まあ、そんなミステリアスなのも この村じゃ珍しくて素敵かも……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そんなミステリアスなのも
この村じゃ珍しくて素敵かも……

engChrName: The capital and its townsfolk are just full of suspense!
engSearchText: The capital and its townsfolk are just full of suspense!
jpnChrName: 都会には神秘がいっぱいね！
jpnSearchText: 都会には神秘がいっぱいね！

engChrName: I heard from Ran that Kaina's doing the shopping runs for her job now. She might even head out to some big city for college!
engSearchText:
I heard from Ran that Kaina's doing the shopping
runs for her job now. She might even head out to
some big city for college!
jpnChrName: ランから聞いたけど、カイナは買い出しを任せて もらう機会も増えて、勉強の旅行も行けそうってね。
jpnSearchText:
ランから聞いたけど、カイナは買い出しを任せて
もらう機会も増えて、勉強の旅行も行けそうってね。

engChrName: I know it's part of her job, but man, it makes me jealous that she gets to go out to the city so much.
engSearchText:
I know it's part of her job, but man, it makes me
jealous that she gets to go out to the city so much.
jpnChrName: うー、仕事とはいえ定期的に都会に 出向けるのは羨ましいな……
jpnSearchText:
うー、仕事とはいえ定期的に都会に
出向けるのは羨ましいな……

engChrName: I managed to strike up a conversation with that handsome devil!
engSearchText:
I managed to strike up a conversation with that
handsome devil!
jpnChrName: さっき、ようやく例の イケメンと少し話せたの！
jpnSearchText:
さっき、ようやく例の
イケメンと少し話せたの！

engChrName: What exactly he was talking about, though...um, I'm not sure. It was sort of beyond me...
engSearchText:
What exactly he was talking about, though...um, I'm
not sure. It was sort of beyond me...
jpnChrName: 何か言ってる事難しくて よくわかんなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
何か言ってる事難しくて
よくわかんなかったけど……

engChrName: But it must have been something profound, something philosophical! My heart doesn't lie.
engSearchText:
But it must have been something profound,
something philosophical! My heart doesn't lie.
jpnChrName: でも、何かお洒落な哲学が ありそうなのは魂で感じたかも！
jpnSearchText:
でも、何かお洒落な哲学が
ありそうなのは魂で感じたかも！

engChrName: He was out and about earlier today, too. What brings a guy like him out to our little backwater, I wonder?
engSearchText:
He was out and about earlier today, too. What brings
a guy like him out to our little backwater, I wonder?
jpnChrName: あの人、昼の間は外に行ってたらしいけど、 こんな辺鄙な田舎で何見てたのかな。
jpnSearchText:
あの人、昼の間は外に行ってたらしいけど、
こんな辺鄙な田舎で何見てたのかな。

engChrName: Perhaps he has a different perspective on the world... Oh, to think like he does!
engSearchText:
Perhaps he has a different perspective on the world...
Oh, to think like he does!
jpnChrName: うー、きっとあたし達とは違った視点で 素敵なものを探し当てられるのね……！
jpnSearchText:
うー、きっとあたし達とは違った視点で
素敵なものを探し当てられるのね……！

engChrName: Do you know that green-haired passenger, by chance? He really caught my eye.
engSearchText:
Do you know that green-haired passenger, by chance?
He really caught my eye.
jpnChrName: ねえ、バスの客の中に緑髪の都会的な イケメンがいたと思うけど知らない？
jpnSearchText:
ねえ、バスの客の中に緑髪の都会的な
イケメンがいたと思うけど知らない？

engChrName: It's not often you find a suave, urban type like him around here. I wanted to chat with him, but he's disappeared on me...
engSearchText:
It's not often you find a suave, urban type like him
around here. I wanted to chat with him, but he's
disappeared on me...
jpnChrName: この辺じゃ見ない都会的な人だし、 お近づきになりたいけど見失って……
jpnSearchText:
この辺じゃ見ない都会的な人だし、
お近づきになりたいけど見失って……

engChrName: Maybe Ran over at the inn would know where he's gone... I'll have to ask when I get the chance.
engSearchText:
Maybe Ran over at the inn would know where
he's gone... I'll have to ask when I get the chance.
jpnChrName: 宿屋のランなら知ってるかな？ 後で聞いてみよっと。
jpnSearchText:
宿屋のランなら知ってるかな？
後で聞いてみよっと。

engChrName: I wonder if there are more people like him in the big city...?
engSearchText:
I wonder if there are more people like him in the big
city...?
jpnChrName: それにしても、都会って ああいう人が普通にいるのかな？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、都会って
ああいう人が普通にいるのかな？

engChrName: I can't wait to move there, already. Wait for me, you dashing yuppies, you!
engSearchText:
I can't wait to move there, already. Wait for me, you
dashing yuppies, you!
jpnChrName: うー、それならお金貯めて 早く都会に移住したい～。
jpnSearchText:
うー、それならお金貯めて
早く都会に移住したい～。

engChrName: My little brother, Lashkar, he wants to be a bracer when he grows up...
engSearchText:
My little brother, Lashkar, he wants to be a bracer
when he grows up...
jpnChrName: そういえば弟のラシュカルは、遊撃士を 目指しているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば弟のラシュカルは、遊撃士を
目指しているのですが……

engChrName: It makes me proud as his sister that he wants to help people like that.
engSearchText:
It makes me proud as his sister that he wants to help
people like that.
jpnChrName: 人を助ける道に関心を持ってくれて、 姉として嬉しい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
人を助ける道に関心を持ってくれて、
姉として嬉しい限りです。

engChrName: I joined the faith for similar reasons, myself. It feels gratifying to be a source of strength and goodwill for the village.
engSearchText:
I joined the faith for similar reasons, myself. It feels
gratifying to be a source of strength and goodwill for
the village.
jpnChrName: 思えば私も村の皆のためにと 聖職者になりましたが……
jpnSearchText:
思えば私も村の皆のためにと
聖職者になりましたが……

engChrName: He shares that passion with me. It makes me happy to have him as my brother, heehee!
engSearchText:
He shares that passion with me. It makes me happy
to have him as my brother, heehee!
jpnChrName: ふふ、人の助けになる道と言う意味で、 根っこは同じなのかもしれないですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、人の助けになる道と言う意味で、
根っこは同じなのかもしれないですね。

engChrName: I found Lashkar talking with one of his friends just a moment ago.
engSearchText:
I found Lashkar talking with one of his friends just a
moment ago.
jpnChrName: 先ほど弟が、幼馴染みの子と お話しているのを見ましたが……
jpnSearchText:
先ほど弟が、幼馴染みの子と
お話しているのを見ましたが……

engChrName: And goodness, has he grown in my time away!
engSearchText: And goodness, has he grown in my time away!
jpnChrName: ふふ、村を離れている間に、 あの子も大人になったものです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、村を離れている間に、
あの子も大人になったものです。

engChrName: Now that I'm back home, I can watch him grow up for myself, together with the Goddess.
engSearchText:
Now that I'm back home, I can watch him grow up
for myself, together with the Goddess.
jpnChrName: これからは、女神様と共に あの子の成長を見守れるのですね。
jpnSearchText:
これからは、女神様と共に
あの子の成長を見守れるのですね。

engChrName: Some years ago, Lashkar fell from a tree and injured himself... The village nun at the time came to his aid, and helped nurse him back to health.
engSearchText:
Some years ago, Lashkar fell from a tree and
injured himself... The village nun at the time came to
his aid, and helped nurse him back to health.
jpnChrName: 昔の話ですが、弟が木から落ちて怪我をした際に、 当時のシスターが手当てをしてくれまして……
jpnSearchText:
昔の話ですが、弟が木から落ちて怪我をした際に、
当時のシスターが手当てをしてくれまして……

engChrName: Young me was touched by her sense of duty and compassion for others...
engSearchText:
Young me was touched by her sense of duty and
compassion for others...
jpnChrName: その時に、慈愛と使命感に 満ちた姿に心打たれまして。
jpnSearchText:
その時に、慈愛と使命感に
満ちた姿に心打たれまして。

engChrName: I think that was what inspired me to walk the path I do—I wanted to grow up to be a kind and loving soul... A pillar of strength for the village.
engSearchText:
I think that was what inspired me to walk the path I
do—I wanted to grow up to be a kind and
loving soul... A pillar of strength for the village.
jpnChrName: 今の私があるきっかけの一つ、ですかね…… あのように村の皆を助け、頼られる存在になりたいと。
jpnSearchText:
今の私があるきっかけの一つ、ですかね……
あのように村の皆を助け、頼られる存在になりたいと。

engChrName: That might not be my only motive...but it feels like my biggest one.
engSearchText:
That might not be my only motive...but it feels like
my biggest one.
jpnChrName: まあ、今のお話は あくまでもきっかけの一例ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今のお話は
あくまでもきっかけの一例ですよ。

engChrName: One way or another, I wanted to give back to the village I love. Now, like that nun before me, I can finally realize that dream.
engSearchText:
One way or another, I wanted to give back to the
village I love. Now, like that nun before me, I can
finally realize that dream.
jpnChrName: とにかく、色々な思い出のある村を私なりに 守れる道を探すべく、聖職者を目指したんです。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、色々な思い出のある村を私なりに
守れる道を探すべく、聖職者を目指したんです。

engChrName: Welcome to the Creil Chapel... Oh? Is something the matter?
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Creil Chapel... Oh? Is something
the matter?
jpnChrName: ようこそクレイユ礼拝堂へ…… おや、どうかされましたか？
jpnSearchText:
ようこそクレイユ礼拝堂へ……
おや、どうかされましたか？

engChrName: O-Oh. No, just... Are you from the Central East, by chance?
engSearchText:
O-Oh. No, just... Are you from the Central East,
by chance?
jpnChrName: いえ……もしかして中東系の方でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: いえ……もしかして中東系の方でしょうか。

engChrName: It was just a little weird seeing someone like you out here.
engSearchText:
It was just a little weird seeing someone like you
out here.
jpnChrName: この辺りの教会にもいらっしゃるとは意外です。
jpnSearchText: この辺りの教会にもいらっしゃるとは意外です。

engChrName: Ah... Some do find it strange, yes.
engSearchText: Ah... Some do find it strange, yes.
jpnChrName: まあ、たまに観光の方にも意外に思われますね。
jpnSearchText: まあ、たまに観光の方にも意外に思われますね。

engChrName: Central Eastern though I may be, I was born and raised here in Creil.
engSearchText:
Central Eastern though I may be, I was born and
raised here in Creil.
jpnChrName: こう見えても私、生まれも育ちもこの村でして。
jpnSearchText: こう見えても私、生まれも育ちもこの村でして。

engChrName: I did make my pilgrimage to the Holy City for training. I was approached to serve in temples there, but...
engSearchText:
I did make my pilgrimage to the Holy City
for training. I was approached to serve in temples
there, but...
jpnChrName: 修行を終えて法国から帰る時には、首都などの 中東系寺院への打診も頂きましたが……
jpnSearchText:
修行を終えて法国から帰る時には、首都などの
中東系寺院への打診も頂きましたが……

engChrName: ...the Holy City wasn't where my heart was. I wanted to come back here—to serve this village I call home.
engSearchText:
...the Holy City wasn't where my heart was. I wanted
to come back here—to serve this village I call home.
jpnChrName: あくまで、生まれ故郷のために シスターになるつもりでしたので。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで、生まれ故郷のために
シスターになるつもりでしたので。

engChrName: Makes sense... Lotta hometown pride, huh?
engSearchText: Makes sense... Lotta hometown pride, huh?
jpnChrName: なるほど、たいした地元愛ってやつだ。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、たいした地元愛ってやつだ。

engChrName: Lookin' back on it, I noticed a bunch of immigrants here. And they all just...mesh together.
engSearchText:
Lookin' back on it, I noticed a bunch of
immigrants here. And they all just...mesh together.
jpnChrName: そういやここらは、結構昔の 移民の家系も馴染んでるんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
そういやここらは、結構昔の
移民の家系も馴染んでるんだよな。

engChrName: Indeed. Creil is a tight-knit place—it's hard to be a stranger here.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Creil is a tight-knit place—it's hard to be a
stranger here.
jpnChrName: ええ、村の皆は家族のようなものですから。
jpnSearchText: ええ、村の皆は家族のようなものですから。

engChrName: Our sense of community binds us closer together than any color or creed.
engSearchText:
Our sense of community binds us closer together than
any color or creed.
jpnChrName: 村人同士、違いなんて意識した事もありません。
jpnSearchText: 村人同士、違いなんて意識した事もありません。

engChrName: This village really does feel like one big family. It's like everyone knows each other.
engSearchText:
This village really does feel like one big family.
It's like everyone knows each other.
jpnChrName: わぁ……この村も、一つの家族なんですね。 言われてみれば、皆さん他人という感じも無くて……
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……この村も、一つの家族なんですね。
言われてみれば、皆さん他人という感じも無くて……

engChrName: It almost feels like home to me...
engSearchText: It almost feels like home to me...
jpnChrName: どこか、クルガの里に通じるような気もします。
jpnSearchText: どこか、クルガの里に通じるような気もします。

engChrName: It was difficult convincing my mentor to let me practice back at my hometown...
engSearchText:
It was difficult convincing my mentor to let me
practice back at my hometown...
jpnChrName: 首都にいる先輩も、最初は 寺院勤務を推してくれましたが……
jpnSearchText:
首都にいる先輩も、最初は
寺院勤務を推してくれましたが……

engChrName: ...but she understands now how important Creil is to me.
engSearchText:
...but she understands now how important Creil is
to me.
jpnChrName: 今では村への想いも 理解してくれて、応援してくれています。
jpnSearchText:
今では村への想いも
理解してくれて、応援してくれています。

engChrName: I owe much to her from my time in the Holy City. I do hope I can see her again soon.
engSearchText:
I owe much to her from my time in the Holy City.
I do hope I can see her again soon.
jpnChrName: 法国でもお世話になりましたので、 近々お会いしたいところです。
jpnSearchText:
法国でもお世話になりましたので、
近々お会いしたいところです。

engChrName: I remember hearing this story about a hunter who took down some freakish monstrosity out east.
engSearchText:
I remember hearing this story about a hunter who
took down some freakish monstrosity out east.
jpnChrName: そういや妙な魔獣と言えば東方の辺境で、 とんでもねぇ異形の魔獣を狩った猟師の話があるな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや妙な魔獣と言えば東方の辺境で、
とんでもねぇ異形の魔獣を狩った猟師の話があるな。

engChrName: ...Sounds overblown, though. Probably just an urban legend.
engSearchText:
...Sounds overblown, though. Probably just an
urban legend.
jpnChrName: ……いや、あれはあくまで小説の話だったか。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、あれはあくまで小説の話だったか。

engChrName: Reminds me of the stories I used to read as a kid. Those really got my young heart racing.
engSearchText:
Reminds me of the stories I used to read as a kid.
Those really got my young heart racing.
jpnChrName: ああいう猟師の一族は本で初めて知ったが、 猟師としちゃ年甲斐も無く胸が躍ったな。
jpnSearchText:
ああいう猟師の一族は本で初めて知ったが、
猟師としちゃ年甲斐も無く胸が躍ったな。

engChrName: I took a quick peek in the forest, and those monsters did seem kinda off. Like they were scared, or somethin'.
engSearchText:
I took a quick peek in the forest, and those monsters
did seem kinda off. Like they were scared,
or somethin'.
jpnChrName: さっき近場の森も軽く見てきたが、 確かに魔獣共、何かに怯えとるな……
jpnSearchText:
さっき近場の森も軽く見てきたが、
確かに魔獣共、何かに怯えとるな……

engChrName: Never come across anything like this in all my years as a hunter...
engSearchText:
Never come across anything like this in all my years as
a hunter...
jpnChrName: ふむ、長年猟師をやっちゃいるが こんな事は初めてだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、長年猟師をやっちゃいるが
こんな事は初めてだ。

engChrName: I'm gonna scout a wider area tomorrow, just to make sure.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna scout a wider area tomorrow, just to
make sure.
jpnChrName: 明日はもう少し広い範囲を探ってみるか。
jpnSearchText: 明日はもう少し広い範囲を探ってみるか。

engChrName: I wanna get to the bottom of this myself.
engSearchText: I wanna get to the bottom of this myself.
jpnChrName: 魔獣については俺の方でも改めて 探ってみるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣については俺の方でも改めて
探ってみるとしよう。

engChrName: Doubt I need to tell you, but y'all be careful out there, too.
engSearchText:
Doubt I need to tell you, but y'all be careful out
there, too.
jpnChrName: あんたらも気を付けた方がいいぞ。 無用な心配かもしれないがな。
jpnSearchText:
あんたらも気を付けた方がいいぞ。
無用な心配かもしれないがな。

engChrName: *whimper*
engSearchText: *whimper*
jpnChrName: クゥ～ン……ウウウウ……
jpnSearchText: クゥ～ン……ウウウウ……

engChrName: Grrrrr...
engSearchText: Grrrrr...
jpnChrName: ガルルルル……ウウウウ……
jpnSearchText: ガルルルル……ウウウウ……

engChrName: Oh, don't mind him. Something's been getting him all riled up lately.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mind him. Something's been getting him
all riled up lately.
jpnChrName: ……これでも村に帰って落ち着いたんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……これでも村に帰って落ち着いたんだ。

engChrName: He was even worse before we got back to the village.
engSearchText: He was even worse before we got back to the village.
jpnChrName: さっきはもっと荒ぶっていてな。
jpnSearchText: さっきはもっと荒ぶっていてな。

engChrName: *whine* Grr...
engSearchText: *whine* Grr...
jpnChrName: ウウウウ……ガルルルル……
jpnSearchText: ウウウウ……ガルルルル……

engChrName: Pup's been on edge lately...
engSearchText: Pup's been on edge lately...
jpnChrName: 見ての通りだ、うちのわんこも 警戒モードになっとる。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通りだ、うちのわんこも
警戒モードになっとる。

engChrName: I'm sure Goddard knows his stuff, but I just don't know about Kaina goin' out shoppin' so much...
engSearchText:
I'm sure Goddard knows his stuff, but I just don't
know about Kaina goin' out shoppin' so much...
jpnChrName: ゴダード親方の事は信頼しているが、 娘に頻繁に買い付けに行かせるのはな……
jpnSearchText:
ゴダード親方の事は信頼しているが、
娘に頻繁に買い付けに行かせるのはな……

engChrName: I mean, I get it, 'real-world experience' is important and all, but...
engSearchText:
I mean, I get it, 'real-world experience' is important
and all, but...
jpnChrName: 外での仕事の経験も重要なのは わかっているが……
jpnSearchText:
外での仕事の経験も重要なのは
わかっているが……

engChrName: ...she's my one and only girl. I can't help but worry, y'know?
engSearchText:
...she's my one and only girl. I can't help but
worry, y'know?
jpnChrName: やっぱ一人娘だから心配でならねえぜ。
jpnSearchText: やっぱ一人娘だから心配でならねえぜ。

engChrName: She's said she wants to go out to Basel. She wants to visit Longlai, too, see the Eastern art out there.
engSearchText:
She's said she wants to go out to Basel. She wants to
visit Longlai, too, see the Eastern art out there.
jpnChrName: 娘はバーゼルとか、あとは東方の 工芸目当てで龍來に行きたいらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
娘はバーゼルとか、あとは東方の
工芸目当てで龍來に行きたいらしいが。

engChrName: Those places're worlds away from here... I know Goddard's all gung-ho about it—he wants her to get some experience under her belt.
engSearchText:
Those places're worlds away from here... I know
Goddard's all gung-ho about it—he wants her to get
some experience under her belt.
jpnChrName: どっちも遠い所だし心配でな。 でも、親方は経験の為って推しそうだしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
どっちも遠い所だし心配でな。
でも、親方は経験の為って推しそうだしなぁ……

engChrName: Me? I do the wheat milling here. Not a glamorous job, but it's nice workin' with...people, y'know what I mean?
engSearchText:
Me? I do the wheat milling here. Not a glamorous
job, but it's nice workin' with...people, y'know what
I mean?
jpnChrName: 俺も一応蕎麦挽きの管理くらいはしているが、 間違いなく充実感はあるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺も一応蕎麦挽きの管理くらいはしているが、
間違いなく充実感はあるぜ。

engChrName: The village needs the work I do, and they're quick to lemme know when I do a good job.
engSearchText:
The village needs the work I do, and they're quick to
lemme know when I do a good job.
jpnChrName: この仕事も村に欠かせないからかな、 感謝の言葉を貰う事も少なくない。
jpnSearchText:
この仕事も村に欠かせないからかな、
感謝の言葉を貰う事も少なくない。

engChrName: All that shiny professional business is great and all, but I hope Kaina can appreciate the little things, too.
engSearchText:
All that shiny professional business is great and all,
but I hope Kaina can appreciate the little things, too.
jpnChrName: 職人の夢も良いが、こういうささやかな価値も、 カイナには学んで欲しいんだがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
職人の夢も良いが、こういうささやかな価値も、
カイナには学んで欲しいんだがなぁ。

engChrName: Or, well...maybe I'm just a stubborn ol' coot for holdin' her back.
engSearchText:
Or, well...maybe I'm just a stubborn ol' coot for
holdin' her back.
jpnChrName: まあ、こういう事を言う俺が 頭が硬いって事なのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、こういう事を言う俺が
頭が硬いって事なのかもな。

engChrName: I think one of these days I need to sit down with her and ask her how she's really feelin'.
engSearchText:
I think one of these days I need to sit down with her
and ask her how she's really feelin'.
jpnChrName: カイナの職人観については、一度じっくりと 話し合ったりすべきかもな。
jpnSearchText:
カイナの職人観については、一度じっくりと
話し合ったりすべきかもな。

engChrName: I know my ancestors came here from the East... Apparently they were pretty big blacksmiths, back in the day.
engSearchText:
I know my ancestors came here from the East...
Apparently they were pretty big blacksmiths, back in
the day.
jpnChrName: うちは東方系の家系なんだが、祖先に それなりの東方鍛冶師がいたらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
うちは東方系の家系なんだが、祖先に
それなりの東方鍛冶師がいたらしくてな。

engChrName: Kaina was really into that stuff growin' up, but now she's gone and joined the factory instead so she can be a real professional.
engSearchText:
Kaina was really into that stuff growin' up, but now
she's gone and joined the factory instead so she can be
a real professional.
jpnChrName: 娘がその人の影響で、職人の道に進むって 工房で技師として修行してるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
娘がその人の影響で、職人の道に進むって
工房で技師として修行してるんだ。

engChrName: More power to her, I say, but all this newfangled factory stuff's a far cry from the smiths of old...
engSearchText:
More power to her, I say, but all this newfangled
factory stuff's a far cry from the smiths of old...
jpnChrName: 娘の夢は否定しないが、今の工房と昔の鍛冶師じゃ、 同じ職人でも勝手が違うとも思うんだがなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
娘の夢は否定しないが、今の工房と昔の鍛冶師じゃ、
同じ職人でも勝手が違うとも思うんだがなぁ……

engChrName: Never been any good with machinery, myself.
engSearchText: Never been any good with machinery, myself.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、俺自身は特に鍛治や 機械いじりの心得は無くてな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、俺自身は特に鍛治や
機械いじりの心得は無くてな。

engChrName: 'Bout all I can handle is the farming equipment. Guys say I'm a natural, but I think they're just flatterin' me.
engSearchText:
'Bout all I can handle is the farming equipment.
Guys say I'm a natural, but I think they're just
flatterin' me.
jpnChrName: まあ、普段の農機具の整備は上手いって 言われるが……流石に買いかぶりだろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、普段の農機具の整備は上手いって
言われるが……流石に買いかぶりだろうよ。

engChrName: Ohh! You mean that recipe Giovanna asked about!
engSearchText: Ohh! You mean that recipe Giovanna asked about!
jpnChrName: ああ、ジョバンナさんが この前聞きに来た件ね！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ジョバンナさんが
この前聞きに来た件ね！

engChrName: Admittedly, I'm not too familiar with the recipe itself, but I know plenty about its ingredients—buckwheat is my specialty!
engSearchText:
Admittedly, I'm not too familiar with the recipe itself,
but I know plenty about its ingredients—buckwheat
is my specialty!
jpnChrName: レシピに関しては不確かな所があるんだけど、 蕎麦粉に関しては自信あるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
レシピに関しては不確かな所があるんだけど、
蕎麦粉に関しては自信あるわよ。

engChrName: That's been passed down my family tree for generations. As millers, we know our wheat!
engSearchText:
That's been passed down my family tree
for generations. As millers, we know our wheat!
jpnChrName: 代々伝わって来た粉引きの製法の中に、 ちゃんと記されてたからね。
jpnSearchText:
代々伝わって来た粉引きの製法の中に、
ちゃんと記されてたからね。

engChrName: Really, now? That's wild... Guess I shouldn't be too surprised, though, what with galettes being the big thing here.
engSearchText:
Really, now? That's wild... Guess I shouldn't be too
surprised, though, what with galettes being the big
thing here.
jpnChrName: へえ、それはすごいな。 村の名物が蕎麦のガレットなだけあるって事か。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、それはすごいな。
村の名物が蕎麦のガレットなだけあるって事か。

engChrName: Yup, yup.
engSearchText: Yup, yup.
jpnChrName: ふふ、まあね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、まあね。

engChrName: It was my family that first imported buckwheat flour to the village, in fact.
engSearchText:
It was my family that first imported buckwheat flour
to the village, in fact.
jpnChrName: なにせ、私のご先祖様が この村に蕎麦粉を持ち込んだ張本人だから。
jpnSearchText:
なにせ、私のご先祖様が
この村に蕎麦粉を持ち込んだ張本人だから。

engChrName: So I dare say it's in my blood!
engSearchText: So I dare say it's in my blood!
jpnChrName: だから蕎麦の生地の作り方に関しても 大まかには知ってるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
だから蕎麦の生地の作り方に関しても
大まかには知ってるわよ。

engChrName: So, how do you make buckwheat dough?
engSearchText: So, how do you make buckwheat dough?
jpnChrName: 蕎麦の生地ですか…… それはどうやって作るんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦の生地ですか……
それはどうやって作るんでしょうか？

engChrName: There are two main ways you can do it.
engSearchText: There are two main ways you can do it.
jpnChrName: そうね、生地の作り方は大きく分けて ２通りあるそうよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうね、生地の作り方は大きく分けて
２通りあるそうよ。

engChrName: The simpler way is to just use only buckwheat flour— that's called 100% dough.
engSearchText:
The simpler way is to just use only buckwheat flour—
that's called 100% dough.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦粉のみを使用する作り方。 『十割蕎麦』と……
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦粉のみを使用する作り方。
『十割蕎麦』と……

engChrName: The second is to mix buckwheat flour with standard wheat flour.
engSearchText:
The second is to mix buckwheat flour with standard
wheat flour.
jpnChrName: つなぎとして小麦粉を使用して、 蕎麦粉との割合を調節する作り方の２つね。
jpnSearchText:
つなぎとして小麦粉を使用して、
蕎麦粉との割合を調節する作り方の２つね。

engChrName: You can play around with the ratio of buckwheat to wheat, and that can change the dough pretty significantly.
engSearchText:
You can play around with the ratio of buckwheat to
wheat, and that can change the dough
pretty significantly.
jpnChrName: 小麦粉も使用する方法に関しては、 分量によって呼び方が色々あるみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
小麦粉も使用する方法に関しては、
分量によって呼び方が色々あるみたいだけど……

engChrName: The most common ratio is 80% dough—that's 80% buckwheat, 20% wheat.
engSearchText:
The most common ratio is 80% dough—that's 80%
buckwheat, 20% wheat.
jpnChrName: 小麦粉２割、蕎麦粉８割にする 『二八蕎麦』なんて言葉が有名みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
小麦粉２割、蕎麦粉８割にする
『二八蕎麦』なんて言葉が有名みたいね。

engChrName: So the way you make the dough isn't always the same... There's more to this than I thought!
engSearchText:
So the way you make the dough isn't always
the same... There's more to this than I thought!
jpnChrName: 『十割蕎麦』に『二八蕎麦』…… うーん、なんだかややこしいです。
jpnSearchText:
『十割蕎麦』に『二八蕎麦』……
うーん、なんだかややこしいです。

engChrName: The more buckwheat you have in the dough, the easier it dries out.
engSearchText:
The more buckwheat you have in the dough, the
easier it dries out.
jpnChrName: あ、ついでに、乾燥させないように 生地をこねるのが難しいらしいわよ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ついでに、乾燥させないように
生地をこねるのが難しいらしいわよ。

engChrName: So working with higher buckwheat ratios takes more skill, especially when you're kneading it.
engSearchText:
So working with higher buckwheat ratios takes more
skill, especially when you're kneading it.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦粉の割合が多いほど コツがいるとかなんとか。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦粉の割合が多いほど
コツがいるとかなんとか。

engChrName: That's about the gist of it!
engSearchText: That's about the gist of it!
jpnChrName: 私から教えられるのはこのくらいね。
jpnSearchText: 私から教えられるのはこのくらいね。

engChrName: Huh. Lot more complicated than I gave it credit for.
engSearchText: Huh. Lot more complicated than I gave it credit for.
jpnChrName: へぇ、蕎麦作りってのは 思ってたより奥深いモンなんだな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、蕎麦作りってのは
思ってたより奥深いモンなんだな。

engChrName: Thanks for the crash course.
engSearchText: Thanks for the crash course.
jpnChrName: 参考になったぜ、ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText: 参考になったぜ、ありがとよ。

engChrName: My pleasure. Give my regards to Giovanna, would you?
engSearchText:
My pleasure. Give my regards to Giovanna,
would you?
jpnChrName: ええ、ジョバンナさんにも よろしく頼んだわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ジョバンナさんにも
よろしく頼んだわよ！

engChrName: Okay, that should be good enough.
engSearchText: Okay, that should be good enough.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで聞き込みは終わったな。
jpnSearchText: さてと、これで聞き込みは終わったな。

engChrName: I think we have a good grasp on the subject now!
engSearchText: I think we have a good grasp on the subject now!
jpnChrName: アドバイスの方法も 掴めてきた気がしますね！
jpnSearchText:
アドバイスの方法も
掴めてきた気がしますね！

engChrName: So do we go back to Giovanna's now?
engSearchText: So do we go back to Giovanna's now?
jpnChrName: それじゃあジョバンナさんの所に戻りますか？
jpnSearchText: それじゃあジョバンナさんの所に戻りますか？

engChrName: Hmm... Actually, y'know, I think we're still missin' something.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Actually, y'know, I think we're still
missin' something.
jpnChrName: そうだな……っと、待てよ。 よく考えたらアレが足りねえな。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……っと、待てよ。
よく考えたらアレが足りねえな。

engChrName: Oh? And what would that something be?
engSearchText: Oh? And what would that something be?
jpnChrName: といいますと……？
jpnSearchText: といいますと……？

engChrName: A secret spice, that's what.
engSearchText: A secret spice, that's what.
jpnChrName: 薬味だよ、薬味。
jpnSearchText: 薬味だよ、薬味。

engChrName: Nothin' wrong with stickin' to the basics, but I say if we're makin' our own, we put a little spin on it. Somethin' off the beaten path, y'know?
engSearchText:
Nothin' wrong with stickin' to the basics, but I say if
we're makin' our own, we put a little spin on it.
Somethin' off the beaten path, y'know?
jpnChrName: 素の味を楽しむのもいいが 折角なら変化もほしいってもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
素の味を楽しむのもいいが
折角なら変化もほしいってもんだ。

engChrName: Maybe somethin' that grows around here... How about local plants? We could probably find some stuff down by the creek.
engSearchText:
Maybe somethin' that grows around here...
How about local plants? We could probably find
some stuff down by the creek.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村は自然が豊かだしな、 小川あたりに生えてたりすんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村は自然が豊かだしな、
小川あたりに生えてたりすんじゃねえか？

engChrName: I'm...not sure what you mean, but you sound really confident about it. I trust you on this one!
engSearchText:
I'm...not sure what you mean, but you sound really
confident about it. I trust you on this one!
jpnChrName: うーん、何の事か分かりませんけど…… 折角ですし探してみますか？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、何の事か分かりませんけど……
折角ですし探してみますか？

engChrName: Cool. If we don't find anything, no biggie.
engSearchText: Cool. If we don't find anything, no biggie.
jpnChrName: ああ、見つからなければ それで構わないと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、見つからなければ
それで構わないと思うけどな。

engChrName: Let's give it a crack and see what we come up with.
engSearchText: Let's give it a crack and see what we come up with.
jpnChrName: よし、それじゃ次の聞き込み先に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: よし、それじゃ次の聞き込み先に向かうぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい！
jpnSearchText: はい！

engChrName: Ranji's a real worrywart sometimes... Personally, I think we should trust Kaina's judgment.
engSearchText:
Ranji's a real worrywart sometimes... Personally, I
think we should trust Kaina's judgment.
jpnChrName: 夫はカイナの遠出を心配してるけれど…… ここはあの子を信じるべきだと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
夫はカイナの遠出を心配してるけれど……
ここはあの子を信じるべきだと思うわ。

engChrName: Our little girl is growing up. If she wants to leave the nest already, that's her choice.
engSearchText:
Our little girl is growing up. If she wants to leave the
nest already, that's her choice.
jpnChrName: あの子がわたし達の思っていた以上に、 自立できているって事だと思うし。
jpnSearchText:
あの子がわたし達の思っていた以上に、
自立できているって事だと思うし。

engChrName: I think going out and seeing what the world has to offer will do wonders for her.
engSearchText:
I think going out and seeing what the world has to
offer will do wonders for her.
jpnChrName: それに、あの子は広い世界を 見る事で成長できると思うから。
jpnSearchText:
それに、あの子は広い世界を
見る事で成長できると思うから。

engChrName: Of course, I'm still worried about her.
engSearchText: Of course, I'm still worried about her.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、わたしも心配じゃない訳じゃないわ。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、わたしも心配じゃない訳じゃないわ。

engChrName: And I do wish she didn't spring this on us so suddenly...
engSearchText:
And I do wish she didn't spring this on us
so suddenly...
jpnChrName: せめて少しでも事前に、 わたし達に話してくれればねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
せめて少しでも事前に、
わたし達に話してくれればねぇ……

engChrName: We want to be able to support our daughter, wherever she goes.
engSearchText:
We want to be able to support our daughter,
wherever she goes.
jpnChrName: わたし達も娘の夢は応援したいわ。
jpnSearchText: わたし達も娘の夢は応援したいわ。

engChrName: And I do agree with my husband: I hope she doesn't lose sight of the smaller things in her pursuit of a professional career.
engSearchText:
And I do agree with my husband: I hope she doesn't
lose sight of the smaller things in her pursuit of a
professional career.
jpnChrName: でも、あまり職人の道に捉われ過ぎずに、 村の一員としての誇りを持って欲しいと思うの。
jpnSearchText:
でも、あまり職人の道に捉われ過ぎずに、
村の一員としての誇りを持って欲しいと思うの。

engChrName: But again, she's at that age where she can start making decisions for herself. I'm sure she's thought this through.
engSearchText:
But again, she's at that age where she can start
making decisions for herself. I'm sure she's thought
this through.
jpnChrName: とはいえカイナも多分、 何も考えてない訳じゃないわよね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえカイナも多分、
何も考えてない訳じゃないわよね。

engChrName: I'll just need to have faith in her.
engSearchText: I'll just need to have faith in her.
jpnChrName: もう少しあの子の価値観を 信じた方が良いのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
もう少しあの子の価値観を
信じた方が良いのかしら。

engChrName: Giovanna told me that she made a good soba! I'm glad my advice helped.
engSearchText:
Giovanna told me that she made a good soba!
I'm glad my advice helped.
jpnChrName: ジョバンナさんから聞いたわよ、 ついに蕎麦切りが完成したんですってね！
jpnSearchText:
ジョバンナさんから聞いたわよ、
ついに蕎麦切りが完成したんですってね！

engChrName: I'm curious how the soba came out—depending on how she used my buckwheat, the flavor profile can change dramatically.
engSearchText:
I'm curious how the soba came out—depending on
how she used my buckwheat, the flavor profile can
change dramatically.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦切りの味は勿論だけど、 私が挽いた蕎麦粉の味も気になるし……
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦切りの味は勿論だけど、
私が挽いた蕎麦粉の味も気になるし……

engChrName: I should ask her for a taste!
engSearchText: I should ask her for a taste!
jpnChrName: はやい内に食べさせて もらいに行かないとね！
jpnSearchText:
はやい内に食べさせて
もらいに行かないとね！

engChrName: There are many different kinds of buckwheat dough—the flavor and texture vary based on the ratio of buckwheat to normal wheat flour.
engSearchText:
There are many different kinds of buckwheat
dough—the flavor and texture vary based on the ratio
of buckwheat to normal wheat flour.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦の生地にも色々あるそうだけど…… 代表的な作り方は２通りあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦の生地にも色々あるそうだけど……
代表的な作り方は２通りあるわ。

engChrName: 100% dough, true to its name, uses buckwheat flour only.
engSearchText:
100% dough, true to its name, uses buckwheat
flour only.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦粉のみを使って生地を作る 『十割蕎麦』と……
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦粉のみを使って生地を作る
『十割蕎麦』と……

engChrName: 80% dough is also popular—that's 80% buckwheat, 20% wheat.
engSearchText:
80% dough is also popular—that's 80% buckwheat,
20% wheat.
jpnChrName: 小麦粉２割、蕎麦粉８割で作る 『二八蕎麦』ね。
jpnSearchText:
小麦粉２割、蕎麦粉８割で作る
『二八蕎麦』ね。

engChrName: Neither is strictly better, per se—it comes down to personal preference. But I hope that helps point you in the right direction!
engSearchText:
Neither is strictly better, per se—it comes down to
personal preference. But I hope that helps point you
in the right direction!
jpnChrName: どっちがいいのかまで分からないけど、 少しでも蕎麦切り作りの参考になれば嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
どっちがいいのかまで分からないけど、
少しでも蕎麦切り作りの参考になれば嬉しいわ。

engChrName: How did you find our galettes?
engSearchText: How did you find our galettes?
jpnChrName: うちの村の名物、ガレットは美味しかったかしら？
jpnSearchText: うちの村の名物、ガレットは美味しかったかしら？

engChrName: Not a lot of people know that their unique taste comes from the traditionally Eastern flour we use.
engSearchText:
Not a lot of people know that their unique taste
comes from the traditionally Eastern flour we use.
jpnChrName: ガレットに東方由来の蕎麦粉が使われているのは、 意外と知られていないようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ガレットに東方由来の蕎麦粉が使われているのは、
意外と知られていないようだけど……

engChrName: From what I hear, my family imported buckwheat flour to the village from the East.
engSearchText:
From what I hear, my family imported buckwheat
flour to the village from the East.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦粉を持ち込んだのって、うちの家系の ご先祖様だったらしいのよね。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦粉を持ち込んだのって、うちの家系の
ご先祖様だったらしいのよね。

engChrName: My husband and I manage the buckwheat mill here in Creil.
engSearchText:
My husband and I manage the buckwheat mill
here in Creil.
jpnChrName: 私は夫と一緒に、蕎麦挽きの管理をやっているわ。
jpnSearchText: 私は夫と一緒に、蕎麦挽きの管理をやっているわ。

engChrName: I don't do so for tradition's sake, though—more than anything, I'm just happy to contribute to our village's specialty!
engSearchText:
I don't do so for tradition's sake, though—more than
anything, I'm just happy to contribute to our
village's specialty!
jpnChrName: 先祖がどうとか関係無く、 村の名物を支える仕事は誇らしいわね。
jpnSearchText:
先祖がどうとか関係無く、
村の名物を支える仕事は誇らしいわね。

engChrName: Annie's a shrinkin' violet, I tell ya, but she really puts a smile on my face.
engSearchText:
Annie's a shrinkin' violet, I tell ya, but she really puts
a smile on my face.
jpnChrName: ガハハハッ！ それでよ、うちの娘は普段は控えめに見えるが……
jpnSearchText:
ガハハハッ！
それでよ、うちの娘は普段は控えめに見えるが……

engChrName: My wife was givin' me a hard time the other day, and y'know what Annie did? She stepped up to bat for me!
engSearchText:
My wife was givin' me a hard time the other day, and
y'know what Annie did? She stepped up to bat
for me!
jpnChrName: この前俺が嫁さんに虐められてた時、 ちょっとだけ庇ってくれたのさ！
jpnSearchText:
この前俺が嫁さんに虐められてた時、
ちょっとだけ庇ってくれたのさ！

engChrName: That was the happiest I've felt all year, gahaha! Love her to death, the kid.
engSearchText:
That was the happiest I've felt all year, gahaha!
Love her to death, the kid.
jpnChrName: 今年に入って一番の思い出だ！ まったく、俺の娘はまさにこの世の宝だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
今年に入って一番の思い出だ！
まったく、俺の娘はまさにこの世の宝だぜ！

engChrName: Y'can imagine my wife's pretty headstrong, herself. Takes a stubborn one to put up with me!
engSearchText:
Y'can imagine my wife's pretty headstrong, herself.
Takes a stubborn one to put up with me!
jpnChrName: しっかし、俺は見ての通りだし、 嫁も気が強いからなァ！
jpnSearchText:
しっかし、俺は見ての通りだし、
嫁も気が強いからなァ！

engChrName: Kent took after us, for sure. Kid's always gettin' his nose in stuff.
engSearchText:
Kent took after us, for sure. Kid's always gettin' his
nose in stuff.
jpnChrName: 元気で怖いもの知らずなケントは 俺ら両方に似たんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
元気で怖いもの知らずなケントは
俺ら両方に似たんだろうが……

engChrName: But Annie, my sweet li'l angel, she's just perfect. Where'd she get that from, I wonder...?
engSearchText:
But Annie, my sweet li'l angel, she's just perfect.
Where'd she get that from, I wonder...?
jpnChrName: 威勢は足りんが芯の強い愛しのアニーは、 一体誰に似たんだろうなァ！
jpnSearchText:
威勢は足りんが芯の強い愛しのアニーは、
一体誰に似たんだろうなァ！

engChrName: Phew! 'Nother day of farmin' done—I worked up a good sweat. Time to kick back with a cold one!
engSearchText:
Phew! 'Nother day of farmin' done—I worked up a
good sweat. Time to kick back with a cold one!
jpnChrName: ふう、今日も農作業が終わったぜ。 良い汗かいた、あとはビールで１日の締めだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今日も農作業が終わったぜ。
良い汗かいた、あとはビールで１日の締めだ。

engChrName: ...Eh, y'know, maybe not. Wife doesn't like me doin' that too much... She scares the hell outta me when she's mad.
engSearchText:
...Eh, y'know, maybe not. Wife doesn't like me doin'
that too much... She scares the hell outta me when
she's mad.
jpnChrName: っと、でもそろそろ少しは控えめにすっかな。 カミさん、ああ見えて怒らせると怖いしよ。
jpnSearchText:
っと、でもそろそろ少しは控えめにすっかな。
カミさん、ああ見えて怒らせると怖いしよ。

engChrName: Feel like I wouldn't be settin' the right example for Annie, either. Can't bear to think of her hatin' me... Makes me wanna cry!
engSearchText:
Feel like I wouldn't be settin' the right example for
Annie, either. Can't bear to think of her hatin' me...
Makes me wanna cry!
jpnChrName: 酒臭くして年頃のアニーに嫌われたりした日にゃ、 それこそ生きていけんしな、ガハハハッ！
jpnSearchText:
酒臭くして年頃のアニーに嫌われたりした日にゃ、
それこそ生きていけんしな、ガハハハッ！

engChrName: Giovanna's been messin' with some kinda recipe lately. What was it, uhh...
engSearchText:
Giovanna's been messin' with some kinda
recipe lately. What was it, uhh...
jpnChrName: そういや、最近嫁さんが 料理のレシピで悩んでるそうなんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
そういや、最近嫁さんが
料理のレシピで悩んでるそうなんだよ！

engChrName: Soba noodles? That sounds kinda right. Ah, whatever it is, I'm sure it'll be delicious!
engSearchText:
Soba noodles? That sounds kinda right. Ah, whatever
it is, I'm sure it'll be delicious!
jpnChrName: 確か、ソバキリとか言ってたっけな……？ 完成するのが楽しみだぜェ！
jpnSearchText:
確か、ソバキリとか言ってたっけな……？
完成するのが楽しみだぜェ！

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Giovanna made those soba noodles she was talkin' about.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! Giovanna made those soba noodles she was
talkin' about.
jpnChrName: 嫁さんから聞いたんだが、 ついに蕎麦切りが完成したんだってな！？
jpnSearchText:
嫁さんから聞いたんだが、
ついに蕎麦切りが完成したんだってな！？

engChrName: I knew she'd been worried about 'em for a while. Glad they came out right!
engSearchText:
I knew she'd been worried about 'em for a while.
Glad they came out right!
jpnChrName: ここ最近、上手くいかねえって悩んでたからな。 レシピが完成してよかったぜェ！
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近、上手くいかねえって悩んでたからな。
レシピが完成してよかったぜェ！

engChrName: Better get my butt home so I can give 'em a try!
engSearchText: Better get my butt home so I can give 'em a try!
jpnChrName: どれ、家に帰ったら 早速食べさせてもらうとすっかなァ！
jpnSearchText:
どれ、家に帰ったら
早速食べさせてもらうとすっかなァ！

engChrName: Awright, time to wrap this up!
engSearchText: Awright, time to wrap this up!
jpnChrName: さぁて、今日も農作業に励むとすっか！
jpnSearchText: さぁて、今日も農作業に励むとすっか！

engChrName: Come to think of it, I saw Kent and Annie playin' down by the river today.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I saw Kent and Annie playin'
down by the river today.
jpnChrName: そういやうちの娘と息子は 川辺の方で遊んでるようだが──
jpnSearchText:
そういやうちの娘と息子は
川辺の方で遊んでるようだが──

engChrName: Now, Kent's unstoppable, I tell ya. Annie, though? She's nothin' like him!
engSearchText:
Now, Kent's unstoppable, I tell ya. Annie, though?
She's nothin' like him!
jpnChrName: 息子は元気の塊、娘の方は ちとばかり控えめってな具合でよ！
jpnSearchText:
息子は元気の塊、娘の方は
ちとばかり控えめってな具合でよ！

engChrName: I love 'em both to death, of course—just funny to see how different they ended up!
engSearchText:
I love 'em both to death, of course—just funny to see
how different they ended up!
jpnChrName: 親としちゃどっちも可愛いが 全くもって正反対な二人だぜ、ガハハッ！
jpnSearchText:
親としちゃどっちも可愛いが
全くもって正反対な二人だぜ、ガハハッ！

engChrName: Now, Kent, give him some space, okay?
engSearchText: Now, Kent, give him some space, okay?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ケントったら…… 今はそっとしてあげなさいな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ケントったら……
今はそっとしてあげなさいな。

engChrName: Lashkar's really come into his own—I see a dependable young man in his future.
engSearchText:
Lashkar's really come into his own—I see a dependable
young man in his future.
jpnChrName: それにしても、あのラシュカル君も 頼もしくなったわよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、あのラシュカル君も
頼もしくなったわよねぇ。

engChrName: He's been talking about how he wants to be a bracer when he grows up. I bet he'd get along well with Annie! She's a smart cookie herself.
engSearchText:
He's been talking about how he wants to be a bracer
when he grows up. I bet he'd get along well
with Annie! She's a smart cookie herself.
jpnChrName: 最近は遊撃士になりたいって言ってるし しっかり者のアニーには案外お似合いかもね。
jpnSearchText:
最近は遊撃士になりたいって言ってるし
しっかり者のアニーには案外お似合いかもね。

engChrName: Annie is a bit apprehensive... I think she gets that from me. But Kent is her polar opposite—I have no idea who he takes after!
engSearchText:
Annie is a bit apprehensive... I think she gets that
from me. But Kent is her polar opposite—I have no
idea who he takes after!
jpnChrName: アニーが真面目で慎重なのは私似として、 ケントのやんちゃは誰似なのかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
アニーが真面目で慎重なのは私似として、
ケントのやんちゃは誰似なのかしらねぇ。

engChrName: ...Well, I do have an idea, being honest, but Gonzales is still a good man. I understand Kent looking up to him.
engSearchText:
...Well, I do have an idea, being honest, but Gonzales
is still a good man. I understand Kent looking up
to him.
jpnChrName: まあ、十中八九あの飲んだくれなんだろうけど、 それでも憎めない可愛さが、子供の不思議な所よ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、十中八九あの飲んだくれなんだろうけど、
それでも憎めない可愛さが、子供の不思議な所よ。

engChrName: So far, we've had a great harvest. I think this year's festival will be plenty grand to go with it.
engSearchText:
So far, we've had a great harvest. I think this year's
festival will be plenty grand to go with it.
jpnChrName: 今年は中々の豊作でね。 収穫祭もちょっと豪華にやるつもりなの。
jpnSearchText:
今年は中々の豊作でね。
収穫祭もちょっと豪華にやるつもりなの。

engChrName: And thanks to you, I have a special dish I can bring to the feast. I'm sure it'll be a festival to remember, heehee!
engSearchText:
And thanks to you, I have a special dish I can bring to
the feast. I'm sure it'll be a festival to
remember, heehee!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、おかげで蕎麦切りの方も 目途がついたし、全力で盛り上げちゃうわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、おかげで蕎麦切りの方も
目途がついたし、全力で盛り上げちゃうわよ！

engChrName: Oh, if you're interested, you don't have to be a villager to enjoy the festival. If you have the time, we'd be happy to see you.
engSearchText:
Oh, if you're interested, you don't have to be a villager
to enjoy the festival. If you have the time, we'd be
happy to see you.
jpnChrName: ちなみに村人じゃなくても大歓迎だから もし良かったら遊びに来て頂戴ね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに村人じゃなくても大歓迎だから
もし良かったら遊びに来て頂戴ね。

engChrName: Say, has anyone ever told you about our harvest festival?
engSearchText:
Say, has anyone ever told you about our harvest
festival?
jpnChrName: そう言えば、秋の収穫祭の話は聞いた？
jpnSearchText: そう言えば、秋の収穫祭の話は聞いた？

engChrName: The year before last, we had to put the festival on hold due to the war... But as of last autumn, we're back on schedule.
engSearchText:
The year before last, we had to put the festival on
hold due to the war... But as of last autumn, we're
back on schedule.
jpnChrName: 一昨年は戦争で中止になったけど、 去年に続いて今年も無事に開催できそうでね。
jpnSearchText:
一昨年は戦争で中止になったけど、
去年に続いて今年も無事に開催できそうでね。

engChrName: We had a good harvest this year, so we really want to make this festival count. We're planning a feast for everyone in the village!
engSearchText:
We had a good harvest this year, so we really want to
make this festival count. We're planning a feast for
everyone in the village!
jpnChrName: 豊作でもあったし、例年にない美味しいものを みんなに振る舞おうと思ってるの。
jpnSearchText:
豊作でもあったし、例年にない美味しいものを
みんなに振る舞おうと思ってるの。

engChrName: Anyone and everyone is welcome—if you have the time, we'd love to see you there!
engSearchText:
Anyone and everyone is welcome—if you have the
time, we'd love to see you there!
jpnChrName: 村人じゃなくても大歓迎だから もし良かったら遊びに来て頂戴ね。
jpnSearchText:
村人じゃなくても大歓迎だから
もし良かったら遊びに来て頂戴ね。

engChrName: I did tell Motona and Gonzales about the soba.
engSearchText: I did tell Motona and Gonzales about the soba.
jpnChrName: モトナさんや主人にも 蕎麦切りの事を伝えてきたわ。
jpnSearchText:
モトナさんや主人にも
蕎麦切りの事を伝えてきたわ。

engChrName: I still have plenty of leftovers, so they're welcome to a taste, too.
engSearchText:
I still have plenty of leftovers, so they're welcome to a
taste, too.
jpnChrName: せっかくだもの、まだ残りがあるから 食べていってほしいと思って。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだもの、まだ残りがあるから
食べていってほしいと思って。

engChrName: With practice, I'm sure I'll make some wonderful noodles in time for the festival!
engSearchText:
With practice, I'm sure I'll make some wonderful
noodles in time for the festival!
jpnChrName: ふふ、この調子でもっと腕をあげて 今度は収穫祭で皆を笑顔にしたいわね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、この調子でもっと腕をあげて
今度は収穫祭で皆を笑顔にしたいわね！

engChrName: If you wouldn't mind checking with Motona and Mayor Weng for me, I'd appreciate it.
engSearchText:
If you wouldn't mind checking with Motona and
Mayor Weng for me, I'd appreciate it.
jpnChrName: それじゃあウェン村長とモトナさんに 聞き込みをお願いするわね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあウェン村長とモトナさんに
聞き込みをお願いするわね。

engChrName: I'll finish the rest of my housework while you're out.
engSearchText: I'll finish the rest of my housework while you're out.
jpnChrName: その間に私は 他の家事を済ませておこうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
その間に私は
他の家事を済ませておこうかしら。

engChrName: Ah! Hello there. Are you travelers? I didn't see you among those bus riders.
engSearchText:
Ah! Hello there. Are you travelers? I didn't see you
among those bus riders.
jpnChrName: あら、旅行者の人たちかしら？ バスの人とは違うようだけど。
jpnSearchText:
あら、旅行者の人たちかしら？
バスの人とは違うようだけど。

engChrName: We're not the busiest town in the world, but I hope you enjoy your time here, nonetheless. Just relax and unwind—it's what our village does best.
engSearchText:
We're not the busiest town in the world, but I hope
you enjoy your time here, nonetheless. Just relax and
unwind—it's what our village does best.
jpnChrName: 娯楽は無いけど、のんびりするには良い村よ。 何にしてもゆっくりしていくと良いわ。
jpnSearchText:
娯楽は無いけど、のんびりするには良い村よ。
何にしてもゆっくりしていくと良いわ。

engChrName: Oh, and if you get the chance, try some vegetables from Martha's shop! They're like our village's hidden gems.
engSearchText:
Oh, and if you get the chance, try some vegetables
from Martha's shop! They're like our village's
hidden gems.
jpnChrName: ここにいるマーサさんの直売野菜もどう？ どれも質が良くて、隠れた名物なの。
jpnSearchText:
ここにいるマーサさんの直売野菜もどう？
どれも質が良くて、隠れた名物なの。

engChrName: She carries the pumpkins we grow, too.
engSearchText: She carries the pumpkins we grow, too.
jpnChrName: あたしのところで作ってる カボチャも当然あるわ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしのところで作ってる
カボチャも当然あるわ。

engChrName: Galettes, of course, are our specialty, but they're not all we make. We have a bountiful range of crops here.
engSearchText:
Galettes, of course, are our specialty, but they're not
all we make. We have a bountiful range of crops here.
jpnChrName: ガレットが特に有名だけど、 他にもうちの村は色々と名産揃いよ。
jpnSearchText:
ガレットが特に有名だけど、
他にもうちの村は色々と名産揃いよ。

engChrName: My husband can grow pumpkins with the very best of them. He hides a real green thumb beneath that, er...boorish exterior.
engSearchText:
My husband can grow pumpkins with the very best
of them. He hides a real green thumb beneath that,
er...boorish exterior.
jpnChrName: うちのだらしない亭主が作るカボチャでさえ、 そこいらの品よりは質が良いっていうし。
jpnSearchText:
うちのだらしない亭主が作るカボチャでさえ、
そこいらの品よりは質が良いっていうし。

engChrName: I can always count on Lashkar, heehee. I'm excited to go to the capital with him!
engSearchText:
I can always count on Lashkar, heehee. I'm excited to
go to the capital with him!
jpnChrName: ふふ、ラシュカル君はいつも頼りになるよね。 首都に行くのもとっても楽しみ……！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ラシュカル君はいつも頼りになるよね。
首都に行くのもとっても楽しみ……！

engChrName: But...I wonder why he won't play with me and Kent anymore.
engSearchText:
But...I wonder why he won't play with me and
Kent anymore.
jpnChrName: でも……だったらどうして、最近はわたしや ケントと遊んでくれなくなってたのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
でも……だったらどうして、最近はわたしや
ケントと遊んでくれなくなってたのかなぁ？

engChrName: I come to the square to walk Nero a lot.
engSearchText: I come to the square to walk Nero a lot.
jpnChrName: この広場でね、 よくネロのおさんぽをしてたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この広場でね、
