よくネロのおさんぽをしてたんだ。

engChrName: Nero might have gone somewhere he knows from our walks... I'll look for him around here. Let's split up, okay?
engSearchText:
Nero might have gone somewhere he knows from
our walks... I'll look for him around here. Let's split
up, okay?
jpnChrName: 慣れた場所に来るかもしれないから、 わたしはここで探す事にするね。
jpnSearchText:
慣れた場所に来るかもしれないから、
わたしはここで探す事にするね。

engChrName: Please help me find him...!
engSearchText: Please help me find him...!
jpnChrName: ネロのこと、 どうかよろしくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
ネロのこと、
どうかよろしくお願いします……！

engChrName: I'm sorry I'm so annoying with this, Lashkar...
engSearchText: I'm sorry I'm so annoying with this, Lashkar...
jpnChrName: それと、ラシュカルも…… 迷惑をかけてごめんね。
jpnSearchText:
それと、ラシュカルも……
迷惑をかけてごめんね。

engChrName: Hey, don't sweat it! You're my friend.
engSearchText: Hey, don't sweat it! You're my friend.
jpnChrName: 気にするなって！ 友達なんだからトーゼンだろ！
jpnSearchText:
気にするなって！
友達なんだからトーゼンだろ！

engChrName: Nero looks kinda stressed out, so I'm gonna bring him home.
engSearchText:
Nero looks kinda stressed out, so I'm gonna bring
him home.
jpnChrName: 猫のネロが何だか落ち着かないみたいだから、 そろそろ帰ろうと思うんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
猫のネロが何だか落ち着かないみたいだから、
そろそろ帰ろうと思うんだけど……

engChrName: Kent just has so much energy. We have to drag him back inside whenever we play!
engSearchText:
Kent just has so much energy. We have to drag him
back inside whenever we play!
jpnChrName: ケント、一度お外に出ると いつまでも遊びたがっちゃうから……
jpnSearchText:
ケント、一度お外に出ると
いつまでも遊びたがっちゃうから……

engChrName: Thank you so much for helping me find Nero, Lashkar!
engSearchText: Thank you so much for helping me find Nero, Lashkar!
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君、改めて今日はありがとうね。 ネロを探してくれて……
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル君、改めて今日はありがとうね。
ネロを探してくれて……

engChrName: No problem... I-I mean, of course! It's all in a day's work for a bracer trainee!
engSearchText:
No problem... I-I mean, of course! It's all in a day's
work for a bracer trainee!
jpnChrName: お、おうよ……遊撃士目指してるんだから、 これくらい当然だって！
jpnSearchText:
お、おうよ……遊撃士目指してるんだから、
これくらい当然だって！

engChrName: I'm just glad Nero's okay. I don't like seeing you sad. It...makes me sad, too.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad Nero's okay. I don't like seeing you sad.
It...makes me sad, too.
jpnChrName: それより、ネロも無事でよかったな。 アニーもやっぱり笑ってる顔の方が似合うぜ！
jpnSearchText:
それより、ネロも無事でよかったな。
アニーもやっぱり笑ってる顔の方が似合うぜ！

engChrName: Aww, heehee. Thanks, Lashkar. I know you'll be a bracer some day—you're so kind and strong!
engSearchText:
Aww, heehee. Thanks, Lashkar. I know you'll be a
bracer some day—you're so kind and strong!
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとう……ラシュカル君は優しいね。 それに強いし、きっと遊撃士にもなれるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ありがとう……ラシュカル君は優しいね。
それに強いし、きっと遊撃士にもなれるよ。

engChrName: I, uh... Wow, thanks! Now I wanna be a bracer even more!
engSearchText:
I, uh... Wow, thanks! Now I wanna be a bracer
even more!
jpnChrName: そ、そうだな……アニーに言ってもらえると 俄然やる気が出てくるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだな……アニーに言ってもらえると
俄然やる気が出てくるぜ！

engChrName: O-Oh, umm... Just wanted to ask. Do you wanna, maybe...go to the capital some time? Together, I mean?
engSearchText:
O-Oh, umm... Just wanted to ask. Do you wanna,
maybe...go to the capital some time? Together,
I mean?
jpnChrName: そ、そうだ……もし良かったら、 いつか一緒に首都に行ってみないか？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだ……もし良かったら、
いつか一緒に首都に行ってみないか？

engChrName: I-I mean, I just wanna see the main guild branch there! You can tag along and we can, uh... t-tour around?
engSearchText:
I-I mean, I just wanna see the main guild
branch there! You can tag along and we can, uh...
t-tour around?
jpnChrName: ほら、ギルドの総支部ってところも見学したいし、 一緒に首都観光でもさ……
jpnSearchText:
ほら、ギルドの総支部ってところも見学したいし、
一緒に首都観光でもさ……

engChrName: Well, if you'd let me, then...yeah!
engSearchText: Well, if you'd let me, then...yeah!
jpnChrName: いいの？　それなら、 わたしもついていきたいかも。
jpnSearchText:
いいの？　それなら、
わたしもついていきたいかも。

engChrName: I bet it'll be really fun seeing the capital together!
engSearchText: I bet it'll be really fun seeing the capital together!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ラシュカル君と一緒なら きっととっても楽しいもの！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ラシュカル君と一緒なら
きっととっても楽しいもの！

engChrName: Come on, Kent. Let's go home, okay? I think Nero's anxious... Maybe he wants to sleep.
engSearchText:
Come on, Kent. Let's go home, okay? I think
Nero's anxious... Maybe he wants to sleep.
jpnChrName: ほらケント、そろそろお家に帰らない？ 何だかネロも落ち着かないみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
ほらケント、そろそろお家に帰らない？
何だかネロも落ち着かないみたいだし……

engChrName: Aww, I wanna stay outside! There are so many new people to play with!
engSearchText:
Aww, I wanna stay outside! There are so many new
people to play with!
jpnChrName: え～、もっとアソぼうよ～！ なんかヒトもイッパイ来ててオモシロいし！
jpnSearchText:
え～、もっとアソぼうよ～！
なんかヒトもイッパイ来ててオモシロいし！

engChrName: Ooh, ooh! Annie, there's a crab!
engSearchText: Ooh, ooh! Annie, there's a crab!
jpnChrName: あっ、お姉ちゃんみてみて！ カニさんいるよっ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、お姉ちゃんみてみて！
カニさんいるよっ！

engChrName: You get way too excited, Kent...
engSearchText: You get way too excited, Kent...
jpnChrName: も、もう……ケントったらほんとうに やんちゃなんだから……
jpnSearchText:
も、もう……ケントったらほんとうに
やんちゃなんだから……

engChrName: Something about that old man really scared me... I wonder what he was doing all the way out here in the village?
engSearchText:
Something about that old man really scared me...
I wonder what he was doing all the way out here in
the village?
jpnChrName: この前も村に来た恐そうなおじさん達に 遊んでもらっててお姉ちゃんひやひやしたんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
この前も村に来た恐そうなおじさん達に
遊んでもらっててお姉ちゃんひやひやしたんだよ？

engChrName: Lashkar wanted to play, too...
engSearchText: Lashkar wanted to play, too...
jpnChrName: おうちに帰るまで、ラシュカル兄ちゃんも いっしょにあそびたかったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
おうちに帰るまで、ラシュカル兄ちゃんも
いっしょにあそびたかったんだけど……

engChrName: ...but Mommy said not right now.
engSearchText: ...but Mommy said not right now.
jpnChrName: ママが今はダメだっていうの。
jpnSearchText: ママが今はダメだっていうの。

engChrName: I don't get it... Can we play with him tomorrow, then?
engSearchText:
I don't get it... Can we play with him
tomorrow, then?
jpnChrName: う～ん、よくわかんないけど…… 明日になったらいいのかな～？
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、よくわかんないけど……
明日になったらいいのかな～？

engChrName: Oh, no... Where's Nero gone? I don't see him anywhere...
engSearchText:
Oh, no... Where's Nero gone? I don't see
him anywhere...
jpnChrName: はぁ……ネロは一体どこに 行っちゃったんだろう……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……ネロは一体どこに
行っちゃったんだろう……

engChrName: I hope we find him before sundown...
engSearchText: I hope we find him before sundown...
jpnChrName: 夜になっちゃう前に 見つけられたらいいんだけどなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
夜になっちゃう前に
見つけられたらいいんだけどなぁ……

engChrName: Hi there, mister crab. You don't mind if I catch you, right?
engSearchText:
Hi there, mister crab. You don't mind if I catch
you, right?
jpnChrName: カニさん、つかまえられないかなぁ～？
jpnSearchText: カニさん、つかまえられないかなぁ～？

engChrName: Ooh, I bet Annie and Nero will flip when I show them!
engSearchText:
Ooh, I bet Annie and Nero will flip when I
show them!
jpnChrName: えへへっ、お姉ちゃんやネロにも みせてあげたいんだけど！
jpnSearchText:
えへへっ、お姉ちゃんやネロにも
みせてあげたいんだけど！

engChrName: It's okay, Annie...
engSearchText: It's okay, Annie...
jpnChrName: 元気だしてよ姉ちゃん……
jpnSearchText: 元気だしてよ姉ちゃん……

engChrName: I know Lashkar will find him! He's gotta!
engSearchText: I know Lashkar will find him! He's gotta!
jpnChrName: きっとラシュカルお兄ちゃんが 何とかしてくれるって……！
jpnSearchText:
きっとラシュカルお兄ちゃんが
何とかしてくれるって……！

engChrName: I know, I just...
engSearchText: I know, I just...
jpnChrName: うん……分かってるけど……
jpnSearchText: うん……分かってるけど……

engChrName: (Sounds like they've got trouble on their hands.)
engSearchText: (Sounds like they've got trouble on their hands.)
jpnChrName: （何かトラブルでしょうか……）
jpnSearchText: （何かトラブルでしょうか……）

engChrName: (I feel for 'em, but we don't have the time to spare. We need to sort out our own business first.)
engSearchText:
(I feel for 'em, but we don't have the time to spare.
We need to sort out our own business first.)
jpnChrName: （ちょいと気になるが……   今は情報集めを優先するぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ちょいと気になるが……
今は情報集めを優先するぞ。）

engChrName: (Let's see if we can help them after we're done.)
engSearchText: (Let's see if we can help them after we're done.)
jpnChrName: （では後で声をかけましょうか。）
jpnSearchText: （では後で声をかけましょうか。）

engChrName: Oh, Nero, I'm so glad you're safe...!
engSearchText: Oh, Nero, I'm so glad you're safe...!
jpnChrName: ふふ、本当にネロが無事でよかった……
jpnSearchText: ふふ、本当にネロが無事でよかった……

engChrName: But when did you get so muddy? I'm gonna have to give you a good bath!
engSearchText:
But when did you get so muddy? I'm gonna have to
give you a good bath!
jpnChrName: でも、いつになく泥だらけみたいだから キレイにしてあげなくちゃね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、いつになく泥だらけみたいだから
キレイにしてあげなくちゃね。

engChrName: Sounds good! I'll keep an eye on Kent while you clean him.
engSearchText:
Sounds good! I'll keep an eye on Kent while you
clean him.
jpnChrName: おっ、ならその間はオレが ケントの面倒を見といてやるよ！
jpnSearchText:
おっ、ならその間はオレが
ケントの面倒を見といてやるよ！

engChrName: Hey, Kent! You up for some late-night hide and seek?
engSearchText: Hey, Kent! You up for some late-night hide and seek?
jpnChrName: もう夕方だけど、まだ遊び足りないだろ？ 兄ちゃんと一緒にオニごっこしようぜ！
jpnSearchText:
もう夕方だけど、まだ遊び足りないだろ？
兄ちゃんと一緒にオニごっこしようぜ！

engChrName: You bet! I won't lose this time!
engSearchText: You bet! I won't lose this time!
jpnChrName: やったぁ！ 今日はゼッタイに負けないからな～！
jpnSearchText:
やったぁ！
今日はゼッタイに負けないからな～！

engChrName: Thanks, Lashkar.
engSearchText: Thanks, Lashkar.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ありがとうラシュカル君。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、ありがとうラシュカル君。

engChrName: Mrrow!
engSearchText: Mrrow!
jpnChrName: みゃいみゃいっ♪
jpnSearchText: みゃいみゃいっ♪

engChrName: Heehee, he wants to play, too!
engSearchText: Heehee, he wants to play, too!
jpnChrName: あはは、ネロってば じゃれてるみたいだね！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、ネロってば
じゃれてるみたいだね！

engChrName: All right, I'll play with you for a bit. But don't make Annie worry like that again, okay?
engSearchText:
All right, I'll play with you for a bit. But don't make
Annie worry like that again, okay?
jpnChrName: ……もうお姉ちゃんを シンパイさせたりしちゃダメだよ？
jpnSearchText:
……もうお姉ちゃんを
シンパイさせたりしちゃダメだよ？

engChrName: Meowr!
engSearchText: Meowr!
jpnChrName: みみぃっ！
jpnSearchText: みみぃっ！

engChrName: Mrrow?
engSearchText: Mrrow?

engChrName: Meow!
engSearchText: Meow!
jpnChrName: みゃぁ～……
jpnSearchText: みゃぁ～……

engChrName: Mrr...
engSearchText: Mrr...
jpnChrName: みぃぃ……
jpnSearchText: みぃぃ……

engChrName: Hmm? What's wrong, Nero? Usually you're running around a lot more...
engSearchText:
Hmm? What's wrong, Nero? Usually you're running
around a lot more...
jpnChrName: うーん、ネロどうしたのかなぁ？ 普段はもっと元気に遊びまわるのに……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ネロどうしたのかなぁ？
普段はもっと元気に遊びまわるのに……

engChrName: Rawrm...
engSearchText: Rawrm...
jpnChrName: みんみぃぃ……
jpnSearchText: みんみぃぃ……

engChrName: My children are rightly proud of their home—my daughter most of all!
engSearchText:
My children are rightly proud of their home—my
daughter most of all!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、それを言ったら 俺のところの娘たちも負けとらんぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、それを言ったら
俺のところの娘たちも負けとらんぞ！

engChrName: She wears the cloth well, for certain. Brings a tear to her old man's eye!
engSearchText:
She wears the cloth well, for certain. Brings a tear to
her old man's eye!
jpnChrName: 娘の地元愛は相変わらず凄い、 俺たちの比じゃねぇ、そしてシスター姿が眩しい！
jpnSearchText:
娘の地元愛は相変わらず凄い、
俺たちの比じゃねぇ、そしてシスター姿が眩しい！

engChrName: Now, my son? Call it conjecture, but I see the stars in his future!
engSearchText:
Now, my son? Call it conjecture, but I see the stars in
his future!
jpnChrName: 息子も特に根拠は無いが、とにかく 大物になりそうな予感がするぜ！
jpnSearchText:
息子も特に根拠は無いが、とにかく
大物になりそうな予感がするぜ！

engChrName: ...Phew. I'm starting to sound like that old friend of mine, fawning over his own kids for moons on end.
engSearchText:
...Phew. I'm starting to sound like that old friend of
mine, fawning over his own kids for moons on end.
jpnChrName: フン、しかしこの張り合いをコイツとするのは 一体、今週何度目になるんだろうなァ！
jpnSearchText:
フン、しかしこの張り合いをコイツとするのは
一体、今週何度目になるんだろうなァ！

engChrName: Perhaps that's just what us old codgers like to do: live vicariously through our children and punish any poor soul who lends an ear.
engSearchText:
Perhaps that's just what us old codgers like to do: live
vicariously through our children and punish any poor
soul who lends an ear.
jpnChrName: ま、目に入れても痛くねぇ存在をいくらでも 自慢できんのが、俺たちオヤジって人種よ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、目に入れても痛くねぇ存在をいくらでも
自慢できんのが、俺たちオヤジって人種よ！

engChrName: Have you been to the chapel, yourself? The sister there is none other than my daughter!
engSearchText:
Have you been to the chapel, yourself? The sister
there is none other than my daughter!
jpnChrName: そう言えば礼拝堂の方には行ったかい？ あそこの超絶美人シスターは、俺の娘でな。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば礼拝堂の方には行ったかい？
あそこの超絶美人シスターは、俺の娘でな。

engChrName: She brought me to tears when she left our home for the Holy City...and then to tears of joy when she returned!
engSearchText:
She brought me to tears when she left our home for
the Holy City...and then to tears of joy when
she returned!
jpnChrName: 娘が法国に行った時は男泣きしちまったが、 娘が帰ってきたらまた泣いちまったよ。
jpnSearchText:
娘が法国に行った時は男泣きしちまったが、
娘が帰ってきたらまた泣いちまったよ。

engChrName: Oh, how she's grown so...! *sniffle* She just warms my heart.
engSearchText:
Oh, how she's grown so...! *sniffle* She just warms
my heart.
jpnChrName: あんな故郷想いに育ってくれて…… 父ちゃん感激しっぱなしだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あんな故郷想いに育ってくれて……
父ちゃん感激しっぱなしだぜ。

engChrName: Goodness, I need to pull myself together. I can't go crying in front of new acquaintances!
engSearchText:
Goodness, I need to pull myself together. I can't go
crying in front of new acquaintances!
jpnChrName: とはいえ、これ以上泣きっ面を曝すのもなぁ……
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、これ以上泣きっ面を曝すのもなぁ……

engChrName: Well, at least I won't have to worry about crying at her wedding. She's a woman of the cloth, haha!
engSearchText:
Well, at least I won't have to worry about crying at
her wedding. She's a woman of the cloth, haha!
jpnChrName: その意味じゃシスターになってくれて助かるぜ、 当分は嫁に出して泣く心配はねぇからな！
jpnSearchText:
その意味じゃシスターになってくれて助かるぜ、
当分は嫁に出して泣く心配はねぇからな！

engChrName: She really makes her papa proud!
engSearchText: She really makes her papa proud!
jpnChrName: まったく、どこまで孝行な娘なんだ！
jpnSearchText: まったく、どこまで孝行な娘なんだ！

engChrName: Curious about the windmill, are you?
engSearchText: Curious about the windmill, are you?
jpnChrName: おう、旅行者さん。 風車が気になるかい？
jpnSearchText:
おう、旅行者さん。
風車が気になるかい？

engChrName: This here is my prized grain thresher. It does its job plenty well!
engSearchText:
This here is my prized grain thresher. It does its job
plenty well!
jpnChrName: コイツは俺の相棒でな、 小麦の脱穀とかに使ってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツは俺の相棒でな、
小麦の脱穀とかに使ってんだ。

engChrName: Veggies and galettes are well and good, but they say 'bread and butter' for a reason.
engSearchText:
Veggies and galettes are well and good, but they say
'bread and butter' for a reason.
jpnChrName: 野菜も、蕎麦のガレットも美味いが、 やっぱり主食ったらパンだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
野菜も、蕎麦のガレットも美味いが、
やっぱり主食ったらパンだからよ。

engChrName: We're part of the Republic's breadbasket with the wheat we produce.
engSearchText:
We're part of the Republic's breadbasket with the
wheat we produce.
jpnChrName: ある意味、俺たちが共和国の胃袋を 握ってるようなもんなんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味、俺たちが共和国の胃袋を
握ってるようなもんなんだぜ。

engChrName: And though crops of any kind are a welcome sight, wheat especially just feels...gratifying.
engSearchText:
And though crops of any kind are a welcome sight,
wheat especially just feels...gratifying.
jpnChrName: 俺たち百姓にとっちゃどんな作物でも 育て甲斐があるが、麦は手応えが違う。
jpnSearchText:
俺たち百姓にとっちゃどんな作物でも
育て甲斐があるが、麦は手応えが違う。

engChrName: Gazing out upon that sea of golden grains, picturing the wonderful loaves they'll make... It just makes your heart soar! Or, it does mine, at least.
engSearchText:
Gazing out upon that sea of golden grains, picturing
the wonderful loaves they'll make... It just makes your
heart soar! Or, it does mine, at least.
jpnChrName: 一面に輝く金色の麦畑……あの壮観な 代物がパンになると思うと胸が躍るね。
jpnSearchText:
一面に輝く金色の麦畑……あの壮観な
代物がパンになると思うと胸が躍るね。

engChrName: And you can't make beer without the right grains, after all! Haha!
engSearchText:
And you can't make beer without the right grains,
after all! Haha!
jpnChrName: それに……麦が無きゃビールも飲めんしな！
jpnSearchText: それに……麦が無きゃビールも飲めんしな！

engChrName: (Phew... Man, why am I getting so nervous over this?!)
engSearchText:
(Phew... Man, why am I getting so nervous
over this?!)
jpnChrName: （ふう……何でこの程度で   緊張してんだよオレ！）
jpnSearchText:
（ふう……何でこの程度で
緊張してんだよオレ！）

engChrName: (I gotta make sure I'm worthy of her—and that means becoming a strong bracer she can rely on! I'm sure of it!)
engSearchText:
(I gotta make sure I'm worthy of her—and that
means becoming a strong bracer she can rely on!
I'm sure of it!)
jpnChrName: （とにかく、アニーに相応しい男になるには、   遊撃士になるので方向性は間違ってない。）
jpnSearchText:
（とにかく、アニーに相応しい男になるには、
遊撃士になるので方向性は間違ってない。）

engChrName: (Knowing is half the battle, and I think I've got it all figured out!)
engSearchText:
(Knowing is half the battle, and I think I've got it all
figured out!)
jpnChrName: （それが確認できただけでも十分じゃねぇか……！）
jpnSearchText: （それが確認できただけでも十分じゃねぇか……！）

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Wasn't there a bracer who came out here from the capital?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Wasn't there a bracer who came out here
from the capital?
jpnChrName: そういや……遊撃士の人が 首都から来たんだってな？
jpnSearchText:
そういや……遊撃士の人が
首都から来たんだってな？

engChrName: I wanted to ask about the main branch and stuff, but I guess I have to wait until things settle down here.
engSearchText:
I wanted to ask about the main branch and stuff, but I
guess I have to wait until things settle down here.
jpnChrName: 総支部の見学とか色々聞きたいけど、 向こうが落ち着くまで控えるよ。
jpnSearchText:
総支部の見学とか色々聞きたいけど、
向こうが落ち着くまで控えるよ。

engChrName: I get it, though. They have bigger things to deal with—and I'm not a kid anymore, so I don't need adults following me around.
engSearchText:
I get it, though. They have bigger things to deal
with—and I'm not a kid anymore, so I don't need
adults following me around.
jpnChrName: オレももうガキじゃねぇんだ、 向こうの事情くらい汲まねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
オレももうガキじゃねぇんだ、
向こうの事情くらい汲まねぇとな。

engChrName: *sigh* I really made a mess of this...
engSearchText: *sigh* I really made a mess of this...
jpnChrName: はぁ……まさかあそこで しくじっちまうなんてな……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……まさかあそこで
しくじっちまうなんてな……

engChrName: I'm sorry... Can I ask you to catch Nero for me?
engSearchText: I'm sorry... Can I ask you to catch Nero for me?
jpnChrName: 本当にすまない、兄ちゃん達…… ネロの事を頼んだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
本当にすまない、兄ちゃん達……
ネロの事を頼んだぜ！

engChrName: Don't worry, bud. You just leave it to us. We'll get him.
engSearchText:
Don't worry, bud. You just leave it to us. We'll
get him.
jpnChrName: ああ、後の事は任せておけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、後の事は任せておけ。

engChrName: I could've really wowed Annie if I caught him myself...
engSearchText:
I could've really wowed Annie if I caught
him myself...
jpnChrName: あそこでオレが捕まえられてれば アニーにも自慢できたんだけどなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
あそこでオレが捕まえられてれば
アニーにも自慢できたんだけどなぁ……

engChrName: I guess I still have a long way to go before I can call myself a bracer...
engSearchText:
I guess I still have a long way to go before I can call
myself a bracer...
jpnChrName: 遊撃士みたいに格好良く 決めるのは難しいモンだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士みたいに格好良く
決めるのは難しいモンだぜ……

engChrName: Why do I wanna be a bracer? Well...it's more than just being a big, strong hero for me.
engSearchText:
Why do I wanna be a bracer? Well...it's more than
just being a big, strong hero for me.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士になりたい理由はなぁ…… 正義の味方ってのが一番だけど……
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士になりたい理由はなぁ……
正義の味方ってのが一番だけど……

engChrName: There's someone I like that I wanna protect— someone who's...really cheery, but kinda shy. It's really cute, and...
engSearchText:
There's someone I like that I wanna protect—
someone who's...really cheery, but kinda shy.
It's really cute, and...
jpnChrName: 何つーか、健気だけど妙に自信がない奴が近くに いるし、そいつを守れる力が欲しいっていうか……
jpnSearchText:
何つーか、健気だけど妙に自信がない奴が近くに
いるし、そいつを守れる力が欲しいっていうか……

engChrName: ...Wait, no! That's not—I—you heard nothing!
engSearchText: ...Wait, no! That's not—I—you heard nothing!
jpnChrName: ……って、オレは一体何を口走ってんだ！ い、今のはナシだナシ！
jpnSearchText:
……って、オレは一体何を口走ってんだ！
い、今のはナシだナシ！

engChrName: I-I mean, I like the whole village, and I wanna protect it! She's j-just part of it, y'know?!
engSearchText:
I-I mean, I like the whole village, and I wanna
protect it! She's j-just part of it, y'know?!
jpnChrName: あ、あくまで、あいつを含めて村の 皆を守れたらなって思ってるだけだ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、あくまで、あいつを含めて村の
皆を守れたらなって思ってるだけだ！

engChrName: But then, whenever I ask what it means to be strong, what it means to protect someone...everybody has a different answer.
engSearchText:
But then, whenever I ask what it means to be strong,
what it means to protect someone...everybody has a
different answer.
jpnChrName: でも守るとか強さとか、 そういうのは人それぞれって聞くしな……
jpnSearchText:
でも守るとか強さとか、
そういうのは人それぞれって聞くしな……

engChrName: Sometimes I wonder if becoming a bracer is the right thing to do...
engSearchText:
Sometimes I wonder if becoming a bracer is the right
thing to do...
jpnChrName: たまに、遊撃士になりたいってのが本当に 自分に相応しいのかって思う事もあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
たまに、遊撃士になりたいってのが本当に
自分に相応しいのかって思う事もあるけど……

engChrName: It's just, I feel nervous whenever I question it.
engSearchText: It's just, I feel nervous whenever I question it.
jpnChrName: ンな事で悩んでっから、 変に緊張しちまうのかなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ンな事で悩んでっから、
変に緊張しちまうのかなぁ……

engChrName: Oh, uh, mister? You were talking about helping people out with jobs around the village. Are you a bracer?
engSearchText:
Oh, uh, mister? You were talking about helping
people out with jobs around the village. Are you
a bracer?
jpnChrName: 兄ちゃん、村の皆が依頼をどうとか 言ってたけど、遊撃士なのか？
jpnSearchText:
兄ちゃん、村の皆が依頼をどうとか
言ってたけど、遊撃士なのか？

engChrName: I wanna be a bracer, too!
engSearchText: I wanna be a bracer, too!
jpnChrName: 実はオレも遊撃士になりたいと思ってて……
jpnSearchText: 実はオレも遊撃士になりたいと思ってて……

engChrName: Huh. I give off that vibe?
engSearchText: Huh. I give off that vibe?
jpnChrName: おっ、そう見えるか？
jpnSearchText: おっ、そう見えるか？

engChrName: Good to know I can pull that off.
engSearchText: Good to know I can pull that off.
jpnChrName: なら色々と誤魔化す時に役立ったりしてな。
jpnSearchText: なら色々と誤魔化す時に役立ったりしてな。

engChrName: Wait, so you're not?
engSearchText: Wait, so you're not?
jpnChrName: って事は違うのか？
jpnSearchText: って事は違うのか？

engChrName: ...Actually, yeah, on second thought, you'd be kinda cold and creepy for a bracer.
engSearchText:
...Actually, yeah, on second thought, you'd be kinda
cold and creepy for a bracer.
jpnChrName: まあ、言われてみりゃ遊撃士にしては なーんか胡散くせぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、言われてみりゃ遊撃士にしては
なーんか胡散くせぇしな。

engChrName: Here I was thinking I could ask you about the main guild branch at the capital...
engSearchText:
Here I was thinking I could ask you about the main
guild branch at the capital...
jpnChrName: ちぇっ、遊撃士だったら首都にあるっていう 総支部ってところの話聞きたかったんだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ちぇっ、遊撃士だったら首都にあるっていう
総支部ってところの話聞きたかったんだけどな。

engChrName: Well, I work in the capital, and I do poke my head in there for work sometimes.
engSearchText:
Well, I work in the capital, and I do poke my head in
there for work sometimes.
jpnChrName: 総支部か……まあ、俺も一応は 仕事で顔を出した事ならあるが。
jpnSearchText:
総支部か……まあ、俺も一応は
仕事で顔を出した事ならあるが。

engChrName: Why, you thinkin' about visiting?
engSearchText: Why, you thinkin' about visiting?
jpnChrName: 何だ、見学でもしたいってのか？
jpnSearchText: 何だ、見学でもしたいってのか？

engChrName: I... Yeah! I am!
engSearchText: I... Yeah! I am!
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんだ！
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんだ！

engChrName: I don't wanna just talk the talk. I wanna go learn about the guild and how to join it! The sooner, the better!
engSearchText:
I don't wanna just talk the talk. I wanna go learn
about the guild and how to join it! The sooner,
the better!
jpnChrName: オレ、口だけの男じゃねぇし、見学とか 試験制度聞くとかそろそろしときてぇんだ！
jpnSearchText:
オレ、口だけの男じゃねぇし、見学とか
試験制度聞くとかそろそろしときてぇんだ！

engChrName: Do you know anything about how to join?
engSearchText: Do you know anything about how to join?
jpnChrName: 知ってんなら、教えてくれやしねぇか！？
jpnSearchText: 知ってんなら、教えてくれやしねぇか！？

engChrName: Well, far as I know, they don't really do tours or tryout days or that kinda stuff...
engSearchText:
Well, far as I know, they don't really do tours or
tryout days or that kinda stuff...
jpnChrName: まあ、決まった見学日とかはねぇが……
jpnSearchText: まあ、決まった見学日とかはねぇが……

engChrName: You just walk in and say, 'Hey, I wanna be a bracer!', and if they got room, they'll train you.
engSearchText:
You just walk in and say, 'Hey, I wanna be a bracer!',
and if they got room, they'll train you.
jpnChrName: 連中の流儀からして、予定が合えば 来る者拒まずって感じだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
連中の流儀からして、予定が合えば
来る者拒まずって感じだろうな。

engChrName: Hell, you could probably walk in right now, long as they're not too busy.
engSearchText:
Hell, you could probably walk in right now, long as
they're not too busy.
jpnChrName: 予定さえ合えば邪険には しないでくれると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
予定さえ合えば邪険には
しないでくれると思うぜ。

engChrName: Really? I'd better hurry, then—I don't wanna miss out!
engSearchText:
Really? I'd better hurry, then—I don't wanna
miss out!
jpnChrName: マジか、そうと決まれば、 誰かが首都に行く時にでも……
jpnSearchText:
マジか、そうと決まれば、
誰かが首都に行く時にでも……

engChrName: Thanks, mister! I wanna visit as soon as I can!
engSearchText: Thanks, mister! I wanna visit as soon as I can!
jpnChrName: あんがとな兄ちゃん！ 今度行ってみるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
あんがとな兄ちゃん！
今度行ってみるぜ！

engChrName: Man, Annie's really mature for her age.
engSearchText: Man, Annie's really mature for her age.
jpnChrName: それにしても……アニーは立派だよなぁ。
jpnSearchText: それにしても……アニーは立派だよなぁ。

engChrName: It's the way she's always looking after her brother, you know? That kid's a handful, but she keeps him in check.
engSearchText:
It's the way she's always looking after her brother,
you know? That kid's a handful, but she keeps him
in check.
jpnChrName: あのやんちゃな弟もちゃんと面倒見ていて……
jpnSearchText: あのやんちゃな弟もちゃんと面倒見ていて……

engChrName: People say she's 'soft' and stuff, but I think she's just humble. She's really strong when she wants to be.
engSearchText:
People say she's 'soft' and stuff, but I think she's
just humble. She's really strong when she wants to be.
jpnChrName: 気弱そうとか言われる事もあるけど、 芯が強くなきゃ務まらないよ。
jpnSearchText:
気弱そうとか言われる事もあるけど、
芯が強くなきゃ務まらないよ。

engChrName: I wanna grow up to be strong, too. For her—I mean, everyone's sake!
engSearchText:
I wanna grow up to be strong, too. For her—I mean,
everyone's sake!
jpnChrName: ……オレもオレなりに強くなって、 人のためにならねぇと。
jpnSearchText:
……オレもオレなりに強くなって、
人のためにならねぇと。

engChrName: Ah! You caught me just as I was closing. Is there something you need?
engSearchText:
Ah! You caught me just as I was closing. Is there
something you need?
jpnChrName: あら、もう店仕舞いをする ところだけど、何か必要かしら？
jpnSearchText:
あら、もう店仕舞いをする
ところだけど、何か必要かしら？

engChrName: You can be my last customer for the day.
engSearchText: You can be my last customer for the day.
jpnChrName: 片付けが終わる前なら、買っても良いわよ。
jpnSearchText: 片付けが終わる前なら、買っても良いわよ。

engChrName: Heehee... I'm willing to bet most big city shops would just boot you out. They're all business and no personality, aren't they?
engSearchText:
Heehee... I'm willing to bet most big city shops would
just boot you out. They're all business and no
personality, aren't they?
jpnChrName: ふふ、なかなか都会だと こういう融通も難しいんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、なかなか都会だと
こういう融通も難しいんじゃない？

engChrName: I'm in no rush. Take what time you need.
engSearchText: I'm in no rush. Take what time you need.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、しばらく待ってるわね。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、しばらく待ってるわね。

engChrName: I don't have much to do back home, so there's nothing waiting on me.
engSearchText:
I don't have much to do back home, so there's
nothing waiting on me.
jpnChrName: どうせ家に帰っても暇だし 気にしないでいいわよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ家に帰っても暇だし
気にしないでいいわよ。

engChrName: It's been some time since my husband passed on...but I'm still kicking, selling the vegetables he used to grow with his old friends.
engSearchText:
It's been some time since my husband passed on...but
I'm still kicking, selling the vegetables he used to
grow with his old friends.
jpnChrName: 夫には先立たれたけど……彼が一緒に 汗を流した人たちの野菜を売っているの。
jpnSearchText:
夫には先立たれたけど……彼が一緒に
汗を流した人たちの野菜を売っているの。

engChrName: It keeps him in my mind, this shop and these veggies, even if he's not with me anymore.
engSearchText:
It keeps him in my mind, this shop and these veggies,
even if he's not with me anymore.
jpnChrName: そうすると、何か彼とまだ繋がって いられるような気がしてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そうすると、何か彼とまだ繋がって
いられるような気がしてねぇ。

engChrName: And the village gets a kick out of my little handicrafts, too.
engSearchText:
And the village gets a kick out of my little
handicrafts, too.
jpnChrName: 野菜だけでなく、気晴らしに作った 手作りの品も皆が褒めてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
野菜だけでなく、気晴らしに作った
手作りの品も皆が褒めてくれて……

engChrName: It's not a bad way to spend my twilight years.
engSearchText: It's not a bad way to spend my twilight years.
jpnChrName: これはこれで、良い余生かも知れないわねぇ。
jpnSearchText: これはこれで、良い余生かも知れないわねぇ。

engChrName: Hello there. How may I help you?
engSearchText: Hello there. How may I help you?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、お買い物かしら。
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃい、お買い物かしら。

engChrName: Our veggies are still good in the city, of course, just not as fresh. They're their best when you buy them here, straight from the farm.
engSearchText:
Our veggies are still good in the city, of course, just
not as fresh. They're their best when you buy them
here, straight from the farm.
jpnChrName: この村の野菜は街でも評判だけど、やっぱり 土の匂いがするくらいの採れたてが一番よ。
jpnSearchText:
この村の野菜は街でも評判だけど、やっぱり
土の匂いがするくらいの採れたてが一番よ。

engChrName: I sell produce direct from the farmers, so you're getting the freshest possible veggies.
engSearchText:
I sell produce direct from the farmers, so you're
getting the freshest possible veggies.
jpnChrName: ここで直売をしているから、良かったら 買って行ってもらえると嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ここで直売をしているから、良かったら
買って行ってもらえると嬉しいわ。

engChrName: Oh, and just so you're aware, I have a few sweets in stock as well.
engSearchText:
Oh, and just so you're aware, I have a few
sweets in stock as well.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、野菜以外にも いくらかお菓子を売っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、野菜以外にも
いくらかお菓子を売っているわ。

engChrName: I started baking cookies for fun a little while ago. It's nice to be able to use the village's own produce for cooking.
engSearchText:
I started baking cookies for fun a little while ago.
It's nice to be able to use the village's own produce
for cooking.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私が趣味で焼いたクッキーでねぇ、 村の作物も有難く使わせてもらってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私が趣味で焼いたクッキーでねぇ、
村の作物も有難く使わせてもらってるわ。

engChrName: My grandson's always tellin' me that I shouldn't stay open so late...
engSearchText:
My grandson's always tellin' me that I shouldn't stay
open so late...
jpnChrName: 孫は、夕方には店を閉めろと 小うるさく言うが……
jpnSearchText:
孫は、夕方には店を閉めろと
小うるさく言うが……

engChrName: ...but sometimes you get good customers at night, like that beauty who stopped by just a bit ago.
engSearchText:
...but sometimes you get good customers at night, like
that beauty who stopped by just a bit ago.
jpnChrName: こないだのべっぴんさんみたいに、 遅い時間にも来る客はおるんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
こないだのべっぴんさんみたいに、
遅い時間にも来る客はおるんじゃ。

engChrName: Besides, I can still run the shop, so what's the harm in runnin' it late?
engSearchText:
Besides, I can still run the shop, so what's the harm in
runnin' it late?
jpnChrName: 店が必要とされておるなら、 開けておくべきじゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
店が必要とされておるなら、
開けておくべきじゃろう。

engChrName: Ain't no one gonna tell ol' Focken how to run his shop, no sir!
engSearchText:
Ain't no one gonna tell ol' Focken how to run his
shop, no sir!
jpnChrName: このフォッケン、老いたと言えど、 商人の矜持までは忘れとらんわい。
jpnSearchText:
このフォッケン、老いたと言えど、
商人の矜持までは忘れとらんわい。

engChrName: ...That said, it does stretch me a bit thin sometimes. There's only so much we can do, just the two of us.
engSearchText:
...That said, it does stretch me a bit thin sometimes.
There's only so much we can do, just the two of us.
jpnChrName: ……じゃが、二人では限界があるのも事実じゃ。
jpnSearchText: ……じゃが、二人では限界があるのも事実じゃ。

engChrName: It was a lot easier back when my son and his wife were here to split up the workload...
engSearchText:
It was a lot easier back when my son and his wife
were here to split up the workload...
jpnChrName: 息子夫婦がいた時は上手い具合に 分担しとったが……
jpnSearchText:
息子夫婦がいた時は上手い具合に
分担しとったが……

engChrName: I just wish my grandson would find himself a good lady. That'd put me at ease.
engSearchText:
I just wish my grandson would find himself a
good lady. That'd put me at ease.
jpnChrName: せめて孫が良い嫁さんでも貰ってくれれば、 ワシも安心できるんじゃがのう。
jpnSearchText:
せめて孫が良い嫁さんでも貰ってくれれば、
ワシも安心できるんじゃがのう。

engChrName: Man, I... Phew. Wasn't expecting I'd struggle to read my own ledger.
engSearchText:
Man, I... Phew. Wasn't expecting I'd struggle to read
my own ledger.
jpnChrName: うーむ……よもやいつの間にか、 帳簿すら読めなくなっておるとは……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ……よもやいつの間にか、
帳簿すら読めなくなっておるとは……

engChrName: Father Time's takin' me to task, I reckon.
engSearchText: Father Time's takin' me to task, I reckon.
jpnChrName: ワシも老いたもんじゃ、哀しいのう。
jpnSearchText: ワシも老いたもんじゃ、哀しいのう。

engChrName: I'm just glad I have such a good grandson...
engSearchText: I'm just glad I have such a good grandson...
jpnChrName: そして持つべきは出来た孫じゃな……
jpnSearchText: そして持つべきは出来た孫じゃな……

engChrName: ...Ah. Sorry, I was just lost in thought, there.
engSearchText: ...Ah. Sorry, I was just lost in thought, there.
jpnChrName: ……おお、すまんすまん。 ちょいと呆けておったわい。
jpnSearchText:
……おお、すまんすまん。
ちょいと呆けておったわい。

engChrName: Now, I don't think I've seen you around... Are you a traveler, or did I just forget your face?
engSearchText:
Now, I don't think I've seen you around... Are you a
traveler, or did I just forget your face?
jpnChrName: はて、見ない顔のお客じゃな…… 旅の人か、ワシが忘れとるだけか……
jpnSearchText:
はて、見ない顔のお客じゃな……
旅の人か、ワシが忘れとるだけか……

engChrName: Oh, don't mind us, pops. We're just asking around about some stuff.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mind us, pops. We're just asking around
about some stuff.
jpnChrName: あー、邪魔して悪いな爺さん。 ちょっと調べてることがあるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
あー、邪魔して悪いな爺さん。
ちょっと調べてることがあるんだが……

engChrName: You remember anything about a group of jaegers who stopped by a while back?
engSearchText:
You remember anything about a group of jaegers who
stopped by a while back?
jpnChrName: 少し前に村に来た猟兵団について 覚えている事は無いか？
jpnSearchText:
少し前に村に来た猟兵団について
覚えている事は無いか？

engChrName: Jaegers...? Well, yes, that does ring a bell... Some of 'em came by the shop, I think.
engSearchText:
Jaegers...? Well, yes, that does ring a bell... Some of
'em came by the shop, I think.
jpnChrName: 猟兵な……店には来た気がするが…… はて、いつの事じゃったかのう。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵な……店には来た気がするが……
はて、いつの事じゃったかのう。

engChrName: That was the week before... Oh, no, never mind, I think that was someone else.
engSearchText:
That was the week before... Oh, no, never mind, I
think that was someone else.
jpnChrName: 先々週の後も来たような…… いや、他の者じゃったような……
jpnSearchText:
先々週の後も来たような……
いや、他の者じゃったような……

engChrName: Hrm... The more I try to remember, the more foggy it gets. I don't think I'll be much help, sorry...
engSearchText:
Hrm... The more I try to remember, the more foggy
it gets. I don't think I'll be much help, sorry...
jpnChrName: うーむ、すまんな、思い出せるかと 思ったんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、すまんな、思い出せるかと
思ったんじゃが……

engChrName: Nah, don't sweat it. We'll loop back with you later.
engSearchText: Nah, don't sweat it. We'll loop back with you later.
jpnChrName: まあ、急ぎでもねぇし、 後で改めて聞いてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、急ぎでもねぇし、
後で改めて聞いてみるか。

engChrName: Sometimes it just pops back into your head like that, y'know?
engSearchText:
Sometimes it just pops back into your head like
that, y'know?
jpnChrName: こういうのは案外、ふとした拍子に 思い出したりするもんだしな。
jpnSearchText:
こういうのは案外、ふとした拍子に
思い出したりするもんだしな。

engChrName: I'm sorry, young'un. I'm just too much of an old fogey to remember things clearly.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, young'un. I'm just too much of an old fogey
to remember things clearly.
jpnChrName: すまんのう……最近は思い出すのに 時間がかかるんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
すまんのう……最近は思い出すのに
時間がかかるんじゃ……

engChrName: I've been really foggy lately. Sometimes I can remember if I think on it real hard, but still...
engSearchText:
I've been really foggy lately. Sometimes I can
remember if I think on it real hard, but still...
jpnChrName: 最近は物忘れが激しくてのう。 急に思い出す事もあるんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
最近は物忘れが激しくてのう。
急に思い出す事もあるんじゃが……

engChrName: But I can still work a cash register, eh? Just tell me what you need and I'll get it for you.
engSearchText:
But I can still work a cash register, eh? Just tell me
what you need and I'll get it for you.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、流石にミラの勘定くらいは覚えとる。 欲しいものがあれば言っとくれ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、流石にミラの勘定くらいは覚えとる。
欲しいものがあれば言っとくれ。

engChrName: Oh, what can I get you? We're closing soon, just a heads up.
engSearchText:
Oh, what can I get you? We're closing soon, just a
heads up.
jpnChrName: ああ、いらっしゃいませ。 もうすぐ閉店ですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いらっしゃいませ。
もうすぐ閉店ですけどね。

engChrName: Honestly, I'd really rather my grandpa close the shop earlier in the day...
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'd really rather my grandpa close the shop
earlier in the day...
jpnChrName: ……本当は祖父もあんな状態だし、 日が落ちる前に店を閉めたいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
……本当は祖父もあんな状態だし、
日が落ちる前に店を閉めたいんですが……

engChrName: ...but he's a stubborn old codger. It's his way or the highway, and his way is: we're open late.
engSearchText:
...but he's a stubborn old codger. It's his way or the
highway, and his way is: we're open late.
jpnChrName: 当の祖父も拘りが強くて、 夕方以降の営業もしたいようで……
jpnSearchText:
当の祖父も拘りが強くて、
夕方以降の営業もしたいようで……

engChrName: Things were smoother when my parents were here... We gotta jump through hoops a bit when it's just us two.
engSearchText:
Things were smoother when my parents were here...
We gotta jump through hoops a bit when it's just
us two.
jpnChrName: 両親がいたころは皆で上手く回せていたけど…… やっぱり二人きりでは限界を感じます。
jpnSearchText:
両親がいたころは皆で上手く回せていたけど……
やっぱり二人きりでは限界を感じます。

engChrName: He wants me to settle down with a woman, too, but really, who's got time?
engSearchText:
He wants me to settle down with a woman, too, but
really, who's got time?
jpnChrName: はは、お陰で僕も当分の間は、 嫁探しもお預けですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、お陰で僕も当分の間は、
嫁探しもお預けですねぇ。

engChrName: Sorry for the mess right now. I'll have this cleaned up in a sec.
engSearchText:
Sorry for the mess right now. I'll have this cleaned up
in a sec.
jpnChrName: せっかく来てくれたのに 見苦しい所を見せて申し訳ない。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく来てくれたのに
見苦しい所を見せて申し訳ない。

engChrName: Grandpa's really gone downhill since we lost my parents... I can't blame him at all.
engSearchText:
Grandpa's really gone downhill since we lost
my parents... I can't blame him at all.
jpnChrName: 祖父は僕の両親が交通事故で他界してから、 ボケと老眼が進行してしまっていて……
jpnSearchText:
祖父は僕の両親が交通事故で他界してから、
ボケと老眼が進行してしまっていて……

engChrName: I wish I could stick close and help him more, but I have deliveries to make now.
engSearchText:
I wish I could stick close and help him more, but I
have deliveries to make now.
jpnChrName: 本当は近くで常にフォローしたいのですが、 配送の仕事もあるし、どうしても……
jpnSearchText:
本当は近くで常にフォローしたいのですが、
配送の仕事もあるし、どうしても……

engChrName: Hmm? Hold on... I swear I know you from somewhere.
engSearchText:
Hmm? Hold on... I swear I know you
from somewhere.
jpnChrName: あれ……お客さん、 以前どこかでお会いしましたっけ？
jpnSearchText:
あれ……お客さん、
以前どこかでお会いしましたっけ？

engChrName: Have you dropped by our store before? The one right over there.
engSearchText:
Have you dropped by our store before? The one right
over there.
jpnChrName: もしかして、そこにあるうちの店に 前にも来てくれた事がありました？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして、そこにあるうちの店に
前にも来てくれた事がありました？

engChrName: Nope. Never been.
engSearchText: Nope. Never been.
jpnChrName: いや、生憎だが今回が初めてになるな。
jpnSearchText: いや、生憎だが今回が初めてになるな。

engChrName: Really? Coulda sworn I...
engSearchText: Really? Coulda sworn I...
jpnChrName: うーん、でもどこかで……あっ。
jpnSearchText: うーん、でもどこかで……あっ。

engChrName: Oh, wait! You frequent that bistro in Edith's Old Town, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, wait! You frequent that bistro in Edith's Old
Town, right?
jpnChrName: あなたもしかして、よく旧市街の ビストロにいる方じゃないですか？
jpnSearchText:
あなたもしかして、よく旧市街の
ビストロにいる方じゃないですか？

engChrName: They source some of their produce from us, and I'm the delivery guy! Small world, huh?
engSearchText:
They source some of their produce from us, and I'm
the delivery guy! Small world, huh?
jpnChrName: 奇遇ですねぇ、実は僕があのお店に 村の野菜を卸させてもらってまして。
jpnSearchText:
奇遇ですねぇ、実は僕があのお店に
村の野菜を卸させてもらってまして。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Now that you mention it, I remember seein' your truck before.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! Now that you mention it, I remember
seein' your truck before.
jpnChrName: ああ……言われてみればそのトラックから 降りてくるのを見たかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……言われてみればそのトラックから
降りてくるのを見たかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: So the old man gets his veggies from all the way out here, huh? Quite a hike.
engSearchText:
So the old man gets his veggies from all the way out
here, huh? Quite a hike.
jpnChrName: なるほど、あんたがおやっさん拘りの 野菜を届けてくれてたのか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、あんたがおやっさん拘りの
野菜を届けてくれてたのか。

engChrName: That it is. I've been working this job for about a year now.
engSearchText:
That it is. I've been working this job for about a
year now.
jpnChrName: そうなんですよ、まだ担当して 一年くらいですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですよ、まだ担当して
一年くらいですけどね。

engChrName: I never got the chance to say hi in Edith, but if we run into each other again, feel free to chat me up!
engSearchText:
I never got the chance to say hi in Edith, but if we
run into each other again, feel free to chat me up!
jpnChrName: 今まではあまり時間が合わなかったんですかね。 今度見かけたらお声をかけますよ。
jpnSearchText:
今まではあまり時間が合わなかったんですかね。
今度見かけたらお声をかけますよ。

engChrName: It's always nice to meet customers, clients, and customers of clients, haha!
engSearchText:
It's always nice to meet customers, clients, and
customers of clients, haha!
jpnChrName: うちのお得意先の常連さんに偶然会うとは、 何となく気分が良いですね……
jpnSearchText:
うちのお得意先の常連さんに偶然会うとは、
何となく気分が良いですね……

engChrName: It's tough work, though, not gonna lie. I get now why my parents prioritized finding a job they loved over a job that paid.
engSearchText:
It's tough work, though, not gonna lie. I get now why
my parents prioritized finding a job they loved over a
job that paid.
jpnChrName: キツい仕事だと思ってましたが、生前両親が やりがいを感じてたのは、こういう事なのですかね。
jpnSearchText:
キツい仕事だと思ってましたが、生前両親が
やりがいを感じてたのは、こういう事なのですかね。

engChrName: Something seemed off about that jaeger who dropped by...
engSearchText:
Something seemed off about that jaeger who
dropped by...
jpnChrName: さっき顔を出した猟兵の女…… 一体どうしたっていうんだ？
jpnSearchText:
さっき顔を出した猟兵の女……
一体どうしたっていうんだ？

engChrName: Pretty sure the rest of her group's moved way on by now, so why'd she take a detour all the way out here? It just doesn't add up...
engSearchText:
Pretty sure the rest of her group's moved way on by
now, so why'd she take a detour all the way out here?
It just doesn't add up...
jpnChrName: まあ、だいぶ前に村を経った後、ちょくちょく 姿を見せてたって言うし訳ありとは思ってたが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、だいぶ前に村を経った後、ちょくちょく
姿を見せてたって言うし訳ありとは思ってたが……

engChrName: I'm not about to stick my nose in that, though. You'd best steer clear of her, too, unless you're looking for trouble.
engSearchText:
I'm not about to stick my nose in that, though.
You'd best steer clear of her, too, unless you're
looking for trouble.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、あんたらも訳ありな事に 首を突っ込むなら気をつけろよ？
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、あんたらも訳ありな事に
首を突っ込むなら気をつけろよ？

engChrName: I helped serve meals over at the village hall. It's a relief to see them adjusting well and settling in, in spite of everything.
engSearchText:
I helped serve meals over at the village hall. It's a
relief to see them adjusting well and settling in, in
spite of everything.
jpnChrName: さっき集会所の方にも晩飯を届けに行ったが、 皆それなりに休めてそうで一安心だ。
jpnSearchText:
さっき集会所の方にも晩飯を届けに行ったが、
皆それなりに休めてそうで一安心だ。

engChrName: I can't help but feel like we were missing somebody, though... Somebody big.
engSearchText:
I can't help but feel like we were missing
somebody, though... Somebody big.
jpnChrName: だが、誰だったか目立つ奴が いなくなってる気もするんだが……
jpnSearchText:
だが、誰だったか目立つ奴が
いなくなってる気もするんだが……

engChrName: Eh, maybe it's just my mind playing tricks on me.
engSearchText: Eh, maybe it's just my mind playing tricks on me.
jpnChrName: 俺の思い違いかね？
jpnSearchText: 俺の思い違いかね？

engChrName: That guy in the shades, he sticks out like a real sore thumb.
engSearchText:
That guy in the shades, he sticks out like a real
sore thumb.
jpnChrName: ところであっちのグラサンの兄ちゃん、 稀に見る良い飲みっぷりだが……
jpnSearchText:
ところであっちのグラサンの兄ちゃん、
稀に見る良い飲みっぷりだが……

engChrName: I can tell he's no average Joe just by the way he drinks. It's like he has a stranglehold on the room, even more than the typical jaeger does.
engSearchText:
I can tell he's no average Joe just by the way
he drinks. It's like he has a stranglehold on the room,
even more than the typical jaeger does.
jpnChrName: どうにもタダ者じゃなさそうだな、 ありゃ猟兵どころの比じゃねぇ気迫だ。
jpnSearchText:
どうにもタダ者じゃなさそうだな、
ありゃ猟兵どころの比じゃねぇ気迫だ。

engChrName: But, well...I gotta treat him like any other customer, for now. If he's buying, I'm selling.
engSearchText:
But, well...I gotta treat him like any other customer,
for now. If he's buying, I'm selling.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、今は客に違いねぇ。 店にいる間はきっちりサービスするまでよ。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、今は客に違いねぇ。
店にいる間はきっちりサービスするまでよ。

engChrName: Guess the bus is stopped here for the night—safety first, and all that. I can put up some of the passengers here, at least.
engSearchText:
Guess the bus is stopped here for the night—safety
first, and all that. I can put up some of the passengers
here, at least.
jpnChrName: 結局、バスは安全のために明日出るってな。 お客のうちの何人かはうちに泊めるが……
jpnSearchText:
結局、バスは安全のために明日出るってな。
お客のうちの何人かはうちに泊めるが……

engChrName: Every cloud has a silver lining: this impromptu stop might convince some of them to come back. That'd be nice, eh?
engSearchText:
Every cloud has a silver lining: this impromptu stop
might convince some of them to come back.
That'd be nice, eh?
jpnChrName: 一期一会っていうしな、これも何かの 縁と思って、また来てくれると嬉しいね。
jpnSearchText:
一期一会っていうしな、これも何かの
縁と思って、また来てくれると嬉しいね。

engChrName: And I appreciate having some fresh faces to talk to, at any rate. It's always nice to make some new connections.
engSearchText:
And I appreciate having some fresh faces to talk to, at
any rate. It's always nice to make some
new connections.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも俺は、こういう場合でも 縁は大切にしていきたい流儀だからよ。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも俺は、こういう場合でも
縁は大切にしていきたい流儀だからよ。

engChrName: The passengers have made this our busiest night in weeks, in fact.
engSearchText:
The passengers have made this our busiest night in
weeks, in fact.
jpnChrName: バス客の分、先々週の ご一行の時以来に繁盛したが……
jpnSearchText:
バス客の分、先々週の
ご一行の時以来に繁盛したが……

engChrName: My daughter's really taking it in stride—she hasn't skipped a beat! Makes me proud to have such a hard-working kid.
engSearchText:
My daughter's really taking it in stride—she hasn't
skipped a beat! Makes me proud to have such a
hard-working kid.
jpnChrName: 娘は顔色も変えずよくやってくれてる、 出来た娘を持てて本当に良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
娘は顔色も変えずよくやってくれてる、
出来た娘を持てて本当に良かったぜ。

engChrName: Thanks for coming. How'd you like the galettes?
engSearchText: Thanks for coming. How'd you like the galettes?
jpnChrName: まいどあり、ガレットは美味かったか？
jpnSearchText: まいどあり、ガレットは美味かったか？

engChrName: I've got my signature dish on the menu this evening, so if you're gonna stay the night, drop by here for dinner, yeah?
engSearchText:
I've got my signature dish on the menu this evening,
so if you're gonna stay the night, drop by here for
dinner, yeah?
jpnChrName: 夜もまた違った絶品料理を出すから、 泊まるなら晩飯もうちで食うと良いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
夜もまた違った絶品料理を出すから、
泊まるなら晩飯もうちで食うと良いぜ。

engChrName: I get this was pretty scary for those passengers...but I think they'll be able to relax now with their stomachs full.
engSearchText:
I get this was pretty scary for those passengers...but I
think they'll be able to relax now with their
stomachs full.
jpnChrName: まあ、バスの人らも災難だったが…… とりあえず飯食って落ち着いてもらいたいね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、バスの人らも災難だったが……
とりあえず飯食って落ち着いてもらいたいね。

engChrName: My daughter's been baking galettes practically every chance she can get lately.
engSearchText:
My daughter's been baking galettes practically
every chance she can get lately.
jpnChrName: そういや、うちの自慢のガレットだが、 最近は娘も焼く事が増えてきてな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、うちの自慢のガレットだが、
最近は娘も焼く事が増えてきてな。

engChrName: At this rate, she'll be a better chef than me in no time. Well, good for her! I'm excited to see how good she'll get.
engSearchText:
At this rate, she'll be a better chef than me in no
time. Well, good for her! I'm excited to see how
good she'll get.
jpnChrName: 早くも俺より上手くなりそうな気配だ、 後々が楽しみだな。
jpnSearchText:
早くも俺より上手くなりそうな気配だ、
後々が楽しみだな。

engChrName: I'm not sure what was up with that woman. She seemed on edge, for whatever reason.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure what was up with that woman.
She seemed on edge, for whatever reason.
jpnChrName: あのお姉さん……随分と 思い詰めた雰囲気だったような……
jpnSearchText:
あのお姉さん……随分と
思い詰めた雰囲気だったような……

engChrName: I make a point of keeping out of other people's business, but I couldn't help picking up on her.
engSearchText:
I make a point of keeping out of other people's
business, but I couldn't help picking up on her.
jpnChrName: ああいう人達の事情には立ち入らないように してきたけど、流石に心配というか……
jpnSearchText:
ああいう人達の事情には立ち入らないように
してきたけど、流石に心配というか……

engChrName: I'm not sure what happened or what she's so worried about, but, uhh...if you decide to help her out, lemme know, will you?
engSearchText:
I'm not sure what happened or what she's so worried
about, but, uhh...if you decide to help her out, lemme
know, will you?
jpnChrName: 何があったのかは分からないけど…… ゴメン、そっちはどうかお願いね……！
jpnSearchText:
何があったのかは分からないけど……
ゴメン、そっちはどうかお願いね……！

engChrName: We're just now hitting peak hours, despite all the commotion earlier in the day.
engSearchText:
We're just now hitting peak hours, despite all the
commotion earlier in the day.
jpnChrName: 今日は色々あったけど、 宿酒場の給仕としてはここからが本番だよ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は色々あったけど、
宿酒場の給仕としてはここからが本番だよ。

engChrName: Those passengers don't hold a candle to the usual suspects we get in the evening.
engSearchText:
Those passengers don't hold a candle to the usual
suspects we get in the evening.
jpnChrName: 昼間もそれなりにドタバタしてたけど、 酔っ払い共の相手に比べれば楽なもの。
jpnSearchText:
昼間もそれなりにドタバタしてたけど、
酔っ払い共の相手に比べれば楽なもの。

engChrName: It's kinda funny. Dad heaps praise on me for holding down the fort when it's busy, but he doesn't bat an eye at how well I handle the rowdier regulars.
engSearchText:
It's kinda funny. Dad heaps praise on me for holding
down the fort when it's busy, but he doesn't bat an
eye at how well I handle the rowdier regulars.
jpnChrName: ……なのにパパ、混んでる時の仕事は褒めても、 毎晩の酔っ払い対応は褒めてくれなくてさ。
jpnSearchText:
……なのにパパ、混んでる時の仕事は褒めても、
毎晩の酔っ払い対応は褒めてくれなくてさ。

engChrName: I dunno if he just expects that out of me, or if he's easier on them because they're all his age.
engSearchText:
I dunno if he just expects that out of me, or if he's
easier on them because they're all his age.
jpnChrName: 世代的にオヤジ連中に感情移入しちゃうのかな。 それとも、もはや当たり前の事だから？
jpnSearchText:
世代的にオヤジ連中に感情移入しちゃうのかな。
それとも、もはや当たり前の事だから？

engChrName: Yeeeah, figures the barflies are buzzing tonight.
engSearchText: Yeeeah, figures the barflies are buzzing tonight.
jpnChrName: まあ今夜が大変なのはわかってたよ。
jpnSearchText: まあ今夜が大変なのはわかってたよ。

engChrName: They always rile themselves up whenever something happens during the day.
engSearchText:
They always rile themselves up whenever something
happens during the day.
jpnChrName: 昼間に何かあると、その夜のオヤジ共の 馬鹿騒ぎは勢いを増すもんだしね。
jpnSearchText:
昼間に何かあると、その夜のオヤジ共の
馬鹿騒ぎは勢いを増すもんだしね。

engChrName: Now, I can still keep a handle on 'em, of course.
engSearchText: Now, I can still keep a handle on 'em, of course.
jpnChrName: まあ、それでも捌ける自信は普通にあるけどね。
jpnSearchText: まあ、それでも捌ける自信は普通にあるけどね。

engChrName: We had some real colorful customers around this time last year... For some reason, they stuck out to me.
engSearchText:
We had some real colorful customers around this time
last year... For some reason, they stuck out to me.
jpnChrName: 今でも何故か鮮明に覚えてるんだけど、 去年にやたら印象的なお客が来てね。
jpnSearchText:
今でも何故か鮮明に覚えてるんだけど、
去年にやたら印象的なお客が来てね。

engChrName: There was a girl who just about wolfed down the ENTIRE bar. Then there was this blond pretty boy—the whole place stopped when he walked in.
engSearchText:
There was a girl who just about wolfed down the
ENTIRE bar. Then there was this blond pretty
boy—the whole place stopped when he walked in.
jpnChrName: 不思議なほど大食いの女の子と、 やたらオーラのある金髪のイケメンでさ。
jpnSearchText:
不思議なほど大食いの女の子と、
やたらオーラのある金髪のイケメンでさ。

engChrName: I don't think they were related, whoever they were... but I swear, I saw the guy somewhere before.
engSearchText:
I don't think they were related, whoever they were...
but I swear, I saw the guy somewhere before.
jpnChrName: 兄妹って訳でもなさそうだったけど…… イケメンの方は何か見覚えあるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
兄妹って訳でもなさそうだったけど……
イケメンの方は何か見覚えあるんだよね。

engChrName: I recall there was this other bunch, too, a group of four, and they had not a thing in common.
engSearchText:
I recall there was this other bunch, too, a group of
four, and they had not a thing in common.
jpnChrName: そういえば他にも、対照的な雰囲気の 男の子と女の子も一緒にいたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば他にも、対照的な雰囲気の
男の子と女の子も一緒にいたっけ。

engChrName: I can't imagine how they all got together with so little common ground...at least, from my point of view.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine how they all got together with so little
common ground...at least, from my point of view.
jpnChrName: 同じグループっぽかったけど、 四人はどんな関係だったのかな……
jpnSearchText:
同じグループっぽかったけど、
四人はどんな関係だったのかな……

engChrName: We get plenty of those flavorful types around here, so I guess I've gotten used to it.
engSearchText:
We get plenty of those flavorful types around here, so
I guess I've gotten used to it.
jpnChrName: あの手の人たちが村に寄る事はちょくちょく あるし、皆意外と慣れてるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
あの手の人たちが村に寄る事はちょくちょく
あるし、皆意外と慣れてるんだよね。

engChrName: Who knows? Maybe that lady and I would've gotten along, had I gotten the chance to talk with her.
engSearchText:
Who knows? Maybe that lady and I would've gotten
along, had I gotten the chance to talk with her.
jpnChrName: 例のお姉さんとは、あたしも ちょっと仲良くなれそうだったしね。
jpnSearchText:
例のお姉さんとは、あたしも
ちょっと仲良くなれそうだったしね。

engChrName: Oh, right. If you happen to need some orbment work done, we can help you out with that. Our workshop's every bit as good as the big boys!
engSearchText:
Oh, right. If you happen to need some orbment work
done, we can help you out with that. Our workshop's
every bit as good as the big boys!
jpnChrName: ところでオーブメントの調整とかで困ってない？ 田舎だけど、ちゃんと工房はあるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ところでオーブメントの調整とかで困ってない？
田舎だけど、ちゃんと工房はあるよ。

engChrName: The boss has his hands full with the bus, but my friend works there as his understudy. She's pretty good!
engSearchText:
The boss has his hands full with the bus, but my
friend works there as his understudy. She's
pretty good!
jpnChrName: 親方はバス修理に専念してそうだけど、店番してる あたしの友達も良い腕前だから安心してね。
jpnSearchText:
親方はバス修理に専念してそうだけど、店番してる
あたしの友達も良い腕前だから安心してね。

engChrName: I like to think I'm well traveled, but out here, I'm picking up on a lot of things I never gave much thought in the city.
engSearchText:
I like to think I'm well traveled, but out here, I'm
picking up on a lot of things I never gave much
thought in the city.
jpnChrName: 普段の都会と都会を行き来する仕事の中では なかなか無い、参考になる話を多く聞けたよ。
jpnSearchText:
普段の都会と都会を行き来する仕事の中では
なかなか無い、参考になる話を多く聞けたよ。

engChrName: The farmers swear by fresh produce—they say it does wonders for your health. I then met an older man who...could use that advice. Or some supplements.
engSearchText:
The farmers swear by fresh produce—they say it does
wonders for your health. I then met an older man
who...could use that advice. Or some supplements.
jpnChrName: 農民の人たちの元気の秘訣なんかもそうだし、 逆にサプリを勧めたい御仁も雑貨屋にいた。
jpnSearchText:
農民の人たちの元気の秘訣なんかもそうだし、
逆にサプリを勧めたい御仁も雑貨屋にいた。

engChrName: It's interesting to hear their takes on healthy living. Perhaps this was what the bartender meant by 'making connections'?
engSearchText:
It's interesting to hear their takes on healthy living.
Perhaps this was what the bartender meant by
'making connections'?
jpnChrName: はは、寄った村でこうも色々発見があるとは。 確かに、宿のご主人が言う縁というやつかもな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、寄った村でこうも色々発見があるとは。
確かに、宿のご主人が言う縁というやつかもな。

engChrName: I thought I might be able to bring my market to the village...but I might end up borrowing from its own market instead!
engSearchText:
I thought I might be able to bring my market to the
village...but I might end up borrowing from its own
market instead!
jpnChrName: 市場開拓のつもりで村を見ていたが、 むしろ逆の収穫もあったよ。
jpnSearchText:
市場開拓のつもりで村を見ていたが、
むしろ逆の収穫もあったよ。

engChrName: Fresh vegetables, royal jelly... They have a lot of things that I could work into my supplements.
engSearchText:
Fresh vegetables, royal jelly... They have a lot of
things that I could work into my supplements.
jpnChrName: 栄養価の高い野菜やロイヤルゼリー…… 自然派サプリに使えそうなものも多い。
jpnSearchText:
栄養価の高い野菜やロイヤルゼリー……
自然派サプリに使えそうなものも多い。

engChrName: My company's gone all in on Eastern herbal medicine, and it's really hurting us. This village has perfectly good ingredients that we're just ignoring.
engSearchText:
My company's gone all in on Eastern herbal
medicine, and it's really hurting us. This village has
perfectly good ingredients that we're just ignoring.
jpnChrName: 本社は東方の生薬に拘り過ぎて視野が狭い…… だからこの村の資源を見落としたのだな。
jpnSearchText:
本社は東方の生薬に拘り過ぎて視野が狭い……
だからこの村の資源を見落としたのだな。

engChrName: I'm headed to Remiferia for a business meeting regarding nutritional supplements.
engSearchText:
I'm headed to Remiferia for a business meeting
regarding nutritional supplements.
jpnChrName: 自分はレミフェリアの方で、 栄養サプリ関連の商談を控えていてね……
jpnSearchText:
自分はレミフェリアの方で、
栄養サプリ関連の商談を控えていてね……

engChrName: I was worried this would throw a wrench in things, but thankfully, I got to make some calls at the inn. My hosts in Remiferia were very understanding.
engSearchText:
I was worried this would throw a wrench in things,
but thankfully, I got to make some calls at the inn.
My hosts in Remiferia were very understanding.
jpnChrName: この遅延に最初は焦ったが宿で通信機を借りて、 先方に何とか納得してもらえたよ。
jpnSearchText:
この遅延に最初は焦ったが宿で通信機を借りて、
先方に何とか納得してもらえたよ。

engChrName: Sometimes I wish my boss would be like that... Oh, well.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I wish my boss would be like that...
Oh, well.
jpnChrName: 向こうの人は物分かりが良くて助かるな、 うちの上司にも見習って欲しいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
向こうの人は物分かりが良くて助かるな、
うちの上司にも見習って欲しいものだ。

engChrName: At any rate, it looks like this detour isn't all for naught! Who knows what more I'll find?
engSearchText:
At any rate, it looks like this detour isn't all
for naught! Who knows what more I'll find?
jpnChrName: まあ、時間を無駄にしたくないし、 参考までに村を見て回るとするよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、時間を無駄にしたくないし、
参考までに村を見て回るとするよ。

engChrName: Well, well... You're the last person I thought I'd bump into on my little errand run.
engSearchText:
Well, well... You're the last person I thought I'd
bump into on my little errand run.
jpnChrName: 野暮用でこんな辺鄙な所に来てみりゃ、 まさかお前に出くわすとはなァ。
jpnSearchText:
野暮用でこんな辺鄙な所に来てみりゃ、
まさかお前に出くわすとはなァ。

engChrName: Don't tell me you're still hung up over THAT, now. You never change, do you?
engSearchText:
Don't tell me you're still hung up over THAT, now.
You never change, do you?
jpnChrName: クク、拘（・）り（・）も相変わらずで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: クク、拘（・）り（・）も相変わらずで何よりだ。

engChrName: Shut your filthy mouth. You laid your hands on my baby girl and you chucked her like she was a damn chew toy!
engSearchText:
Shut your filthy mouth. You laid your hands on my
baby girl and you chucked her like she was a damn
chew toy!
jpnChrName: うるせぇ……手間暇かけて育てたアイツを、 単なる鉄屑みたいに扱いやがって。
jpnSearchText:
うるせぇ……手間暇かけて育てたアイツを、
単なる鉄屑みたいに扱いやがって。

engChrName: ...Hmph. Why am I even tryin' to lecture you, anyway? You wouldn't get it—all you do is break shit.
engSearchText:
...Hmph. Why am I even tryin' to lecture
you, anyway? You wouldn't get it—all you do is
break shit.
jpnChrName: 壊し屋のアンタにこの気持ちは 判らねぇだろうがな……
jpnSearchText:
壊し屋のアンタにこの気持ちは
判らねぇだろうがな……

engChrName: Oh, untwist your panties already. Besides, I'm pretty sure you caught a glimpse of my own prized possession earlier.
engSearchText:
Oh, untwist your panties already. Besides, I'm
pretty sure you caught a glimpse of my own prized
possession earlier.
jpnChrName: クク、そう言うなって。 俺も最近、良い“出逢い”があってなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そう言うなって。
俺も最近、良い“出逢い”があってなァ。

engChrName: Now, tell me, would such a terrible person take such good care of it? Hmm?
engSearchText:
Now, tell me, would such a terrible person take such
good care of it? Hmm?
jpnChrName: 案外、もうじきお前の愛着も 分かるようになるかもしれないぜ？
jpnSearchText:
案外、もうじきお前の愛着も
分かるようになるかもしれないぜ？

engChrName: Tch. Of what, your bike?
engSearchText: Tch. Of what, your bike?
jpnChrName: ハッ、あの導力バイクの事か……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、あの導力バイクの事か……

engChrName: It's a nice ride, I'll give you that—you treat your own stuff well, at least.
engSearchText:
It's a nice ride, I'll give you that—you treat your own
stuff well, at least.
jpnChrName: ッたく、人の車を壊しておいて 自分は上等なモンに乗りやがって……
jpnSearchText:
ッたく、人の車を壊しておいて
自分は上等なモンに乗りやがって……

engChrName: But don't think for a second that you're some saint now. You'll never know what that truck meant to me.
engSearchText:
But don't think for a second that you're some
saint now. You'll never know what that truck meant
to me.
jpnChrName: フン、俺はアンタにこの気持ちが 理解できる気はしねぇがな……
jpnSearchText:
フン、俺はアンタにこの気持ちが
理解できる気はしねぇがな……

engChrName: Well, at any rate, I'm not here to dig up old wounds.
engSearchText: Well, at any rate, I'm not here to dig up old wounds.
jpnChrName: まあ、俺もお前らの仕事に 首を突っ込む気はさらさらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、俺もお前らの仕事に
首を突っ込む気はさらさらねぇ。

engChrName: Why make enemies out of allies? It's your choice to be butthurt about it.
engSearchText:
Why make enemies out of allies? It's your choice to
be butthurt about it.
jpnChrName: クク、そう硬くなるな。利害が合えば 手伝うのも満更じゃねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そう硬くなるな。利害が合えば
手伝うのも満更じゃねぇしな。

engChrName: So that jaeger was looking for gas? Huh.
engSearchText: So that jaeger was looking for gas? Huh.
jpnChrName: そうか……あの時、猟兵の人が 買っていったのってガソリンだったのか。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……あの時、猟兵の人が
買っていったのってガソリンだったのか。

engChrName: Beats me why she'd lug all the way out here for gas...
engSearchText: Beats me why she'd lug all the way out here for gas...
jpnChrName: うーん、確かに猟兵の人がガソリンを 調達しにきたってのは初めて聞いたかも……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、確かに猟兵の人がガソリンを
調達しにきたってのは初めて聞いたかも……

engChrName: ...but I guess she had her reasons. You guys are looking for her, I take it?
engSearchText:
...but I guess she had her reasons. You guys are
looking for her, I take it?
jpnChrName: 何か訳アリのようだったけど…… あんた達はあの人を探してるんだよな？
jpnSearchText:
何か訳アリのようだったけど……
あんた達はあの人を探してるんだよな？

engChrName: I'll help however I can.
engSearchText: I'll help however I can.
jpnChrName: あたしらも何か役に立てれば良いんだけど……
jpnSearchText: あたしらも何か役に立てれば良いんだけど……

engChrName: I was just talking to the boss. I wanted to ask what he thought about my career trajectory.
engSearchText:
I was just talking to the boss. I wanted to ask what he
thought about my career trajectory.
jpnChrName: ちなみに今、親方にあたしはまだ 半人前なのかなって聞いてたところでね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに今、親方にあたしはまだ
半人前なのかなって聞いてたところでね。

engChrName: He told me I'm actually doing pretty well! I was kinda worried I was lagging behind.
engSearchText:
He told me I'm actually doing pretty well! I was kinda
worried I was lagging behind.
jpnChrName: むしろ筋が良いって 言われちゃって、少し驚いたよ。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ筋が良いって
言われちゃって、少し驚いたよ。

engChrName: But I have to keep his advice in mind: you have to practice the basics, or you won't have a foundation to build the rest of your skillset on.
engSearchText:
But I have to keep his advice in mind: you have to
practice the basics, or you won't have a foundation to
build the rest of your skillset on.
jpnChrName: 下積みでの学びが足りないと成熟した後で 粗が出る……確かにその通りだよね。
jpnSearchText:
下積みでの学びが足りないと成熟した後で
粗が出る……確かにその通りだよね。

engChrName: He said I might be trying to rush things...and maybe he's right. Maybe I'm still too green for failing to realize that myself...
engSearchText:
He said I might be trying to rush things...and maybe
he's right. Maybe I'm still too green for failing to
realize that myself...
jpnChrName: 確かに親方の言う通り、焦り過ぎてるのかも…… それに気づけないのも経験が浅いからかな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに親方の言う通り、焦り過ぎてるのかも……
それに気づけないのも経験が浅いからかな。

engChrName: So far, I've been doing a lot of the grunt work. Mostly supply runs, as of late.
engSearchText:
So far, I've been doing a lot of the grunt work.
Mostly supply runs, as of late.
jpnChrName: 最近は資材調達やらも一応は 任せて貰えてるんだけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は資材調達やらも一応は
任せて貰えてるんだけどさ。

engChrName: I'd really like to tackle bigger projects soon, like making my own machines from scratch or something!
engSearchText:
I'd really like to tackle bigger projects soon, like
making my own machines from scratch or something!
jpnChrName: あたしとしちゃ、早いところ機械の組み立て やら何やらもやらせて欲しいんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしとしちゃ、早いところ機械の組み立て
やら何やらもやらせて欲しいんだよなぁ。

engChrName: I just feel like I learn by doing, y'know? There are certain skills you can only practice hands-on.
engSearchText:
I just feel like I learn by doing, y'know? There are
certain skills you can only practice hands-on.
jpnChrName: 実際に何かを作ってみなきゃ、 見えてこないモノってあると思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
実際に何かを作ってみなきゃ、
見えてこないモノってあると思うんだ。

engChrName: The boss was pretty receptive to the idea of me taking a trip to Basel, actually.
engSearchText:
The boss was pretty receptive to the idea of me taking
a trip to Basel, actually.
jpnChrName: そういや親方は、バーゼルに見学に行きたいって 行った時は結構賛成してくれてたな……
jpnSearchText:
そういや親方は、バーゼルに見学に行きたいって
行った時は結構賛成してくれてたな……

engChrName: But then, he followed it up with his usual, 'Make sure you're putting your studies first!' schtick.
engSearchText:
But then, he followed it up with his usual, 'Make sure
you're putting your studies first!' schtick.
jpnChrName: 買い付けに行かせてくれた時も 『まずは経験』って言ってたし……
jpnSearchText:
買い付けに行かせてくれた時も
『まずは経験』って言ってたし……

engChrName: I get where he's coming from. I just wonder how much of the basics I have left to learn before I can actually dive in to the nitty-gritty stuff.
engSearchText:
I get where he's coming from. I just wonder how
much of the basics I have left to learn before I can
actually dive in to the nitty-gritty stuff.
jpnChrName: 実際に何か作る前に、とにかく色んなものを 吸収しろって事なのかな？
jpnSearchText:
実際に何か作る前に、とにかく色んなものを
吸収しろって事なのかな？

engChrName: I wanted to help repair the bus, but the boss said no. He ended up working on it by himself.
engSearchText:
I wanted to help repair the bus, but the boss said no.
He ended up working on it by himself.
jpnChrName: 最初はバスの修理もあたしがやろうと思ったけど、 親方が任せてくれなくてさ。
jpnSearchText:
最初はバスの修理もあたしがやろうと思ったけど、
親方が任せてくれなくてさ。

engChrName: I mean, I like to think I'm no greenhorn anymore. He trusts me to go out and buy the materials we need, even.
engSearchText:
I mean, I like to think I'm no greenhorn anymore.
He trusts me to go out and buy the materials we
need, even.
jpnChrName: 資材の買い付けとかやらせてくれてるし、そろそろ 半人前卒業かと思ったのになぁ……
jpnSearchText:
資材の買い付けとかやらせてくれてるし、そろそろ
半人前卒業かと思ったのになぁ……

engChrName: But I wanna do more than that. I wanna do something big, like building my own machines from scratch or putting aftermarket mods on something!
engSearchText:
But I wanna do more than that. I wanna do
something big, like building my own machines from
scratch or putting aftermarket mods on something!
jpnChrName: いずれは一から機械を作ったり、思い通りに カスタマイズ出来るようになりたいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
いずれは一から機械を作ったり、思い通りに
カスタマイズ出来るようになりたいんだけど……

engChrName: But, well...maybe I really am rushing it. I dunno what I don't know.
engSearchText:
But, well...maybe I really am rushing it. I dunno what
I don't know.
jpnChrName: ご先祖の手記にあった職人の在り方…… まだ遠いのかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ご先祖の手記にあった職人の在り方……
まだ遠いのかなぁ。

engChrName: My ancestors, they were Eastern-style blacksmiths. My parents would always tell me about their philosophy: 'your work is the sum of your knowledge.'
engSearchText:
My ancestors, they were Eastern-style blacksmiths.
My parents would always tell me about their
philosophy: 'your work is the sum of your knowledge.'
jpnChrName: 自らの作る物に、日々学んだ精神を注ぎ込む…… 東方鍛治師だった先祖の持ってたらしい哲学だ。
jpnSearchText:
自らの作る物に、日々学んだ精神を注ぎ込む……
東方鍛治師だった先祖の持ってたらしい哲学だ。

engChrName: I wonder how well that translates into the modern age...
engSearchText:
I wonder how well that translates into the
modern age...
jpnChrName: あたしは、今の時代でそういう職人の 本分ってのを探してみたいんだよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
あたしは、今の時代でそういう職人の
本分ってのを探してみたいんだよなぁ……

engChrName: Ah, is this about Giovanna's soba efforts?
engSearchText: Ah, is this about Giovanna's soba efforts?
jpnChrName: なるほど、以前ジョバンナさんが 仰っていた件ですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、以前ジョバンナさんが
仰っていた件ですね。

engChrName: I'm sorry to hear that she's having trouble with it...
engSearchText: I'm sorry to hear that she's having trouble with it...
jpnChrName: 上手くいかなかったと聞いて、 残念に思っていた所でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
上手くいかなかったと聞いて、
残念に思っていた所でしたが……

engChrName: ...but I do appreciate you helping her. I hope she gets the recipe just right.
engSearchText:
...but I do appreciate you helping her. I hope she gets
the recipe just right.
jpnChrName: 皆さんにご協力頂けて嬉しく思います。 どうかよろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんにご協力頂けて嬉しく思います。
どうかよろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: Well, the field's not my forte, but I make sure I always do the job right. You can leave it to us.
engSearchText:
Well, the field's not my forte, but I make sure I
always do the job right. You can leave it to us.
jpnChrName: ま、専門分野じゃねえが 請け負ったからにはな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、専門分野じゃねえが
請け負ったからにはな。

engChrName: Haha! That's the spirit, young man.
engSearchText: Haha! That's the spirit, young man.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでも頼もしい事に 変わりありませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでも頼もしい事に
変わりありませんよ。

engChrName: As for the soba...I can give some insight on the sauce, if you'd like.
engSearchText:
As for the soba...I can give some insight on the sauce,
if you'd like.
jpnChrName: それではお話しますが、 私が知っているのは『蕎麦つゆ』の作り方です。
jpnSearchText:
それではお話しますが、
私が知っているのは『蕎麦つゆ』の作り方です。

engChrName: My mother was born quite far to the East. She became skilled at preparing their cuisine, growing up.
engSearchText:
My mother was born quite far to the East. She became
skilled at preparing their cuisine, growing up.
jpnChrName: 私の母が東方の中でも更に東の方の出身で── いわゆる極東の文化に詳しかったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
私の母が東方の中でも更に東の方の出身で──
いわゆる極東の文化に詳しかったんですよ。

engChrName: From what I remember, soba sauce is made by first preparing a base soup stock, then adding the flavor of choice to it.
engSearchText:
From what I remember, soba sauce is made by first
preparing a base soup stock, then adding the flavor of
choice to it.
jpnChrName: その母から聞いた話になりますが、蕎麦つゆは 『かえし』と『出汁』を合わせて作るそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
その母から聞いた話になりますが、蕎麦つゆは
『かえし』と『出汁』を合わせて作るそうですよ。

engChrName: Huh. Can you tell us more?
engSearchText: Huh. Can you tell us more?
jpnChrName: へぇ～、それはどういうものなんですか？
jpnSearchText: へぇ～、それはどういうものなんですか？

engChrName: The flavoring is a blend of various spices and sauces, usually local to the area...
engSearchText:
The flavoring is a blend of various spices and sauces,
usually local to the area...
jpnChrName: 『かえし』は味付けの基本的な部分を 担う調味料でして……
jpnSearchText:
『かえし』は味付けの基本的な部分を
担う調味料でして……

engChrName: When the blend is finished, you mix it into the soup stock.
engSearchText:
When the blend is finished, you mix it into the
soup stock.
jpnChrName: 『出汁』は料理に合わせて 好きな物を煮出したものになります。
jpnSearchText:
『出汁』は料理に合わせて
好きな物を煮出したものになります。

engChrName: Soba stock would traditionally use kelp or dried bonito, to my knowledge.
engSearchText:
Soba stock would traditionally use kelp or dried
bonito, to my knowledge.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦で言うと、昆布や鰹節というものを 煮出すのが一般的らしいですが……
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦で言うと、昆布や鰹節というものを
煮出すのが一般的らしいですが……

engChrName: But there are many other bases you can use—dried vegetables, mushrooms, sardines, and the like. Really, anything goes, so long as it tastes good.
engSearchText:
But there are many other bases you can use—dried
vegetables, mushrooms, sardines, and the like.
Really, anything goes, so long as it tastes good.
jpnChrName: それ以外の乾物や野菜など、 色々と工夫できるようですよ。
jpnSearchText:
それ以外の乾物や野菜など、
色々と工夫できるようですよ。

engChrName: So you can personalize the flavor of the soba that way... I see!
engSearchText:
So you can personalize the flavor of the soba
that way... I see!
jpnChrName: なるほど、アレンジが効く 部分でもあるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、アレンジが効く
部分でもあるんですね。

engChrName: But kelp and bonito don't appear to be common ingredients here—at least, I'm not particularly familiar with them.
engSearchText:
But kelp and bonito don't appear to be common
ingredients here—at least, I'm not particularly
familiar with them.
jpnChrName: でも……昆布や鰹節というのは こちらではあまり聞かない材料ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
でも……昆布や鰹節というのは
こちらではあまり聞かない材料ですよね。

engChrName: Probably bigger out in the East.
engSearchText: Probably bigger out in the East.
jpnChrName: まあ東方や極東ならではの 食材なんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ東方や極東ならではの
食材なんだろうな。

engChrName: I see... We can probably use stuff more common around here, instead.
engSearchText:
I see... We can probably use stuff more common
around here, instead.
jpnChrName: となると、他の乾物や野菜で 出汁を取るしかないですね！
jpnSearchText:
となると、他の乾物や野菜で
出汁を取るしかないですね！

engChrName: So, what should we make the soup stock out of? Giovanna mentioned basil?
engSearchText:
So, what should we make the soup stock out of?
Giovanna mentioned basil?
jpnChrName: でも、何から出汁を取ったらいいんでしょうか？ ジョバンナさんはバジルを選んだみたいでしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
でも、何から出汁を取ったらいいんでしょうか？
ジョバンナさんはバジルを選んだみたいでしたけど……

engChrName: Basil would work in a pinch, sure.
engSearchText: Basil would work in a pinch, sure.
jpnChrName: まあ、やり様によってはバジルでも 美味い蕎麦が出来るんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、やり様によってはバジルでも
美味い蕎麦が出来るんだろうが。

engChrName: But I'm thinkin' if we wanna really make the soba pop, we should get something stronger. Seafood's a good bet.
engSearchText:
But I'm thinkin' if we wanna really make the soba
pop, we should get something stronger. Seafood's a
good bet.
jpnChrName: 味を本物の蕎麦に寄せたいなら、 ここは乾物で出汁を取った方がいいだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
味を本物の蕎麦に寄せたいなら、
ここは乾物で出汁を取った方がいいだろうな。

engChrName: We'll just need somethin' we can find around here... Shrimp, maybe? Think we could get some of that?
engSearchText:
We'll just need somethin' we can find around here...
Shrimp, maybe? Think we could get some of that?
jpnChrName: そうだな、例えば……干しエビあたりなら 手に入ったりしないモンかね。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、例えば……干しエビあたりなら
手に入ったりしないモンかね。

engChrName: Aha! As it so happens, some of our merchants do carry that.
engSearchText:
Aha! As it so happens, some of our merchants do
carry that.
jpnChrName: ああ、干しエビでしたら村にありますよ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、干しエビでしたら村にありますよ！

engChrName: Shrimp is common in Eastern cuisine, so you should be able to find some from specialty merchants.
engSearchText:
Shrimp is common in Eastern cuisine, so you should
be able to find some from specialty merchants.
jpnChrName: 一般的な東方料理でも使う事もあるので、 少量ではありますが行商人から仕入れているんです。
jpnSearchText:
一般的な東方料理でも使う事もあるので、
少量ではありますが行商人から仕入れているんです。

engChrName: I think I have some in my house, in fact. If you'd like it, you need only ask.
engSearchText:
I think I have some in my house, in fact. If you'd like
it, you need only ask.
jpnChrName: 丁度我が家にも在庫があるので、 必要とあらばご用意しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
丁度我が家にも在庫があるので、
必要とあらばご用意しますよ。

engChrName: Perfect. Hopefully we don't gotta raid your pantry, but if we do, we'll let'cha know.
engSearchText:
Perfect. Hopefully we don't gotta raid your pantry,
but if we do, we'll let'cha know.
jpnChrName: おう、それなら必要になったら世話になるぜ。
jpnSearchText: おう、それなら必要になったら世話になるぜ。

engChrName: Nice! Our ingredients are secured.
engSearchText: Nice! Our ingredients are secured.
jpnChrName: これで物資の補給経路は確保できましたねっ！
jpnSearchText: これで物資の補給経路は確保できましたねっ！

engChrName: Secured indeed. Mission accomplished! Heehee.
engSearchText: Secured indeed. Mission accomplished! Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、フェリちゃんらしい考え方です。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、フェリちゃんらしい考え方です。

engChrName: Thank you for your help, Mayor Weng!
engSearchText: Thank you for your help, Mayor Weng!
jpnChrName: それでは村長、アドバイスを頂きありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: それでは村長、アドバイスを頂きありがとうございました。

engChrName: Oh, my pleasure. I see some wonderful soba in my future!
engSearchText:
Oh, my pleasure. I see some wonderful soba in
my future!
jpnChrName: いえいえ、美味しい蕎麦切りが 完成するのを楽しみにしていますね。
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、美味しい蕎麦切りが
完成するのを楽しみにしていますね。

engChrName: Okay, that should be good enough.
engSearchText: Okay, that should be good enough.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで聞き込みは終わったな。
jpnSearchText: さてと、これで聞き込みは終わったな。

engChrName: I think we have a good grasp on the subject now!
engSearchText: I think we have a good grasp on the subject now!
jpnChrName: アドバイスの方法も 掴めてきた気がしますね！
jpnSearchText:
アドバイスの方法も
掴めてきた気がしますね！

engChrName: So do we go back to Giovanna's now?
engSearchText: So do we go back to Giovanna's now?
jpnChrName: それじゃあジョバンナさんの所に戻りますか？
jpnSearchText: それじゃあジョバンナさんの所に戻りますか？

engChrName: Hmm... Actually, y'know, I think we're still missin' something.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Actually, y'know, I think we're still
missin' something.
jpnChrName: そうだな……っと、待てよ。 よく考えたらアレが足りねえな。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……っと、待てよ。
よく考えたらアレが足りねえな。

engChrName: Oh? And what would that something be?
engSearchText: Oh? And what would that something be?
jpnChrName: といいますと……？
jpnSearchText: といいますと……？

engChrName: A secret spice, that's what.
engSearchText: A secret spice, that's what.
jpnChrName: 薬味だよ、薬味。
jpnSearchText: 薬味だよ、薬味。

engChrName: Nothin' wrong with stickin' to the basics, but I say if we're makin' our own, we put a little spin on it. Somethin' off the beaten path, y'know?
engSearchText:
Nothin' wrong with stickin' to the basics, but I say if
we're makin' our own, we put a little spin on it.
Somethin' off the beaten path, y'know?
jpnChrName: 素の味を楽しむのもいいが 折角なら変化もほしいってもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
素の味を楽しむのもいいが
折角なら変化もほしいってもんだ。

engChrName: Maybe somethin' that grows around here... How about local plants? We could probably find some stuff down by the creek.
engSearchText:
Maybe somethin' that grows around here...
How about local plants? We could probably find
some stuff down by the creek.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村は自然が豊かだしな、 小川あたりに生えてたりすんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村は自然が豊かだしな、
小川あたりに生えてたりすんじゃねえか？

engChrName: I'm...not sure what you mean, but you sound really confident about it. I trust you on this one!
engSearchText:
I'm...not sure what you mean, but you sound really
confident about it. I trust you on this one!
jpnChrName: うーん、何の事か分かりませんけど…… 折角ですし探してみますか？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、何の事か分かりませんけど……
折角ですし探してみますか？

engChrName: Cool. If we don't find anything, no biggie.
engSearchText: Cool. If we don't find anything, no biggie.
jpnChrName: ああ、見つからなければ それで構わないと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、見つからなければ
それで構わないと思うけどな。

engChrName: Let's give it a crack and see what we come up with.
engSearchText: Let's give it a crack and see what we come up with.
jpnChrName: よし、それじゃ次の聞き込み先に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: よし、それじゃ次の聞き込み先に向かうぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい！
jpnSearchText: はい！

engChrName: Now, where could they have gone off to...?
engSearchText: Now, where could they have gone off to...?
jpnChrName: あの方はどちらに行かれたのか……
jpnSearchText: あの方はどちらに行かれたのか……

engChrName: With more traffic between the big cities, we might need to expect more visitors in our future—and potentially, more trouble.
engSearchText:
With more traffic between the big cities, we might
need to expect more visitors in our future—and
potentially, more trouble.
jpnChrName: それにしても、都市部との往来も増え、 トラブルにも気をつけていたつもりですが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、都市部との往来も増え、
トラブルにも気をつけていたつもりですが……

engChrName: We need to figure out how to prepare for that. The way we are, we'll be overwhelmed if we get more big days like this.
engSearchText:
We need to figure out how to prepare for that.
The way we are, we'll be overwhelmed if we get more
big days like this.
jpnChrName: このようなことがあるとなれば、 まだ訪問者と村人を守るには不十分かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
このようなことがあるとなれば、
まだ訪問者と村人を守るには不十分かもしれません。

engChrName: How we prepare for the future will be most important, both in this context and in general.
engSearchText:
How we prepare for the future will be most
important, both in this context and in general.
jpnChrName: 今後のためにも、改めて体制を整えていきたいです。
jpnSearchText: 今後のためにも、改めて体制を整えていきたいです。

engChrName: It's good that we're getting more visitors thanks to intercity traffic, but...
engSearchText:
It's good that we're getting more visitors thanks to
intercity traffic, but...
jpnChrName: 都市部との往来が 増えた事は喜ばしいですが……
jpnSearchText:
都市部との往来が
増えた事は喜ばしいですが……

engChrName: ...it seems all these city folk are bringing city trouble with them. Not to mention the influx of international traffic...
engSearchText:
...it seems all these city folk are bringing city trouble
with them. Not to mention the influx of
international traffic...
jpnChrName: やはり相応のトラブルも伴うものです。 最近では国外との交易も始まりつつありますしね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり相応のトラブルも伴うものです。
最近では国外との交易も始まりつつありますしね。

engChrName: We'll need to put a plan in place to protect this village, its residents, and these new visitors.
engSearchText:
We'll need to put a plan in place to protect this
village, its residents, and these new visitors.
jpnChrName: 改めて村と来訪者の安全を守れる 体制を整えていきたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
改めて村と来訪者の安全を守れる
体制を整えていきたいものです。

engChrName: It's quite the relief that we were able to house the passengers in the meeting hall for the night.
engSearchText:
It's quite the relief that we were able to house the
passengers in the meeting hall for the night.
jpnChrName: 村の集会所を泊まる場所として 提供できて何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
村の集会所を泊まる場所として
提供できて何よりです。

engChrName: It's not ideal—not even proper lodging, really—but it should let them get some sleep.
engSearchText:
It's not ideal—not even proper lodging, really—but it
should let them get some sleep.
jpnChrName: 宿屋と比べると快適とは言えませんが、 少しでも身体を休めていただければと。
jpnSearchText:
宿屋と比べると快適とは言えませんが、
少しでも身体を休めていただければと。

engChrName: I do worry about accidents like these... Rare though they may be, they've got us all wary.
engSearchText:
I do worry about accidents like these... Rare though
they may be, they've got us all wary.
jpnChrName: しかし、このような事故は久しいですね。 住民にも改めて注意を促しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、このような事故は久しいですね。
住民にも改めて注意を促しましょう。

engChrName: The roads have become safer thanks to the work done on the transportation networks, but today's taught us that we still can't let our guards down.
engSearchText:
The roads have become safer thanks to the work
done on the transportation networks, but today's
taught us that we still can't let our guards down.
jpnChrName: 最近では交通網も整備され、こういう事は 減ったと思いましたが、やはり起きるものですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
最近では交通網も整備され、こういう事は
減ったと思いましたが、やはり起きるものですねぇ。

engChrName: A few villagers travel out often, whether for deliveries or other business. I'll need to warn them.
engSearchText:
A few villagers travel out often, whether for deliveries
or other business. I'll need to warn them.
jpnChrName: 出荷などで頻繁に遠出する村民もいます、 彼らにも話しておくつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
出荷などで頻繁に遠出する村民もいます、
彼らにも話しておくつもりです。

engChrName: Soba flavoring is made by adding your flavor of choice to a base soup stock.
engSearchText:
Soba flavoring is made by adding your flavor of
choice to a base soup stock.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦つゆは『かえし』と『出汁』を 合わせて作るようですよ。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦つゆは『かえし』と『出汁』を
合わせて作るようですよ。

engChrName: Traditionally, you would use kelp or bonito for the stock.
engSearchText:
Traditionally, you would use kelp or bonito for
the stock.
jpnChrName: 『出汁』は好きな物を煮出して構わないそうです。
jpnSearchText: 『出汁』は好きな物を煮出して構わないそうです。

engChrName: The flavoring is much more open-ended. You can experiment with it to your liking.
engSearchText:
