The flavoring is much more open-ended. You can
experiment with it to your liking.
jpnChrName: 昆布や鰹節、それ以外の乾物や野菜など 色々と工夫できるようですよ。
jpnSearchText:
昆布や鰹節、それ以外の乾物や野菜など
色々と工夫できるようですよ。

engChrName: I fear that's about all the advice I have. Tell Giovanna I wish her the best of luck.
engSearchText:
I fear that's about all the advice I have. Tell Giovanna
I wish her the best of luck.
jpnChrName: これくらいのアドバイスしか出来ませんが、 私も蕎麦切り作りを応援させて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
これくらいのアドバイスしか出来ませんが、
私も蕎麦切り作りを応援させて頂きますね。

engChrName: Thank you all, again.
engSearchText: Thank you all, again.
jpnChrName: 改めて、皆さんありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: 改めて、皆さんありがとうございました。

engChrName: Ah, the soba was wonderful! The flavoring was simply spectacular, and not at all what I expected.
engSearchText:
Ah, the soba was wonderful! The flavoring was
simply spectacular, and not at all what I expected.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦は勿論ですが、蕎麦つゆも出汁が利いていて とても美味しかったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦は勿論ですが、蕎麦つゆも出汁が利いていて
とても美味しかったですよ。

engChrName: Yet one more reason to look forward to this year's festival!
engSearchText:
Yet one more reason to look forward to this
year's festival!
jpnChrName: ふふ、収穫祭で振舞われる日が ますます楽しみになってしまいますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、収穫祭で振舞われる日が
ますます楽しみになってしまいますね。

engChrName: Ah, you must have come on the bus... I don't believe we've met. If you need anything while you're here, I'll help however I can as the village mayor.
engSearchText:
Ah, you must have come on the bus... I don't believe
we've met. If you need anything while you're here, I'll
help however I can as the village mayor.
jpnChrName: おや、確かバスと一緒に来た方々でしたね。 用件があれば、私が伺いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
おや、確かバスと一緒に来た方々でしたね。
用件があれば、私が伺いましょう。

engChrName: We've been getting more tourists and travelers around this neck of the woods... I've been spending more of my time tending to them lately.
engSearchText:
We've been getting more tourists and travelers around
this neck of the woods... I've been spending more of
my time tending to them lately.
jpnChrName: 最近では街の人もたくさん来ますし、 私が応対する機会も増えましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
最近では街の人もたくさん来ますし、
私が応対する機会も増えましたよ。

engChrName: We're a simple farming town, as you can see—though some of us do trek out to the city to deliver produce and spread the good word.
engSearchText:
We're a simple farming town, as you can see—though
some of us do trek out to the city to deliver produce
and spread the good word.
jpnChrName: この通り昔ながらの農村ですが、 都市部に作物を卸す事も増えましたしね。
jpnSearchText:
この通り昔ながらの農村ですが、
都市部に作物を卸す事も増えましたしね。

engChrName: At any rate, I'll see what I can do to help sort this business out. For now, make yourselves at home here and try to decompress.
engSearchText:
At any rate, I'll see what I can do to help sort this
business out. For now, make yourselves at home here
and try to decompress.
jpnChrName: まあ、事故の件は私の方でも対応しますので、 ひとまずはご安心頂ければと。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、事故の件は私の方でも対応しますので、
ひとまずはご安心頂ければと。

engChrName: I should talk to the driver when I get a free moment.
engSearchText: I should talk to the driver when I get a free moment.
jpnChrName: バスの件については、この後運転手さんに 状況を確認するつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
バスの件については、この後運転手さんに
状況を確認するつもりです。

engChrName: This sort of thing isn't unprecedented, given our village lies on a busy international route.
engSearchText:
This sort of thing isn't unprecedented, given our
village lies on a busy international route.
jpnChrName: まあ、国境に近い村ですしね。 こういった事態にも慣れたものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、国境に近い村ですしね。
こういった事態にも慣れたものですよ。

engChrName: With all the traffic lately, I knew trouble would come trundling in eventually...but not this much all at once.
engSearchText:
With all the traffic lately, I knew trouble would come
trundling in eventually...but not this much all at once.
jpnChrName: 最近は往来が増えたから、多少の問題が無い 訳でもないけれど、こうも重なるのは珍しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は往来が増えたから、多少の問題が無い
訳でもないけれど、こうも重なるのは珍しいわ。

engChrName: Everyone's understandably worried, seeing as the culprit's still at large.
engSearchText:
Everyone's understandably worried, seeing as the
culprit's still at large.
jpnChrName: 例の人も見つかるまでは、 バスの件も安心できないわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
例の人も見つかるまでは、
バスの件も安心できないわねぇ。

engChrName: You might have already noticed, but my husband is of Eastern descent. I'd prefer you keep an open mind about it, unlike some others...
engSearchText:
You might have already noticed, but my husband is of
Eastern descent. I'd prefer you keep an open mind
about it, unlike some others...
jpnChrName: お気づきかもしれないけど……夫は東方系の血も 入っているけど、変な誤解はしないでね。
jpnSearchText:
お気づきかもしれないけど……夫は東方系の血も
入っているけど、変な誤解はしないでね。

engChrName: He's half-Eastern, so some city visitors like to paint him as unsavory—the type with connections to certain underhanded groups.
engSearchText:
He's half-Eastern, so some city visitors like to paint
him as unsavory—the type with connections to
certain underhanded groups.
jpnChrName: 東方系ハーフだからって、たまに都会の人が “その筋”を勘繰る事もあるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
東方系ハーフだからって、たまに都会の人が
“その筋”を勘繰る事もあるけれど……

engChrName: But I assure you, he has nothing to do with those folk.
engSearchText:
But I assure you, he has nothing to do with
those folk.
jpnChrName: 夫は東方人街の方で幅を利かせている “彼ら”とは無関係よ。
jpnSearchText:
夫は東方人街の方で幅を利かせている
“彼ら”とは無関係よ。

engChrName: Just because he's Eastern doesn't make him related to them.
engSearchText:
Just because he's Eastern doesn't make him related
to them.
jpnChrName: 東方系というだけで 一緒くたにはしないで欲しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
東方系というだけで
一緒くたにはしないで欲しいわ。

engChrName: At any rate, none of the villagers batted an eye at his heritage when he was elected. It was purely the outsiders stirring up drama.
engSearchText:
At any rate, none of the villagers batted an eye at his
heritage when he was elected. It was purely the
outsiders stirring up drama.
jpnChrName: 夫が村長に選ばれた時も、村の皆は東方系だとか、 そんなことは少しも考えなかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
夫が村長に選ばれた時も、村の皆は東方系だとか、
そんなことは少しも考えなかったわ。

engChrName: They made him out to be this...this swindler who only won the election because of his 'connections.'
engSearchText:
They made him out to be this...this swindler who
only won the election because of his 'connections.'
jpnChrName: その筋の力添えがあったかも なんていう話は、酷い偏見よ。
jpnSearchText:
その筋の力添えがあったかも
なんていう話は、酷い偏見よ。

engChrName: Mmm, that was wonderful. The buckwheat was packed with flavor, but it was smooth and refreshing all the same!
engSearchText:
Mmm, that was wonderful. The buckwheat was
packed with flavor, but it was smooth and
refreshing all the same!
jpnChrName: 蕎麦の香りが口の中に広がって、 喉ごしが爽やかで美味しかったわ！
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦の香りが口の中に広がって、
喉ごしが爽やかで美味しかったわ！

engChrName: I can see why my husband loves Far Eastern recipes. I'd like to try some more!
engSearchText:
I can see why my husband loves Far
Eastern recipes. I'd like to try some more!
jpnChrName: ふふ、主人の言う極東の料理を もっと知りたくなってしまうわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、主人の言う極東の料理を
もっと知りたくなってしまうわね。

engChrName: Hello there. Are you here from the capital?
engSearchText: Hello there. Are you here from the capital?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい。 あなた達も首都から来たのね。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい。
あなた達も首都から来たのね。

engChrName: We see more and more tourists coming out here from the capital nowadays.
engSearchText:
We see more and more tourists coming out here from
the capital nowadays.
jpnChrName: うちの村も、最近はわざわざ 首都から観光に来る人も増えててねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うちの村も、最近はわざわざ
首都から観光に来る人も増えててねぇ。

engChrName: Maybe it's our produce deliveries, or maybe it's the atmosphere... Either way, we're sort of making a name for ourselves.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's our produce deliveries, or maybe it's
the atmosphere... Either way, we're sort of making a
name for ourselves.
jpnChrName: 作物の出荷で往来が増えたからか、村の事が 都会の方でも知られてるらしいじゃないの。
jpnSearchText:
作物の出荷で往来が増えたからか、村の事が
都会の方でも知られてるらしいじゃないの。

engChrName: My husband's really emphasized trade in his time as mayor.
engSearchText:
My husband's really emphasized trade in his time
as mayor.
jpnChrName: 夫が村長になってから、 何かと作物の卸先も増えたしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
夫が村長になってから、
何かと作物の卸先も増えたしねぇ。

engChrName: We've even made delivery deals reaching as far as Crossbell!
engSearchText:
We've even made delivery deals reaching as far
as Crossbell!
jpnChrName: 最近じゃあ、クロスベルなんかとの 交易も始まりつつあるし……
jpnSearchText:
最近じゃあ、クロスベルなんかとの
交易も始まりつつあるし……

engChrName: I think his efforts are really paying off. We're getting some wonderful word of mouth out there!
engSearchText:
I think his efforts are really paying off. We're getting
some wonderful word of mouth out there!
jpnChrName: その意味では観光客が増えたのも、 夫の尽力あってのものなのかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味では観光客が増えたのも、
夫の尽力あってのものなのかしらねぇ。

engChrName: Today was not your ordinary day... Phew.
engSearchText: Today was not your ordinary day... Phew.
jpnChrName: 珍しく色々とあった一日ですが……
jpnSearchText: 珍しく色々とあった一日ですが……

engChrName: I'm just relieved that Mayor Weng was able to smooth things over with the passengers.
engSearchText:
I'm just relieved that Mayor Weng was able to smooth
things over with the passengers.
jpnChrName: バスの件はウェン村長らの計らいもあって、 無事に収まりそうで何よりですな。
jpnSearchText:
バスの件はウェン村長らの計らいもあって、
無事に収まりそうで何よりですな。

engChrName: By the time I thought about lending out some of the chapel's rooms, he'd already arranged things with the meeting hall instead.
engSearchText:
By the time I thought about lending out some of the
chapel's rooms, he'd already arranged things with the
meeting hall instead.
jpnChrName: 私どもも部屋を貸すつもりでしたが、 既に集会所が手配されておりまして……
jpnSearchText:
私どもも部屋を貸すつもりでしたが、
既に集会所が手配されておりまして……

engChrName: He's still sharp as ever.
engSearchText: He's still sharp as ever.
jpnChrName: いやはや、ウェン村長の機転も 相変わらずなものです。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、ウェン村長の機転も
相変わらずなものです。

engChrName: Thanks to him and Goddard, this whole debacle should pass within the next day or two.
engSearchText:
Thanks to him and Goddard, this whole debacle
should pass within the next day or two.
jpnChrName: しかし、村長や親方らの働きもあって バスの件も解決しそうで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、村長や親方らの働きもあって
バスの件も解決しそうで何よりです。

engChrName: Watching everyone band together to figure out a solution like that...it makes me proud to serve here, even if it's just my assignment.
engSearchText:
Watching everyone band together to figure out a
solution like that...it makes me proud to serve here,
even if it's just my assignment.
jpnChrName: こうしてみると、改めて自分の受け持つ村が 誇らしくなりますな。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてみると、改めて自分の受け持つ村が
誇らしくなりますな。

engChrName: O Goddess, I pray again for the safety of these good villagers and the travelers they invited into their homes...
engSearchText:
O Goddess, I pray again for the safety of these good
villagers and the travelers they invited into
their homes...
jpnChrName: 村と旅の方々に、改めて女神様の 御加護がありますように……
jpnSearchText:
村と旅の方々に、改めて女神様の
御加護がありますように……

engChrName: Sister Belicia's love for this village truly humbles me.
engSearchText: Sister Belicia's love for this village truly humbles me.
jpnChrName: シスター・ベルシアの故郷への想いは、 私も常々感心させられるものです。
jpnSearchText:
シスター・ベルシアの故郷への想いは、
私も常々感心させられるものです。

engChrName: There were many chapels that sought her skills, particularly in the Holy City.
engSearchText:
There were many chapels that sought her skills,
particularly in the Holy City.
jpnChrName: 彼女は優秀ですから、色々なところから 声もかかっていたと聞きますが……
jpnSearchText:
彼女は優秀ですから、色々なところから
声もかかっていたと聞きますが……

engChrName: But she turned all of them down to serve in the village she loves.
engSearchText:
But she turned all of them down to serve in the
village she loves.
jpnChrName: それでも彼女は、最初からこの村のための シスターになると決めていたと言いますしね。
jpnSearchText:
それでも彼女は、最初からこの村のための
シスターになると決めていたと言いますしね。

engChrName: She reminds me of a sister who served here once upon a time... She shared that devotion to her home.
engSearchText:
She reminds me of a sister who served here once upon
a time... She shared that devotion to her home.
jpnChrName: 思えば、ここには昔も郷土を 大切にするシスターがいましてね。
jpnSearchText:
思えば、ここには昔も郷土を
大切にするシスターがいましてね。

engChrName: Perhaps that makes Sister Belicia her spiritual successor, in a sense.
engSearchText:
Perhaps that makes Sister Belicia her spiritual
successor, in a sense.
jpnChrName: シスター・ベルシアは、しっかりと先達の 精神を受け継いでいると言えましょうな。
jpnSearchText:
シスター・ベルシアは、しっかりと先達の
精神を受け継いでいると言えましょうな。

engChrName: Welcome to the Creil Chapel. I don't believe we've met... Might you be travelers, then?
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Creil Chapel. I don't believe
we've met... Might you be travelers, then?
jpnChrName: おや、見ない顔ですがご旅行の方ですか？ よくぞ教会にいらっしゃいましたな。
jpnSearchText:
おや、見ない顔ですがご旅行の方ですか？
よくぞ教会にいらっしゃいましたな。

engChrName: I do hope you enjoy your stay here. I heard there was some sort of accident nearby, but I don't believe it's much to worry about.
engSearchText:
I do hope you enjoy your stay here. I heard there was
some sort of accident nearby, but I don't believe it's
much to worry about.
jpnChrName: 事故もあったようですが、あなた方は気を病まず ごゆっくりされると良いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
事故もあったようですが、あなた方は気を病まず
ごゆっくりされると良いでしょう。

engChrName: Are you here to see the ruins, by chance? You can find them in the hills nearby.
engSearchText:
Are you here to see the ruins, by chance? You can
find them in the hills nearby.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、近郊の丘陵地には 古代の遺跡もあるのですが、ご存知ですか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、近郊の丘陵地には
古代の遺跡もあるのですが、ご存知ですか？

engChrName: It's not quite as well known as other archaeological sites, so you're likely to get the area all to yourself, if you choose to visit.
engSearchText:
It's not quite as well known as other archaeological
sites, so you're likely to get the area all to yourself, if
you choose to visit.
jpnChrName: 知名度はさほどありませんが、考古学などが お好きな方には隠れた名所と言われております。
jpnSearchText:
知名度はさほどありませんが、考古学などが
お好きな方には隠れた名所と言われております。

engChrName: I've made the trip out there a few times myself, albeit on official church business. It's quite the curious spot, indeed.
engSearchText:
I've made the trip out there a few times myself, albeit
on official church business. It's quite the curious
spot, indeed.
jpnChrName: 丘陵の遺跡は私も教会の調査に立ち会って 赴きましたが、なかなか不思議な雰囲気でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
丘陵の遺跡は私も教会の調査に立ち会って
赴きましたが、なかなか不思議な雰囲気でしてね。

engChrName: You'll see this series of pillars placed in a very deliberate pattern. Supposedly, animists of old paid tribute to their patron deities there.
engSearchText:
You'll see this series of pillars placed in a very
deliberate pattern. Supposedly, animists of old paid
tribute to their patron deities there.
jpnChrName: 石柱が規則的に立ち並ぶものでして、 大昔の精霊信仰の名残りと聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
石柱が規則的に立ち並ぶものでして、
大昔の精霊信仰の名残りと聞きます。

engChrName: As it happens, they discovered a giant stone there around twenty years ago. I happened to be there for it!
engSearchText:
As it happens, they discovered a giant stone there
around twenty years ago. I happened to be there
for it!
jpnChrName: 私も当時は回収には立ち会っていたのですが、 ２０年前には大きな石像も発見された事があります。
jpnSearchText:
私も当時は回収には立ち会っていたのですが、
２０年前には大きな石像も発見された事があります。

engChrName: September 7th, 12:20PM
engSearchText: September 7th, 12:20PM

jpnSearchText: ………………………………

engChrName: Well, now. Isn't this a lovely village?
engSearchText: Well, now. Isn't this a lovely village?
jpnChrName: 素敵な村……ですね。
jpnSearchText: 素敵な村……ですね。

engChrName: It's like an idyllic painting: rolling hills amidst clear streams, a windmill turning with the wind, and a touch of Middle Ages architecture.
engSearchText:
It's like an idyllic painting: rolling hills amidst clear
streams, a windmill turning with the wind, and a
touch of Middle Ages architecture.
jpnChrName: 中世の建物に小川、 風車に遙かな丘陵のたたずまい。
jpnSearchText:
中世の建物に小川、
風車に遙かな丘陵のたたずまい。

engChrName: The white flowers we saw in the wheat field were beautiful as well. They were buckwheat flowers, weren't they?
engSearchText:
The white flowers we saw in the wheat field were
beautiful as well. They were buckwheat flowers,
weren't they?
jpnChrName: 途中の麦畑も綺麗でしたけど、 白い花の畑はひょっとして……？
jpnSearchText:
途中の麦畑も綺麗でしたけど、
白い花の畑はひょっとして……？

engChrName: Good eye. Fun fact, the village uses them in their specialty dish: galette.
engSearchText:
Good eye. Fun fact, the village uses them in their
specialty dish: galette.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦だな、このあたりじゃ ガレットなんかが有名だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦だな、このあたりじゃ
ガレットなんかが有名だぜ。

engChrName: Oh, I've heard of those. Aida always says they make for a perfect lunch treat.
engSearchText:
Oh, I've heard of those. Aida always says they make
for a perfect lunch treat.
jpnChrName: はい、アイーダさんも ランチにはピッタリって……
jpnSearchText:
はい、アイーダさんも
ランチにはピッタリって……

engChrName: Heehee. I'm excited to finally visit this place.
engSearchText: Heehee. I'm excited to finally visit this place.
jpnChrName: ……えへへ、本当に来られたんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……えへへ、本当に来られたんだ。

engChrName: Anyway, that bus is gonna be out of commission for a while, so why don't we grab some grub?
engSearchText:
Anyway, that bus is gonna be out of commission for a
while, so why don't we grab some grub?
jpnChrName: バスの客も足止めだろう。 俺たちもいったんランチにするか。
jpnSearchText:
バスの客も足止めだろう。
俺たちもいったんランチにするか。

engChrName: I hear the inn over there has the best food in the village.
engSearchText:
I hear the inn over there has the best food in
the village.
jpnChrName: 村で一番の宿酒場だった筈だ。
jpnSearchText: 村で一番の宿酒場だった筈だ。

engChrName: While we're chowin' down, we can ask if Aida's unit dropped by there. Sound good?
engSearchText:
While we're chowin' down, we can ask if Aida's unit
dropped by there. Sound good?
jpnChrName: １０日前、アイゼンシルトの部隊が 立ち寄ってないかも探ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
１０日前、アイゼンシルトの部隊が
立ち寄ってないかも探ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Yep, yep!
engSearchText: Yep, yep!
jpnChrName: ……はいっ！
jpnSearchText: ……はいっ！

engChrName: Then let's go inside, shall we?
engSearchText: Then let's go inside, shall we?
jpnChrName: それではお邪魔しましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それではお邪魔しましょうか。

engChrName: Wow. This egg is amazing, and the buckwheat has a pleasant fragrance as well.
engSearchText:
Wow. This egg is amazing, and the buckwheat has a
pleasant fragrance as well.
jpnChrName: わぁ……卵もソースも濃厚で 蕎麦粉の香りが口一杯に広がって……
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……卵もソースも濃厚で
蕎麦粉の香りが口一杯に広がって……

engChrName: Even the side vegetables are delicious!
engSearchText: Even the side vegetables are delicious!
jpnChrName: 付け合わせの野菜も 信じられないくらい美味しいです……！
jpnSearchText:
付け合わせの野菜も
信じられないくらい美味しいです……！

jpnChrName: …………（コクコク）
jpnSearchText: …………（コクコク）

engChrName: Montmart has Creil's buckwheat, too, but it's no surprise that it tastes even better here.
engSearchText:
Montmart has Creil's buckwheat, too, but it's no
surprise that it tastes even better here.
jpnChrName: モンマルトでもクレイユ産を使ってたが やっぱ現地採れたては違うよな。
jpnSearchText:
モンマルトでもクレイユ産を使ってたが
やっぱ現地採れたては違うよな。

engChrName: Wait, they have orange and blackcurrant galettes on the menu? Hell, yeah. I am so ordering those.
engSearchText:
Wait, they have orange and blackcurrant galettes on
the menu? Hell, yeah. I am so ordering those.
jpnChrName: ……カシスとオレンジのガレットもあんのか。 そっちもそそりやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
……カシスとオレンジのガレットもあんのか。
そっちもそそりやがるな。

engChrName: Ooh! I think I'll do the same.
engSearchText: Ooh! I think I'll do the same.
jpnChrName: あはは…… 確かに美味しそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
確かに美味しそうですね。

engChrName: *munch* I'll have some of those, too! *chew* Maybe I'll order seconds. *munch* And thirds!
engSearchText:
*munch* I'll have some of those, too! *chew* Maybe
I'll order seconds. *munch* And thirds!
jpnChrName: （モグモグ） 甘いのもいいですねっ……！
jpnSearchText:
（モグモグ）
甘いのもいいですねっ……！

engChrName: It sounds like you're all enjoying yourselves.
engSearchText: It sounds like you're all enjoying yourselves.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、気に入ってくれて嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、気に入ってくれて嬉しいよ。

engChrName: Galettes are the pride of our village. No one makes them quite like us, so make sure you savor the flavor.
engSearchText:
Galettes are the pride of our village. No one makes
them quite like us, so make sure you savor the flavor.
jpnChrName: なにせガレットはウチの、 ううんクレイユ村の自慢だからね。
jpnSearchText:
なにせガレットはウチの、
ううんクレイユ村の自慢だからね。

engChrName: And while you're at it, why don't you try some of the other items on the menu? We have vegetable galettes, smoked salmon, and seasonal fruits.
engSearchText:
And while you're at it, why don't you try some of the
other items on the menu? We have vegetable galettes,
smoked salmon, and seasonal fruits.
jpnChrName: 定番の卵ハムチーズ（コンプレット）から 野菜系にスモークサーモン……
jpnSearchText:
定番の卵ハムチーズ（コンプレット）から
野菜系にスモークサーモン……

engChrName: Oh, and you'll definitely want to try our desserts. We serve some of the best caramel and ice cream you'll ever have.
engSearchText:
Oh, and you'll definitely want to try our desserts.
We serve some of the best caramel and ice cream
you'll ever have.
jpnChrName: 旬のフルーツに、キャラメルと アイスクリームまで全部お勧めだよ。
jpnSearchText:
旬のフルーツに、キャラメルと
アイスクリームまで全部お勧めだよ。

engChrName: A-Ah! So many choices!
engSearchText: A-Ah! So many choices!
jpnChrName: ど、どれも美味しそうです……
jpnSearchText: ど、どれも美味しそうです……

engChrName: Ugh... Is it bad that I want to order one of everything?
engSearchText:
Ugh... Is it bad that I want to order one
of everything?
jpnChrName: ううっ…… おかわりしたくなっちゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……
おかわりしたくなっちゃいますね。

engChrName: You got caramel and ice cream? I'll take ten of each.
engSearchText: You got caramel and ice cream? I'll take ten of each.
jpnChrName: スイーツ系は改めて 詳しく聞かせてもらうとして。
jpnSearchText:
スイーツ系は改めて
詳しく聞かせてもらうとして。

engChrName: ...Wait, hang on. We didn't come here to drown ourselves in food—we came to ask you some questions. You work here a lot, right?
engSearchText:
...Wait, hang on. We didn't come here to drown
ourselves in food—we came to ask you
some questions. You work here a lot, right?
jpnChrName: ここの看板娘かい？ ちょっと聞きたいことがあるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ここの看板娘かい？
ちょっと聞きたいことがあるんだが。

engChrName: Of course. My parents own the place, after all.
engSearchText: Of course. My parents own the place, after all.
jpnChrName: あはは、親子二人でやってる宿酒場の 娘ってだけだけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、親子二人でやってる宿酒場の
娘ってだけだけど。

engChrName: You saved the people on that bus, right? Well, fire away, then. I'll gladly answer any question you have.
engSearchText:
You saved the people on that bus, right? Well, fire
away, then. I'll gladly answer any question you have.
jpnChrName: 魔獣に襲われてたバスを助けたんだって？ 首都の便利屋さんらしいけど、何が聞きたいの？
jpnSearchText:
魔獣に襲われてたバスを助けたんだって？
首都の便利屋さんらしいけど、何が聞きたいの？

engChrName: Cool. So I need you to think back to ten days ago.
engSearchText: Cool. So I need you to think back to ten days ago.
jpnChrName: ああ、１０日くらい前なんだが──
jpnSearchText: ああ、１０日くらい前なんだが──

engChrName: Did any shady-lookin' people happen to stop by here?
engSearchText: Did any shady-lookin' people happen to stop by here?
jpnChrName: この宿酒場に、訳アリっぽい客が 何人かで立ち寄ったりしなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
この宿酒場に、訳アリっぽい客が
何人かで立ち寄ったりしなかったか？

engChrName: Ten days ago? I don't know if I can remember that far—
engSearchText:
Ten days ago? I don't know if I can remember that
far—

engChrName: Wait... Actually, yes. There was a group of jaegers staying here around then.
engSearchText:
Wait... Actually, yes. There was a group of jaegers
staying here around then.
jpnChrName: ああ、ひょっとして あの猟兵さんたちのことかな？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ひょっとして
あの猟兵さんたちのことかな？

engChrName: I knew it!
engSearchText: I knew it!
jpnChrName: や、やっぱり 立ち寄ったんですか──！？
jpnSearchText:
や、やっぱり
立ち寄ったんですか──！？

engChrName: If you don't mind me asking, how did you know they were jaegers? Did their attire give it away?
engSearchText:
If you don't mind me asking, how did you know they
were jaegers? Did their attire give it away?
jpnChrName: あの、どうして猟兵だって……？ そういう格好をしてたんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
あの、どうして猟兵だって……？
そういう格好をしてたんでしょうか？

engChrName: Oh, no. They were all wearing casual clothes.
engSearchText: Oh, no. They were all wearing casual clothes.
jpnChrName: あはは、そりゃあ一見、 普通の格好はしてたけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、そりゃあ一見、
普通の格好はしてたけどさ。

engChrName: I just know a jaeger when I see one. Our village is near the border of a few countries, so we get patrons like them from time to time.
engSearchText:
I just know a jaeger when I see one. Our village is
near the border of a few countries, so we get patrons
like them from time to time.
jpnChrName: この村って幾つかの国境も近いし、 結構その手の人が立ち寄るんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
この村って幾つかの国境も近いし、
結構その手の人が立ち寄るんだよね。

engChrName: But as long as they pay their bills and don't cause trouble, they're just as welcome here as any of our other guests.
engSearchText:
But as long as they pay their bills and don't cause
trouble, they're just as welcome here as any of our
other guests.
jpnChrName: どの団のヒトも弁えていて ミラ払いも良いから文句はないし。
jpnSearchText:
どの団のヒトも弁えていて
ミラ払いも良いから文句はないし。

engChrName: I suppose that's fair.
engSearchText: I suppose that's fair.
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか……

engChrName: This village is probably treated as a buffer zone between jaegers.
engSearchText:
This village is probably treated as a buffer zone
between jaegers.
jpnChrName: 警察の駐在所もあるし 遊撃士なんかも定期的に立ち寄る。
jpnSearchText:
警察の駐在所もあるし
遊撃士なんかも定期的に立ち寄る。

engChrName: Bracers are always buzzin' around like flies, and there's a police station here.
engSearchText:
Bracers are always buzzin' around like flies, and
there's a police station here.
jpnChrName: その意味でも、猟兵たちの間じゃ 暗黙の休戦地帯になってるんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
その意味でも、猟兵たちの間じゃ
暗黙の休戦地帯になってるんだろう。

engChrName: I've got a question for you.
engSearchText: I've got a question for you.
jpnChrName: そ、それでその……
jpnSearchText: そ、それでその……

engChrName: Was there a woman with that group of jaegers?
engSearchText: Was there a woman with that group of jaegers?
jpnChrName: １０日前に立ち寄った人たちの中に 女の人はいませんでしたっ……！？
jpnSearchText:
１０日前に立ち寄った人たちの中に
女の人はいませんでしたっ……！？

engChrName: Yes, I remember there being one. I believe she was the leader.
engSearchText:
Yes, I remember there being one. I believe she was
the leader.
jpnChrName: ああ、いたよ──というか その人がリーダーっぽかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いたよ──というか
その人がリーダーっぽかったけど。

engChrName: She had dark green hair tied back in a ponytail. Honestly, I thought she looked really cool.
engSearchText:
She had dark green hair tied back in a ponytail.
Honestly, I thought she looked really cool.
jpnChrName: 緑がかった黒髪を後ろで括った カッコイイお姉さんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
緑がかった黒髪を後ろで括った
カッコイイお姉さんだったな。

engChrName: Yep... That's Aida, all right.
engSearchText: Yep... That's Aida, all right.
jpnChrName: 間違いありません、 アイーダさんです……！
jpnSearchText:
間違いありません、
アイーダさんです……！

engChrName: It sounds like we're on the right track.
engSearchText: It sounds like we're on the right track.
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: Do you know what happened to 'em after that?
engSearchText: Do you know what happened to 'em after that?
jpnChrName: ……それで、その連中は？
jpnSearchText: ……それで、その連中は？

engChrName: Like, did they say where they were headed, for example?
engSearchText:
Like, did they say where they were headed,
for example?
jpnChrName: この宿に何泊して どちらへ出発したとか分かるかい？
jpnSearchText:
この宿に何泊して
どちらへ出発したとか分かるかい？

engChrName: Normally, I wouldn't share that kind of information out of respect for their privacy, but since you know them, I don't mind sharing what I know.
engSearchText:
Normally, I wouldn't share that kind of information
out of respect for their privacy, but since you know
them, I don't mind sharing what I know.
jpnChrName: うーん、お客さんのプライバシーだけど そっちの子の知り合いみたいだしいいか。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、お客さんのプライバシーだけど
そっちの子の知り合いみたいだしいいか。

engChrName: They stayed here for one night and left first thing in the morning. I don't know where they were going, though, and I haven't seen them since—
engSearchText:
They stayed here for one night and left first thing in
the morning. I don't know where they were going,
though, and I haven't seen them since—
jpnChrName: ──泊まったのは一晩だけで 翌朝早くに出発しちゃったかな。
jpnSearchText:
──泊まったのは一晩だけで
翌朝早くに出発しちゃったかな。

engChrName: Wait, no... That isn't quite right...
engSearchText: Wait, no... That isn't quite right...
jpnChrName: どこへとかは聞いてないけど、 ………でも、ちょっと妙なんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
どこへとかは聞いてないけど、
………でも、ちょっと妙なんだよね。

engChrName: Huh? Whaddaya mean?
engSearchText: Huh? Whaddaya mean?

engChrName: Have you seen one of them recently?
engSearchText: Have you seen one of them recently?
jpnChrName: 何か気になることが？
jpnSearchText: 何か気になることが？

engChrName: Yes, I think so, actually...
engSearchText: Yes, I think so, actually...
jpnChrName: うん、それがさ。
jpnSearchText: うん、それがさ。

engChrName: I'm pretty sure I saw that same woman three days ago.
engSearchText:
I'm pretty sure I saw that same woman three
days ago.
jpnChrName: ３日前にも、そのリーダーっぽい 女の人を村で見かけたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
３日前にも、そのリーダーっぽい
女の人を村で見かけたんだよ。

engChrName: For real?
engSearchText: For real?
jpnChrName: ……なんだと？
jpnSearchText: ……なんだと？

engChrName: So does that mean she's still in the village?
engSearchText: So does that mean she's still in the village?
jpnChrName: そ、それじゃあアイーダさん、 まだこの村に滞在を……！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、それじゃあアイーダさん、
まだこの村に滞在を……！？

engChrName: I think that's doubtful. And honestly, it was also pretty dark out when I saw her, so I might've been wrong.
engSearchText:
I think that's doubtful. And honestly, it was also
pretty dark out when I saw her, so I might've
been wrong.
jpnChrName: いや、それが夜だったから 見間違いかもしれなくって……
jpnSearchText:
いや、それが夜だったから
見間違いかもしれなくって……

engChrName: I didn't see any of her jaeger friends, either.
engSearchText: I didn't see any of her jaeger friends, either.
jpnChrName: 他の連れの人も見なかったから そこまで自信はないんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
他の連れの人も見なかったから
そこまで自信はないんだけど。

engChrName: You know, the more I talk it out, the more I realize I could've been totally mistaken. Sorry for getting your hopes up...
engSearchText:
You know, the more I talk it out, the more I realize I
could've been totally mistaken. Sorry for getting your
hopes up...
jpnChrName: ……ゴメン、なんか無用に 混乱させちゃったかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
……ゴメン、なんか無用に
混乱させちゃったかもしれない。

engChrName: Don't be sorry! It's still a lead worth investigating.
engSearchText: Don't be sorry! It's still a lead worth investigating.
jpnChrName: いえいえ…… ──でもどういう事でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ……
──でもどういう事でしょう？

engChrName: We should ask around town and see if someone else caught sight of her, too.
engSearchText:
We should ask around town and see if someone else
caught sight of her, too.
jpnChrName: 分からんが……とりあえず 村で情報収集した方が良さそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
分からんが……とりあえず
村で情報収集した方が良さそうだ。

engChrName: You've been a big help. I'll order one of the sweeter galettes later as thanks.
engSearchText:
You've been a big help. I'll order one of the sweeter
galettes later as thanks.
jpnChrName: お嬢ちゃん、ありがとよ。 後で甘いガレットも注文するぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢ちゃん、ありがとよ。
後で甘いガレットも注文するぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. I'll hold you to that.
engSearchText: Heehee. I'll hold you to that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、毎度あり。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、毎度あり。

engChrName: I won't pry into your business, but I do hope you enjoy your stay in our village.
engSearchText:
I won't pry into your business, but I do hope you
enjoy your stay in our village.
jpnChrName: なんだか訳アリみたいだけど 折角だしクレイユ村、楽しんでいってね。
jpnSearchText:
なんだか訳アリみたいだけど
折角だしクレイユ村、楽しんでいってね。

engChrName: All right, gang. It's info-gatherin' time.
engSearchText: All right, gang. It's info-gatherin' time.
jpnChrName: さっきも言ったが とりあえず村を一回りしてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきも言ったが
とりあえず村を一回りしてみるぞ。

engChrName: The goal's to determine if Aida really was here three days ago.
engSearchText:
The goal's to determine if Aida really was here three
days ago.
jpnChrName: 猟兵たちの情報に、３日前の夜、 《火喰鳥（アイーダ）》を見かけたって情報──
jpnSearchText:
猟兵たちの情報に、３日前の夜、
《火喰鳥（アイーダ）》を見かけたって情報──

engChrName: If luck's on our side, we'll get some good information in no time.
engSearchText:
If luck's on our side, we'll get some good information
in no time.
jpnChrName: その裏を取るのが最優先だな。
jpnSearchText: その裏を取るのが最優先だな。

engChrName: Fingers crossed!
engSearchText: Fingers crossed!
jpnChrName: はいっ（ウーラ）……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ（ウーラ）……！

engChrName: All right. Let's get started, shall we?
engSearchText: All right. Let's get started, shall we?
jpnChrName: それでは情報収集、開始ですね。
jpnSearchText: それでは情報収集、開始ですね。

engChrName: Hey, you guys.
engSearchText: Hey, you guys.
jpnChrName: おお、あんた達。
jpnSearchText: おお、あんた達。

engChrName: Oh, did you have business outside the village?
engSearchText: Oh, did you have business outside the village?
jpnChrName: おや、村の外に 行ってらっしゃったのかな？
jpnSearchText:
おや、村の外に
行ってらっしゃったのかな？

engChrName: Yeah, but we got it all wrapped up now. How's the bus holding up?
engSearchText:
Yeah, but we got it all wrapped up now. How's the
bus holding up?
jpnChrName: ちょいと野暮用でな。 バスの調子はどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと野暮用でな。
バスの調子はどうだい？

engChrName: Well, it's nothing that can't be fixed, but it'll take us the rest of the day to get it up and running again.
engSearchText:
Well, it's nothing that can't be fixed, but it'll take us
the rest of the day to get it up and running again.
jpnChrName: うーん、何とかなりそうだけど 今日一杯は修理にかかりそうでさ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、何とかなりそうだけど
今日一杯は修理にかかりそうでさ。

engChrName: Thankfully, my supervisors were understanding. They said we can head back tomorrow morning.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, my supervisors were understanding.
They said we can head back tomorrow morning.
jpnChrName: 仕方ないから、会社と相談して出発は 明日の朝にすることになったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
仕方ないから、会社と相談して出発は
明日の朝にすることになったんだ。

engChrName: Still, I'm sorry about this whole situation.
engSearchText: Still, I'm sorry about this whole situation.
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: You said you were headed to some country called Remiferia, right?
engSearchText:
You said you were headed to some country called
Remiferia, right?
jpnChrName: えと、たしか目的地は レミフェリアって国でしたね？
jpnSearchText:
えと、たしか目的地は
レミフェリアって国でしたね？

engChrName: Yeah, and it's not exactly a stone's throw away from here.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and it's not exactly a stone's throw away
from here.
jpnChrName: うん、まだかなり距離もあるし、 夜出発したらそれこそ危ないからね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、まだかなり距離もあるし、
夜出発したらそれこそ危ないからね。

engChrName: And I really don't want to make the trip at night, so we had to make lodging arrangements for all the passengers.
engSearchText:
And I really don't want to make the trip at night, so
we had to make lodging arrangements for all
the passengers.
jpnChrName: それで困ったのが 乗客の今夜の宿なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それで困ったのが
乗客の今夜の宿なんだけど……

engChrName: Oh, really? How'd you work that out?
engSearchText: Oh, really? How'd you work that out?
jpnChrName: ああ、あの宿酒場だと 部屋が足りなくなりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの宿酒場だと
部屋が足りなくなりそうだな。

engChrName: I didn't think the inn had enough rooms for everyone.
engSearchText: I didn't think the inn had enough rooms for everyone.
jpnChrName: そうすると──あんたが？
jpnSearchText: そうすると──あんたが？

engChrName: We actually have a village hall where people can stay in an emergency.
engSearchText:
We actually have a village hall where people can stay
in an emergency.
jpnChrName: ええ、こういう時に来客を 泊められる集会所がありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、こういう時に来客を
泊められる集会所がありましてね。

engChrName: I'm letting the passengers stay there tonight free of charge.
engSearchText:
I'm letting the passengers stay there tonight free
of charge.
jpnChrName: これも何かの縁でしょうし 無償で提供させていただこうかと。
jpnSearchText:
これも何かの縁でしょうし
無償で提供させていただこうかと。

engChrName: That's really nice of you!
engSearchText: That's really nice of you!
jpnChrName: わぁ……！
jpnSearchText: わぁ……！

engChrName: I'm sure they're all breathing a sigh of relief.
engSearchText: I'm sure they're all breathing a sigh of relief.
jpnChrName: 乗客の皆さんも安心ですね。
jpnSearchText: 乗客の皆さんも安心ですね。

engChrName: Yeah, we owe him big time, and our company isn't about to let that debt go unpaid.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we owe him big time, and our company isn't
about to let that debt go unpaid.
jpnChrName: いや～、ほんと有り難いよ。 会社から謝礼は出ると思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、ほんと有り難いよ。
会社から謝礼は出ると思うけど。

engChrName: Speaking of which, they also agreed to pay you, too.
engSearchText: Speaking of which, they also agreed to pay you, too.
jpnChrName: ──そうだ、あんた達への謝礼も 会社がＯＫを出してくれたよ。
jpnSearchText:
──そうだ、あんた達への謝礼も
会社がＯＫを出してくれたよ。

engChrName: They'll wire the mira to you soon. Heck, they might've already done it by now.
engSearchText:
They'll wire the mira to you soon. Heck, they
might've already done it by now.
jpnChrName: 口座に振り込まれてると思うから あとで確認してくれよな。
jpnSearchText:
口座に振り込まれてると思うから
あとで確認してくれよな。

engChrName: Nice! 'Preciate the business, my man. And if you ever find yourself in another jam, just give us a ring.
engSearchText:
Nice! 'Preciate the business, my man. And if you
ever find yourself in another jam, just give us a ring.
jpnChrName: ハハ、毎度あり。 何かあったら相談に乗るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、毎度あり。
何かあったら相談に乗るぜ。

engChrName: Van's group went to the police station and explained the situation to Senior Officer Walley.
engSearchText:
Van's group went to the police station and explained
the situation to Senior Officer Walley.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァン達は駐在所へ行き、 ウェイリー巡査長に事情を説明した。
jpnSearchText:
その後ヴァン達は駐在所へ行き、
ウェイリー巡査長に事情を説明した。

engChrName: Kyle was formally questioned about what had transpired, and Nathan was taken into police custody.
engSearchText:
Kyle was formally questioned about what had
transpired, and Nathan was taken into police custody.
jpnChrName: そして改めてカイルに事情聴取が行われ、 ネイソンの身柄は駐在所に引き取られるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
そして改めてカイルに事情聴取が行われ、
ネイソンの身柄は駐在所に引き取られるのだった。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. There was something else I wanted to run by you.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. There was something else I wanted to run
by you.
jpnChrName: そうそう、村長に相談があるんだが……
jpnSearchText: そうそう、村長に相談があるんだが……

engChrName: Hmm? And what might that be?
engSearchText: Hmm? And what might that be?
jpnChrName: ？　何でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: ？　何でしょうか。

engChrName: Van informed the mayor about the bicycle theft and asked if the culprit could perform community service in Creil to pay for its repairs.
engSearchText:
Van informed the mayor about the bicycle theft and
asked if the culprit could perform community service
in Creil to pay for its repairs.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはウェン村長に自転車泥棒の件を説明し、 暫く働かせたい旨を伝えた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはウェン村長に自転車泥棒の件を説明し、
暫く働かせたい旨を伝えた。

engChrName: Thrilled to have an extra pair of working hands, the mayor accepted and went with them to speak to the inn's owner, Ben, about employing Nathan there.
engSearchText:
Thrilled to have an extra pair of working hands, the
mayor accepted and went with them to speak to the
inn's owner, Ben, about employing Nathan there.
jpnChrName: ウェン村長も快諾し、それならばと 共に宿酒場の店主のベンの下へ赴き事情を説明。
jpnSearchText:
ウェン村長も快諾し、それならばと
共に宿酒場の店主のベンの下へ赴き事情を説明。

engChrName: Ben was all too happy to approve the plan, and thus, Nathan began his stint as a janitor—where he would do menial chores for many weeks to come.
engSearchText:
Ben was all too happy to approve the plan, and thus,
Nathan began his stint as a janitor—where he would
do menial chores for many weeks to come.
jpnChrName: ベンの了承を得て、ネイソンは数週間の間 掃除兼雑用係として働く事になったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ベンの了承を得て、ネイソンは数週間の間
掃除兼雑用係として働く事になったのだった。

engChrName: Quest A Burgled Bicycle completed!
engSearchText: Quest A Burgled Bicycle completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【盗まれた自転車の奪還】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>盗まれた自転車の奪還<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: All right. We're making headway in our investigation. We now know for sure that Aida was here three days ago.
engSearchText:
All right. We're making headway in our investigation.
We now know for sure that Aida was here three
days ago.
jpnChrName: 少しずつ情報は集まっていますけど…… これから、どうしましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
少しずつ情報は集まっていますけど……
これから、どうしましょうか？

engChrName: Not only that, but she was also spotted the following day.
engSearchText:
Not only that, but she was also spotted the
following day.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんが３日前の夜── ううん、一昨日も現れてたこと。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんが３日前の夜──
ううん、一昨日も現れてたこと。

engChrName: We also learned that the monsters around here are acting strange...
engSearchText:
We also learned that the monsters around here are
acting strange...
jpnChrName: ……それと魔獣のおかしな様子ですか。
jpnSearchText: ……それと魔獣のおかしな様子ですか。

engChrName: Yeah... Dunno what to make of that yet.
engSearchText: Yeah... Dunno what to make of that yet.
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: I feel like the puzzle pieces are comin' together, but we're still a few short of the full picture.
engSearchText:
I feel like the puzzle pieces are comin' together, but
we're still a few short of the full picture.
jpnChrName: ──何となく見えてきたが まだ必要な情報が揃ってねえ。
jpnSearchText:
──何となく見えてきたが
まだ必要な情報が揃ってねえ。

engChrName: We'll worry about that later, though. It's about time we head on back to the inn.
engSearchText:
We'll worry about that later, though. It's about time
we head on back to the inn.
jpnChrName: とりあえず今夜は村に泊まるぞ。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず今夜は村に泊まるぞ。

engChrName: Wh-What? We're staying here?
engSearchText: Wh-What? We're staying here?
jpnChrName: そ、その、いいんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: そ、その、いいんでしょうか？

engChrName: There's no way Aida is still in the village. Shouldn't we be out there looking for her?
engSearchText:
There's no way Aida is still in the village.
Shouldn't we be out there looking for her?
jpnChrName: アイーダさんが既にこの村を 出発している可能性もありますよね？
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんが既にこの村を
出発している可能性もありますよね？

engChrName: Not tonight. There's no telling where she might've gone, and I'm not about to go on a wild goose chase.
engSearchText:
Not tonight. There's no telling where she might've
gone, and I'm not about to go on a wild goose chase.
jpnChrName: ああ──だが現時点じゃ、 どこへ向かったか決め手に欠ける。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──だが現時点じゃ、
どこへ向かったか決め手に欠ける。

engChrName: She could be in Remiferia, Ored, Nord Highlands... The list goes on.
engSearchText:
She could be in Remiferia, Ored, Nord Highlands...
The list goes on.
jpnChrName: 可能性としてはレミフェリアにオレド、 遙か北西のノルド高原の可能性すらある。
jpnSearchText:
可能性としてはレミフェリアにオレド、
遙か北西のノルド高原の可能性すらある。

engChrName: Besides...
engSearchText: Besides...
jpnChrName: それに──
jpnSearchText: それに──

engChrName: I'm catchin' a whiff of something, and it ain't the galettes. Something smells fishy here.
engSearchText:
I'm catchin' a whiff of something, and it ain't
the galettes. Something smells fishy here.
jpnChrName: ………ちょっとばかり匂うんだよ。 こんな綺麗で飯も美味い村なのにな。
jpnSearchText:
………ちょっとばかり匂うんだよ。
こんな綺麗で飯も美味い村なのにな。

engChrName: Umm... What do you mean exactly?
engSearchText: Umm... What do you mean exactly?
jpnChrName: 匂う……
jpnSearchText: 匂う……

engChrName: Are you talking about the monsters?
engSearchText: Are you talking about the monsters?
jpnChrName: あの魔獣たちのこと……ですか？
jpnSearchText: あの魔獣たちのこと……ですか？

engChrName: Well, yeah. They're part of it, too.
engSearchText: Well, yeah. They're part of it, too.
jpnChrName: ま、それも含めてだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、それも含めてだ。

engChrName: Anyway, you gotta be prepared to head back to the capital tomorrow, Agnès—with or without us.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you gotta be prepared to head back to the
capital tomorrow, Agnès—with or without us.
jpnChrName: ──いずれにせよアニエス。 明日にはお前一人でも戻ってもらうが。
jpnSearchText:
──いずれにせよアニエス。
明日にはお前一人でも戻ってもらうが。

engChrName: Yes, I know. I'll take a look at the bus schedule soon.
engSearchText: Yes, I know. I'll take a look at the bus schedule soon.
jpnChrName: ……はい、首都行きのバスの時間を ちゃんと調べておきます。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、首都行きのバスの時間を
ちゃんと調べておきます。

engChrName: But first, we should check in at the inn.
engSearchText: But first, we should check in at the inn.
jpnChrName: とりあえず宿で チェックインした方がいいですよね？
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず宿で
チェックインした方がいいですよね？

engChrName: Good idea. The passengers aren't staying there, so they should have an open room or two.
engSearchText:
Good idea. The passengers aren't staying there, so
they should have an open room or two.
jpnChrName: ああ、乗客が別の所に泊まるなら 一部屋くらい空きはあるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、乗客が別の所に泊まるなら
一部屋くらい空きはあるはずだ。

engChrName: Well, here we are. I'm sorry that we didn't have more than one room for you all.
engSearchText:
Well, here we are. I'm sorry that we didn't have more
than one room for you all.
jpnChrName: はい、こちらの部屋だよ。 一部屋しかないけどゴメンね？
jpnSearchText:
はい、こちらの部屋だよ。
一部屋しかないけどゴメンね？

engChrName: Oh, no. That's on us. We should've thought to book two rooms in advance.
engSearchText:
Oh, no. That's on us. We should've thought to book
two rooms in advance.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、急な話ですし……！
jpnSearchText: いえいえ、急な話ですし……！

engChrName: Those beds look super comfy. It's like they're inviting me to climb in, curl up, and conk out.
engSearchText:
Those beds look super comfy. It's like they're inviting
me to climb in, curl up, and conk out.
jpnChrName: ふかふかそうなベッド…… 寝心地良さそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ふかふかそうなベッド……
寝心地良さそうです。

engChrName: We're thinking about eating at around seven. I'll have one of those sweet galettes.
engSearchText:
We're thinking about eating at around seven. I'll have
one of those sweet galettes.
jpnChrName: 夕食は７時くらいだ。 できればデザートも頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
夕食は７時くらいだ。
できればデザートも頼むぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. Coming right up! I'll be sure you get the finest we have.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Coming right up! I'll be sure you get the
finest we have.
jpnChrName: あはは、本当に好きなんだね。 とっておきを用意しておくよ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、本当に好きなんだね。
とっておきを用意しておくよ。

engChrName: In the meantime, please make yourselves comfortable.
engSearchText: In the meantime, please make yourselves comfortable.
jpnChrName: それじゃあごゆっくり～。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあごゆっくり～。

engChrName: Erm...
engSearchText: Erm...
jpnChrName: ………えっと。
jpnSearchText: ………えっと。

engChrName: (It's not like we had any other choice. Besides, Feri's here, too, so it's going to be fine. Yes... Totally fine.)
engSearchText:
(It's not like we had any other choice. Besides, Feri's
here, too, so it's going to be fine. Yes... Totally fine.)
jpnChrName: （仕方ないよね、うん。   フェリちゃんもいるわけだし──）
jpnSearchText:
（仕方ないよね、うん。
フェリちゃんもいるわけだし──）

engChrName: Uhh... You okay, Agnès?
engSearchText: Uhh... You okay, Agnès?
jpnChrName: ？　アニエスさん？
jpnSearchText: ？　アニエスさん？

engChrName: Are you feelin' a little under the weather?
engSearchText: Are you feelin' a little under the weather?
jpnChrName: なんだ、さすがに疲れたか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、さすがに疲れたか？

engChrName: N-No! I'm perfectly fine! Never been better!
engSearchText: N-No! I'm perfectly fine! Never been better!
jpnChrName: いえいえ、大丈夫ですっ！
jpnSearchText: いえいえ、大丈夫ですっ！

engChrName: A-Anyway, the plan was to gather a little bit more information before dinner, right?
engSearchText:
A-Anyway, the plan was to gather a little bit more
information before dinner, right?
jpnChrName: ──それより夕食まで 村で情報を集めるんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
──それより夕食まで
村で情報を集めるんですよね？

engChrName: Then there's no time to waste! Let's drop our luggage here and get back to work!
engSearchText:
Then there's no time to waste! Let's drop our luggage
here and get back to work!
jpnChrName: 荷物を置いたらすぐに出ましょうか！
jpnSearchText: 荷物を置いたらすぐに出ましょうか！

engChrName: Huh? Oh, okay. Should we start with the old guy at the general store?
engSearchText:
Huh? Oh, okay. Should we start with the old guy at
the general store?
jpnChrName: ？　分かりました、とりあえずは 雑貨屋のお爺さんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
？　分かりました、とりあえずは
雑貨屋のお爺さんでしょうか。

engChrName: Sure, sounds good.
engSearchText: Sure, sounds good.
jpnChrName: ああ、それ以外にも 気になるヤツには当たってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それ以外にも
気になるヤツには当たってみるぞ。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: バス会社から謝礼としてミラが振り込まれた。
jpnSearchText: バス会社から謝礼として<C2><C0>ミラが振り込まれた。

engChrName: Interim reports can now be turned in.
engSearchText: Interim reports can now be turned in.
jpnChrName: ＳＰレポートが行えるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＳＰレポートが行えるようになった。

engChrName: Oh? How long have you been standing there?
engSearchText: Oh? How long have you been standing there?
jpnChrName: あれ……君たち。
jpnSearchText: あれ……君たち。

engChrName: Not long. We're sorry if we disturbed you. We were just entranced by your song.
engSearchText:
Not long. We're sorry if we disturbed you. We were
just entranced by your song.
jpnChrName: すみません、 つい聞き入ってしまって。
jpnSearchText:
すみません、
つい聞き入ってしまって。

engChrName: (I feel like I've heard that melody somewhere before...)
engSearchText:
(I feel like I've heard that melody
somewhere before...)
jpnChrName: （あれ、このメロディって……？）
jpnSearchText: （あれ、このメロディって……？）

engChrName: Yeah! Your voice is so soothing. Are you, like, a master musician or something?
engSearchText:
Yeah! Your voice is so soothing. Are you, like, a
master musician or something?
jpnChrName: その…… とっても良かったですっ。
jpnSearchText:
その……
とっても良かったですっ。

engChrName: Haha. I'd hardly call myself a master, but your praise is most appreciated.
engSearchText:
Haha. I'd hardly call myself a master, but your praise
is most appreciated.
jpnChrName: ハハ、恥ずかしいな。 適当に吹いてただけなんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、恥ずかしいな。
適当に吹いてただけなんだけど。

engChrName: Ah, I recognize you. You're the dashing heroes from Edith who saved us from those vicious wolves!
engSearchText:
Ah, I recognize you. You're the dashing heroes from
Edith who saved us from those vicious wolves!
jpnChrName: って、君たちバスを救ってくれた 首都の何でも屋さんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
って、君たちバスを救ってくれた
首都の何でも屋さんだっけ？

engChrName: Oh, you were on that bus?
engSearchText: Oh, you were on that bus?
jpnChrName: ああ──ってことは お前さんもバスの乗客みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ってことは
お前さんもバスの乗客みたいだな。

engChrName: Indeed! I had a front-row seat to the performance. And what a marvelous performance it was!
engSearchText:
Indeed! I had a front-row seat to the performance.
And what a marvelous performance it was!
jpnChrName: うん、君たちの活躍は 車内からバッチリ見せてもらったよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、君たちの活躍は
車内からバッチリ見せてもらったよ。

engChrName: By the by, my name is Melchior. I am but a humble traveling bohemian. A lone wanderer of the world whose only compass is his heart.
engSearchText:
By the by, my name is Melchior. I am but a humble
traveling bohemian. A lone wanderer of the world
whose only compass is his heart.
jpnChrName: 僕はメルキオル、一身上の都合で あちこち旅してる流離い人（ボヘミアン）でね。
jpnSearchText:
僕はメルキオル、一身上の都合で
あちこち旅してる流離い人（ボヘミアン）でね。

engChrName: My heart guided me to a bus at the Messeldam port, and it took me all the way through the capital before stopping here.
engSearchText:
My heart guided me to a bus at the Messeldam port,
and it took me all the way through the capital before
stopping here.
jpnChrName: 北のメッセルダムから首都を経由して あのバスに乗っていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
北のメッセルダムから首都を経由して
あのバスに乗っていたんだ。

engChrName: You traveled all the way here from Messeldam? That's quite the roundabout journey.
engSearchText:
You traveled all the way here from Messeldam?
That's quite the roundabout journey.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムというと 北部の海港都市ですね。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムというと
北部の海港都市ですね。

engChrName: I'm a teensy bit jealous, mister. Traveling the world sounds like loads of fun!
engSearchText:
I'm a teensy bit jealous, mister. Traveling the world
sounds like loads of fun!
jpnChrName: 流浪の旅…… ちょっと憧れます。
jpnSearchText:
流浪の旅……
ちょっと憧れます。

engChrName: Alas, it does not put food on the table. I must stop for work on occasion to keep my howling stomach at bay.
engSearchText:
Alas, it does not put food on the table. I must stop for
work on occasion to keep my howling stomach at bay.
jpnChrName: 気ままな貧乏旅だから バイトしながらではあるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
気ままな貧乏旅だから
バイトしながらではあるけどね。

engChrName: I do not have the luxury of purchasing first-class vehicles like yours. I envy you, my spiky-haired friend.
engSearchText:
I do not have the luxury of purchasing first-class
vehicles like yours. I envy you, my
spiky-haired friend.
jpnChrName: あのピックアップ、格好いいよね。 僕もミラを溜めてマイカーが欲しいなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あのピックアップ、格好いいよね。
僕もミラを溜めてマイカーが欲しいなぁ。

engChrName: Heh. Thanks. I may've got her used, but she's been a great partner to me.
engSearchText:
Heh. Thanks. I may've got her used, but she's been a
great partner to me.
jpnChrName: フフン、まあ元は中古だが。
jpnSearchText: フフン、まあ元は中古だが。

engChrName: Let's steer away from the topic of cars for a sec. Where've you been all day? We didn't see you when we made our rounds earlier.
engSearchText:
Let's steer away from the topic of cars for a sec.
Where've you been all day? We didn't see you when
we made our rounds earlier.
jpnChrName: ──それより、昼に到着した後、 村でお前さんを見かけなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
──それより、昼に到着した後、
村でお前さんを見かけなかったな。

engChrName: Did you go wanderin' off somewhere?
engSearchText: Did you go wanderin' off somewhere?
jpnChrName: どこかブラついてたのか？
jpnSearchText: どこかブラついてたのか？

engChrName: Excellent guess. The hills outside the village piqued my interest, so I decided to take a quick hike over there.
engSearchText:
Excellent guess. The hills outside the village piqued
my interest, so I decided to take a quick hike
over there.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょっと気になってね、 この先の丘陵に行ってたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ちょっと気になってね、
この先の丘陵に行ってたんだ。

engChrName: You took a 'quick hike' all the way out there?
engSearchText: You took a 'quick hike' all the way out there?
jpnChrName: あんな所まで……
jpnSearchText: あんな所まで……

engChrName: I hope you didn't have any run-ins with monsters along the way...
engSearchText:
I hope you didn't have any run-ins with monsters
along the way...
jpnChrName: えと…… 魔獣とか大丈夫でした？
jpnSearchText:
えと……
魔獣とか大丈夫でした？

engChrName: Not at all. I've been traveling for some time now, so I've acquired something of a sixth sense for danger.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I've been traveling for some time now, so
I've acquired something of a sixth sense for danger.
jpnChrName: ああ、結構旅慣れしてるから 危険な気配には敏感でね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、結構旅慣れしてるから
危険な気配には敏感でね。

engChrName: As a result, it was an uneventful trip in that regard. I did manage to see something truly wonderful, though.
engSearchText:
As a result, it was an uneventful trip in that regard.
I did manage to see something truly
wonderful, though.
jpnChrName: 幸いそっちの心配はなくて おかげで良い物が見られたよ。
jpnSearchText:
幸いそっちの心配はなくて
おかげで良い物が見られたよ。

engChrName: Lemme guess: you saw the old stone ruins over there?
engSearchText: Lemme guess: you saw the old stone ruins over there?
jpnChrName: ああ、何でも大昔の 石柱の遺跡があるらしいな？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何でも大昔の
石柱の遺跡があるらしいな？

engChrName: Heard that a big statue was excavated in the area twenty years ago.
engSearchText:
Heard that a big statue was excavated in the area
twenty years ago.
jpnChrName: ２０年前に大きな像なんかも 出土したそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
２０年前に大きな像なんかも
出土したそうだが。

engChrName: Correct. It dates back to the ancient Zemurian civilization. In fact, it should be from the same age as the ruins in Nord.
engSearchText:
Correct. It dates back to the ancient
Zemurian civilization. In fact, it should be from the
same age as the ruins in Nord.
jpnChrName: そうそう、古ゼムリア文明以前のもので ノルドあたりの遺跡と同年代なのかな？
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、古ゼムリア文明以前のもので
ノルドあたりの遺跡と同年代なのかな？

engChrName: Though the statue here was a mere ten arge tall. The one in Nord is much, much larger.
engSearchText:
Though the statue here was a mere ten arge tall.
The one in Nord is much, much larger.
jpnChrName: もっとも像は、ノルドのは数十アージュで こっちは１０アージュくらいらしいけど。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも像は、ノルドのは数十アージュで
こっちは１０アージュくらいらしいけど。

engChrName: Is that right?
engSearchText: Is that right?
jpnChrName: 良い物……何かあんのか？
jpnSearchText: 良い物……何かあんのか？

engChrName: There's a large ruin made up of stone pillars, you see.
engSearchText: There's a large ruin made up of stone pillars, you see.
jpnChrName: フフ、少し行った場所に 大きな石柱の遺跡があるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、少し行った場所に
大きな石柱の遺跡があるんだよ。

engChrName: It dates back to the ancient Zemurian civilization. It's likely from the same age as the ruins in Nord.
engSearchText:
It dates back to the ancient Zemurian civilization.
It's likely from the same age as the ruins in Nord.
jpnChrName: 古ゼムリア文明以前のもので ノルドあたりの遺跡と同年代っていう。
jpnSearchText:
古ゼムリア文明以前のもので
ノルドあたりの遺跡と同年代っていう。

engChrName: Evidently, a ten arge-tall statue was excavated from the area twenty years ago, too.
engSearchText:
Evidently, a ten arge-tall statue was excavated from
the area twenty years ago, too.
jpnChrName: ２０年前には１０アージュくらいの 像なんかも出土したらしいけどね。
jpnSearchText:
２０年前には１０アージュくらいの
像なんかも出土したらしいけどね。

engChrName: Sadly, the church got their grimy little hands on it, and it hasn't been seen since...
engSearchText:
Sadly, the church got their grimy little hands on it,
and it hasn't been seen since...
jpnChrName: ──でもその像は結局、 教会に回収されちゃったそうでさ。
jpnSearchText:
──でもその像は結局、
教会に回収されちゃったそうでさ。

engChrName: It's such a pity. Tourists would have flocked to this village had it remained.
engSearchText:
It's such a pity. Tourists would have flocked to this
village had it remained.
jpnChrName: ホント勿体ないことするよね。 残ってたら観光名所になるだろうに。
jpnSearchText:
ホント勿体ないことするよね。
残ってたら観光名所になるだろうに。

engChrName: Still, I doubt Creil has any trouble attracting tourists. I mean, just look at it: it's gorgeous.
engSearchText:
Still, I doubt Creil has any trouble attracting tourists.
I mean, just look at it: it's gorgeous.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 十分すぎるほど素敵な村ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
十分すぎるほど素敵な村ですけど。

engChrName: Umm... Not to change the subject, but I wanted to ask you something.
engSearchText:
Umm... Not to change the subject, but I wanted to
ask you something.
jpnChrName: はい……あの、それよりも。
jpnSearchText: はい……あの、それよりも。

engChrName: Did you see anyone else when you were over by the hills?
engSearchText:
Did you see anyone else when you were over by
the hills?
jpnChrName: あちらの丘陵で他の人を 見かけたりしませんでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
あちらの丘陵で他の人を
見かけたりしませんでしたか？

engChrName: I can't say I did, no. There were no other living beings in sight.
engSearchText:
I can't say I did, no. There were no other living
beings in sight.
jpnChrName: いや、僕一人だったけど…… この先は民家とかもないしね。
jpnSearchText:
いや、僕一人だったけど……
この先は民家とかもないしね。

engChrName: Got'cha...
engSearchText: Got'cha...
jpnChrName: そう、ですか……
jpnSearchText: そう、ですか……

engChrName: Well, thanks, anyway.
engSearchText: Well, thanks, anyway.
jpnChrName: こっちの事だ、気にすんな。
jpnSearchText: こっちの事だ、気にすんな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Should mention that the bus isn't gonna be leaving till tomorrow now.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Should mention that the bus isn't gonna be
leaving till tomorrow now.
jpnChrName: ──それよりバスだが 出発は明朝になりそうだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
──それよりバスだが
出発は明朝になりそうだぜ？

engChrName: So the mayor will provide a roof over my head? How benevolent of him.
engSearchText:
So the mayor will provide a roof over my head?
How benevolent of him.
jpnChrName: ……成程、村長さんの厚意で 泊まる場所を用意してくれたのか。
jpnSearchText:
……成程、村長さんの厚意で
泊まる場所を用意してくれたのか。

engChrName: Free is the best price, and I'm not about to object to his act of charity. Thank you for telling me.
engSearchText:
Free is the best price, and I'm not about to object to
his act of charity. Thank you for telling me.
jpnChrName: 貧乏旅には助かるねぇ。 ありがとう、これから訪ねてみるよ。
jpnSearchText:
貧乏旅には助かるねぇ。
ありがとう、これから訪ねてみるよ。

engChrName: No prob. We'll be stickin' around here, too, so if you need anything, give us a holler.
engSearchText:
No prob. We'll be stickin' around here, too, so if you
need anything, give us a holler.
jpnChrName: ああ、何か困ったら 明日までなら相談に乗るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何か困ったら
明日までなら相談に乗るぜ。

engChrName: How lovely. I shall keep that in mind!
engSearchText: How lovely. I shall keep that in mind!
jpnChrName: あはは、その時はよろしく。
jpnSearchText: あはは、その時はよろしく。

engChrName: This is the first time I've met someone who calls themselves a bohemian. He's certainly an odd one, isn't he?
engSearchText:
This is the first time I've met someone who calls
themselves a bohemian. He's certainly an odd one,
isn't he?
jpnChrName: うーん、不思議な人でしたね。 流離い人（ボヘミアン）だなんて……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、不思議な人でしたね。
流離い人（ボヘミアン）だなんて……

engChrName: Eh. He knows a good car when he sees one, so he's an all right guy in my book.
engSearchText:
Eh. He knows a good car when he sees one, so he's
an all right guy in my book.
jpnChrName: ま、見所はありそうだけどな。 車の趣味も悪くないみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
ま、見所はありそうだけどな。
車の趣味も悪くないみたいだし。

engChrName: I see it doesn't take much to get on your good side.
engSearchText: I see it doesn't take much to get on your good side.
jpnChrName: そ、そこですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そこですか……

engChrName: Is something the matter, Feri?
engSearchText: Is something the matter, Feri?
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……？
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん……？

engChrName: O-Oh, it's nothing. I was just thinking.
engSearchText: O-Oh, it's nothing. I was just thinking.
jpnChrName: あ……いえ。
jpnSearchText: あ……いえ。

engChrName: Is it just me, or do those hills look like the perfect spot to set up camp?
engSearchText:
Is it just me, or do those hills look like the perfect
spot to set up camp?
jpnChrName: ──あの丘陵、野営には 絶好の地形だなって思って……
jpnSearchText:
──あの丘陵、野営には
絶好の地形だなって思って……

engChrName: I guess it's possible that Aida and her crew could be around there...
engSearchText:
I guess it's possible that Aida and her crew could be
around there...
jpnChrName: 確かに《火喰鳥》たちが 陣を張ってる可能性はあるか。
jpnSearchText:
確かに《火喰鳥》たちが
陣を張ってる可能性はあるか。

engChrName: ...but if they are, they're probably pretty far out. That guy would've spotted 'em over by the hills otherwise.
engSearchText:
...but if they are, they're probably pretty far out.
That guy would've spotted 'em over by the
hills otherwise.
jpnChrName: そうだとしても、さっきの若いのが 見てねぇのなら更に奥地だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
そうだとしても、さっきの若いのが
見てねぇのなら更に奥地だろうが。

engChrName: We can check the area out tomorrow morning. Sun's about to go down, so let's head back to the inn.
engSearchText:
We can check the area out tomorrow morning.
Sun's about to go down, so let's head back to the inn.
jpnChrName: ──あくまでの可能性の一つだ。 もう日が暮れるし、明日にしとけ。
jpnSearchText:
──あくまでの可能性の一つだ。
もう日が暮れるし、明日にしとけ。

engChrName: ...Okay.
engSearchText: ...Okay.

engChrName: Your hunch definitely sounds plausible.
engSearchText: Your hunch definitely sounds plausible.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんたちがクレイユ周辺で 野営地を築いている可能性……
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんたちがクレイユ周辺で
野営地を築いている可能性……

engChrName: We can go over all the information we have once we're back in our room. Surely there's something that will point us in the right direction.
engSearchText:
We can go over all the information we have once
we're back in our room. Surely there's something that
will point us in the right direction.
jpnChrName: 他の情報とも合わせて いったん検討してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
他の情報とも合わせて
いったん検討してみましょうか。

engChrName: (I think we've got enough info at this point.)
engSearchText: (I think we've got enough info at this point.)
jpnChrName: （……一応、現時点で   最低限の情報は集められたか。）
jpnSearchText:
（……一応、現時点で
最低限の情報は集められたか。）

engChrName: (I'm sure we could dig up some more, but we can call it here if we want.)
engSearchText:
(I'm sure we could dig up some more, but we can
call it here if we want.)
jpnChrName: （この後、まだ出てきそうだが……   いったん夕食まで情報を整理するか？）
jpnSearchText:
（この後、まだ出てきそうだが……
いったん夕食まで情報を整理するか？）

engChrName: September 7th, 6:20PM
engSearchText: September 7th, 6:20PM

engChrName: So to recap, Aida's unit stayed at this inn ten days ago.
engSearchText:
So to recap, Aida's unit stayed at this inn ten
days ago.
jpnChrName: ──アイゼンシルトの中隊が ここに泊まったのはちょうど１０日前。
jpnSearchText:
──アイゼンシルトの中隊が
ここに泊まったのはちょうど１０日前。

engChrName: Then they left the next day, and everyone except Aida hasn't been back since.
engSearchText:
Then they left the next day, and everyone except Aida
hasn't been back since.
jpnChrName: 翌朝には出発して他のメンバーは 村に戻ってきていないが……
jpnSearchText:
翌朝には出発して他のメンバーは
村に戻ってきていないが……

engChrName: But Aida herself has been spotted a couple of times now—last sighting being two days ago.
engSearchText:
But Aida herself has been spotted a couple of times
now—last sighting being two days ago.
jpnChrName: 隊長の《火喰鳥（アイーダ）》だけは 一昨日を最後に何度か目撃されている。
jpnSearchText:
隊長の《火喰鳥（アイーダ）》だけは
一昨日を最後に何度か目撃されている。

engChrName: What's more, she's only been seen at night.
engSearchText: What's more, she's only been seen at night.
jpnChrName: しかもどれも夜のタイミングだ。
jpnSearchText: しかもどれも夜のタイミングだ。

engChrName: Yeah, that about covers what we know...
engSearchText: Yeah, that about covers what we know...

engChrName: I guess it's possible that she's working separately from the rest of her unit...
engSearchText:
I guess it's possible that she's working separately from
the rest of her unit...
jpnChrName: 他のメンバーの方と既に別行動を 取っている可能性もありそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
他のメンバーの方と既に別行動を
取っている可能性もありそうですが……

engChrName: ...but why would she do that? I just can't make heads or tails of it.
engSearchText:
...but why would she do that? I just can't make heads
or tails of it.
jpnChrName: その動きが全く分からないというのも 不自然なんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
その動きが全く分からないというのも
不自然なんですよね？

engChrName: Me, neither. We sometimes split up during ops, but it's generally not a good call.
engSearchText:
Me, neither. We sometimes split up during ops, but
it's generally not a good call.
jpnChrName: ……はい、作戦行動中でもない限り、 隊を分ける意味はないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、作戦行動中でもない限り、
隊を分ける意味はないと思います。

engChrName: Though even if she did put her unit on standby...
engSearchText: Though even if she did put her unit on standby...
jpnChrName: でも、他のメンバーがどこかに 待機していると仮定して……
jpnSearchText:
でも、他のメンバーがどこかに
待機していると仮定して……

engChrName: ...why would she send herself out on the field? Why not a scout?
engSearchText:
...why would she send herself out on the field?
Why not a scout?
jpnChrName: アイーダさんだけが訪れているのも やっぱり不自然だと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんだけが訪れているのも
やっぱり不自然だと思うんです。

engChrName: No matter how you slice it, a jaeger commander doin' basic reconnaissance is weird as hell.
engSearchText:
No matter how you slice it, a jaeger commander doin'
basic reconnaissance is weird as hell.
jpnChrName: 確かに、斥候っぽい行動だが 隊長自らってのもおかしな話だ。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、斥候っぽい行動だが
隊長自らってのもおかしな話だ。

engChrName: Oh, and speaking of weird crap, what was with all that junk she was buying?
engSearchText:
Oh, and speaking of weird crap, what was with all
that junk she was buying?
jpnChrName: それに──雑貨屋で買った品についても あからさまに不自然だったな。
jpnSearchText:
それに──雑貨屋で買った品についても
あからさまに不自然だったな。

engChrName: You mean her bulk order of wiring? Yes, that was certainly strange...
engSearchText:
You mean her bulk order of wiring? Yes, that was
certainly strange...
jpnChrName: かなりの量のワイヤー、でしたか。 それ以上に不自然だったのが……
jpnSearchText:
かなりの量のワイヤー、でしたか。
それ以上に不自然だったのが……

engChrName: And the mysteries don't end there. We now know that they haven't come back for food since they left.
engSearchText:
And the mysteries don't end there. We now know
that they haven't come back for food since they left.
jpnChrName: ……１０日前に村を発って以来、 食料を補給していないこと、ですね。
jpnSearchText:
……１０日前に村を発って以来、
食料を補給していないこと、ですね。

engChrName: Yeah. No one saw Aida get some grub, either.
engSearchText: Yeah. No one saw Aida get some grub, either.
jpnChrName: ああ、《火喰鳥》だけにしても 村で食事をした形跡がねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《火喰鳥》だけにしても
村で食事をした形跡がねえ。

engChrName: There's something else that's been buggin' me: if they've been outside the village this whole time, how've they been eating?
engSearchText:
There's something else that's been buggin' me: if
they've been outside the village this whole time,
how've they been eating?
jpnChrName: それに──あれだけの人数が１０日以上も 周辺に滞在したにしては、一つ変な所がある。
jpnSearchText:
それに──あれだけの人数が１０日以上も
周辺に滞在したにしては、一つ変な所がある。

engChrName: ...Now that you mention it, we didn't hear anyone talk about them buying food here, did we?
engSearchText:
...Now that you mention it, we didn't hear anyone
talk about them buying food here, did we?
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、食料を補充した話は どこでも聞きませんでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば、食料を補充した話は
どこでも聞きませんでしたね。

engChrName: We can also rule out the possibility of them eating in the village.
engSearchText:
We can also rule out the possibility of them eating in
the village.
jpnChrName: 確かに……アイーダさんだけにしても 村で食事はしていなさそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……アイーダさんだけにしても
村で食事はしていなさそうですし。

engChrName: Not to mention, somethin' was really off about those wolves.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, somethin' was really off about
those wolves.
jpnChrName: それ以外に気になるとしたら バスを襲った狼型魔獣だが──
jpnSearchText:
それ以外に気になるとしたら
バスを襲った狼型魔獣だが──

engChrName: They were actin' real funny in both fights—especially the second one.
engSearchText:
They were actin' real funny in both fights—especially
the second one.
jpnChrName: 最初戦った時もそうだったが あからさまに普通じゃなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
最初戦った時もそうだったが
あからさまに普通じゃなかったな。

engChrName: Good to know I wasn't the only one who thought that.
engSearchText:
Good to know I wasn't the only one who
thought that.
jpnChrName: ……はい、２度目に戦った時に はっきりと分かりました。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、２度目に戦った時に
はっきりと分かりました。

engChrName: They looked like they were in a daze—no, scratch that. They looked downright petrified.
engSearchText:
They looked like they were in a daze—no,
scratch that. They looked downright petrified.
jpnChrName: なんらかの混乱状態…… ううん、怯えてるような感じでした。
jpnSearchText:
なんらかの混乱状態……
ううん、怯えてるような感じでした。

engChrName: I'm thinking they were driven by fear.
engSearchText: I'm thinking they were driven by fear.
jpnChrName: ものすごく怖い存在への恐れに 突き動かされて暴れてたような……
jpnSearchText:
ものすごく怖い存在への恐れに
突き動かされて暴れてたような……

engChrName: Huh. You may be on to something there.
engSearchText: Huh. You may be on to something there.
jpnChrName: た、確かに…… 言われてみればそんな気がします。
jpnSearchText:
た、確かに……
言われてみればそんな気がします。

engChrName: But what exactly could they have been so fearful of?
engSearchText: But what exactly could they have been so fearful of?
jpnChrName: そうなると── “恐れていた存在は何か”ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
そうなると──
“恐れていた存在は何か”ですよね。

engChrName: That's the question, isn't it? They could just be scared of some other tough monsters, but maybe there are more sinister forces at work here...
engSearchText:
That's the question, isn't it? They could just be scared
of some other tough monsters, but maybe there are
more sinister forces at work here...
jpnChrName: ああ、他の土地から流れてきた 強力な魔獣か、それとも……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、他の土地から流れてきた
強力な魔獣か、それとも……

engChrName: Well, whatever the answer is, I'm more convinced than ever that Aida's unit is somewhere near Creil.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever the answer is, I'm more convinced
than ever that Aida's unit is somewhere near Creil.
jpnChrName: あと、やっぱりアイーダさんたちは 近くに野営地を築いていると思います。
jpnSearchText:
あと、やっぱりアイーダさんたちは
近くに野営地を築いていると思います。

engChrName: There are so many good spots for setting up camp around here.
engSearchText:
There are so many good spots for setting up camp
around here.
jpnChrName: この村の周りのどこか── 候補は幾つかありそうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
この村の周りのどこか──
候補は幾つかありそうですけど。

engChrName: Yeah, like the hills from earlier or the forest on the other side of the buckwheat fields. There's also a place further upstream.
engSearchText:
Yeah, like the hills from earlier or the forest on the
other side of the buckwheat fields. There's also a
place further upstream.
jpnChrName: あの丘陵に、蕎麦畑の向こうの林、 小川の上流なんかも考えられそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
あの丘陵に、蕎麦畑の向こうの林、
小川の上流なんかも考えられそうだな。

engChrName: It still doesn't answer the question of how they're gettin' food, though. Can't picture them strollin' up to a farm and stealin' crops.
engSearchText:
It still doesn't answer the question of how they're
gettin' food, though. Can't picture them strollin' up
to a farm and stealin' crops.
jpnChrName: 食料については分からねえが…… 農作物をくすねるとも思えねぇし。
jpnSearchText:
食料については分からねえが……
農作物をくすねるとも思えねぇし。

engChrName: Heck no! They would never stoop so low!
engSearchText: Heck no! They would never stoop so low!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなことアイーダさんたちが するわけないです……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなことアイーダさんたちが
するわけないです……！

engChrName: It'd be much easier for them to just buy the food from the village.
engSearchText:
It'd be much easier for them to just buy the food from
the village.
jpnChrName: 確かに、それこそ村の方に 売って貰えばいいんでしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、それこそ村の方に
売って貰えばいいんでしょうから。

engChrName: It's not as though they're wanting for mira, right?
engSearchText: It's not as though they're wanting for mira, right?
jpnChrName: ……ミラに困っているということも ないんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
……ミラに困っているということも
ないんですよね？

engChrName: Yeah. The cost of food is chump change compared to weapons and ammo.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The cost of food is chump change compared to
weapons and ammo.
jpnChrName: ああ、武器弾薬に比べたら 食料なんざ大した金額じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、武器弾薬に比べたら
食料なんざ大した金額じゃねえ。

engChrName: And they don't gotta break the bank to afford a ten-day stay here, either.
engSearchText:
And they don't gotta break the bank to afford a
ten-day stay here, either.
jpnChrName: ぶっちゃけ１０日くらいの宿代だって 猟兵には端金みたいなもんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ぶっちゃけ１０日くらいの宿代だって
猟兵には端金みたいなもんだろう。

engChrName: That's why I'm thinkin' there's gotta be something more to this—some answer that's staring us in the face.
engSearchText:
That's why I'm thinkin' there's gotta be something
more to this—some answer that's staring us in
the face.
jpnChrName: ──そうすると“何か”あるわけだ。
jpnSearchText: ──そうすると“何か”あるわけだ。

engChrName: Something that'd force a flock of top-ranking jaegers from their nest and into hiding for ten days straight...
engSearchText:
Something that'd force a flock of top-ranking jaegers
from their nest and into hiding for ten days straight...
jpnChrName: トップクラスの猟兵部隊が人目を忍んで 食料も確保せずに１０日も野営し……
jpnSearchText:
トップクラスの猟兵部隊が人目を忍んで
食料も確保せずに１０日も野営し……

engChrName: ...and something that'd make the commander come to the village at night all by herself.
engSearchText:
...and something that'd make the commander come
to the village at night all by herself.
jpnChrName: 隊長だけが夜に村を訪れるような理由が。
jpnSearchText: 隊長だけが夜に村を訪れるような理由が。

engChrName: Ugh. It feels like we're so close to solving this mystery, but we're still missing the critical pieces to this puzzle.
engSearchText:
Ugh. It feels like we're so close to solving this
mystery, but we're still missing the critical pieces to
this puzzle.
jpnChrName: うーん…… 何かが繋がりそうなんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……
何かが繋がりそうなんですけど。

engChrName: And we can't crack the case without 'em.
engSearchText: And we can't crack the case without 'em.
jpnChrName: ま、材料は揃ってきているが 肝心のピースが足りてねえようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、材料は揃ってきているが
肝心のピースが足りてねえようだ。

engChrName: Which means we gotta do some more—
engSearchText: Which means we gotta do some more—
jpnChrName: そうなると後は──
jpnSearchText: そうなると後は──

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, dinner must—
engSearchText: Hmm? Oh, dinner must—
jpnChrName: あら……？ 夕食に呼びに来てくれた──
jpnSearchText:
あら……？
夕食に呼びに来てくれた──

engChrName: Get away from the door!
engSearchText: Get away from the door!
jpnChrName: 離れてろ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>離れてろ！！

engChrName: Wha—?!
engSearchText: Wha—?!

jpnChrName: っ……！？ この気配──！
jpnSearchText:
っ……！？
この気配──！

engChrName: Sharp as always, Arkride. And I can tell one of your companions is quick on the uptake.
engSearchText:
Sharp as always, Arkride. And I can tell one of your
companions is quick on the uptake.
jpnChrName: いい反応だ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。 もう一人も見所ありそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
いい反応だ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
もう一人も見所ありそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: (Who's that...?)
engSearchText: (Who's that...?)
jpnChrName: （男の人の声……？）
jpnSearchText: （男の人の声……？）

engChrName: You gotta be shittin' me...
engSearchText: You gotta be shittin' me...
jpnChrName: おいおい……冗談だろ。
jpnSearchText: おいおい……冗談だろ。

engChrName: The hell're you doing here?
engSearchText: The hell're you doing here?
jpnChrName: どうしてアンタが現れるんだ？
jpnSearchText: どうしてアンタが現れるんだ？

engChrName: Heheh. Good to see you, too.
engSearchText: Heheh. Good to see you, too.
jpnChrName: クク……つれねえことを言うなよ。
jpnSearchText: クク……つれねえことを言うなよ。

engChrName: Nice job fixing up that truck of yours. It looks brand-spanking new.
engSearchText:
Nice job fixing up that truck of yours. It looks
brand-spanking new.
jpnChrName: あのピックアップはてめえのだろ？ すっかり元通りで何よりじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
あのピックアップはてめえのだろ？
すっかり元通りで何よりじゃねえか。

engChrName: Yeah. No thanks to you, you prick.
engSearchText: Yeah. No thanks to you, you prick.
jpnChrName: くっ……どの口が。
jpnSearchText: くっ……どの口が。

engChrName: Hey there, girlies. The name's Walter.
engSearchText: Hey there, girlies. The name's Walter.
jpnChrName: よう、嬢ちゃんたち。 俺はヴァルターってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、嬢ちゃんたち。
俺はヴァルターってモンだ。

engChrName: My good ol' pal Arkride and I go way back. He helped me out with a job once.
engSearchText:
My good ol' pal Arkride and I go way back.
He helped me out with a job once.
jpnChrName: そこのアークライド先生には 前に依頼した時に世話になってなァ。
jpnSearchText:
そこのアークライド先生には
前に依頼した時に世話になってなァ。

engChrName: A-Ah, it's a pleasure to meet you, then. My name is Agnès, and I'm his—
engSearchText:
A-Ah, it's a pleasure to meet you, then. My name is
Agnès, and I'm his—
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか…… あの、バイト助手のアニエスと──
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなんですか……
あの、バイト助手のアニエスと──

engChrName: Keep away from him, Agnès!
engSearchText: Keep away from him, Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエスさん、下がって！
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん、下がって！

engChrName: F-Feri...
engSearchText: F-Feri...
jpnChrName: フェ、フェリちゃん……
jpnSearchText: フェ、フェリちゃん……

engChrName: Well, this is a surprise. Never thought I'd run into a Kruga kid here.
engSearchText:
Well, this is a surprise. Never thought I'd run into a
Kruga kid here.
jpnChrName: へえ、クルガのヒヨッコか。 面白いのを連れてんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、クルガのヒヨッコか。
面白いのを連れてんじゃねえか。

engChrName: You ain't got much muscle to flex, but your eyes are as sharp as a hawk's.
engSearchText:
You ain't got much muscle to flex, but your eyes are
as sharp as a hawk's.
jpnChrName: ガタイに筋力は足りねえが 眼に天性のバネはありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ガタイに筋力は足りねえが
眼に天性のバネはありそうだ。

engChrName: But I take back what I said about you bein' quick on the uptake. If you think you can come at me with a toy gun, then you're in for a world of hurt.
engSearchText:
But I take back what I said about you bein' quick on
the uptake. If you think you can come at me with a
toy gun, then you're in for a world of hurt.
jpnChrName: ──そんな豆鉄砲が通じると 思い込んでるのは頂けねえがなァ？
jpnSearchText:
──そんな豆鉄砲が通じると
思い込んでるのは頂けねえがなァ？

engChrName: Eep!
engSearchText: Eep!
jpnChrName: ひっ……
jpnSearchText: ひっ……

engChrName: (Wh-Who is he?)
engSearchText: (Wh-Who is he?)
jpnChrName: っ…… （こ、この人……）
jpnSearchText:
っ……
（こ、この人……）

engChrName: Quit scarin' the girls, Direwolf. That's my client you're threatening.
engSearchText:
Quit scarin' the girls, Direwolf. That's my client
you're threatening.
jpnChrName: そのくらいにしとけや、《痩せ狼》。
jpnSearchText: そのくらいにしとけや、《痩せ狼》。

engChrName: And for the record, this is OUR room. You can't just barge in and act like you own the place.
engSearchText:
And for the record, this is OUR room. You can't just
barge in and act like you own the place.
jpnChrName: 人の部屋に無断で入って オラつくのは止めてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
人の部屋に無断で入って
オラつくのは止めてもらおうか。

engChrName: I'm only gonna ask you this one last time: what the HELL are you doing here?
engSearchText:
I'm only gonna ask you this one last time: what the
HELL are you doing here?
jpnChrName: 繰り返すが…… 一体、何をしに現れやがった？
jpnSearchText:
繰り返すが……
一体、何をしに現れやがった？

engChrName: Oh, I'm just here on a little business trip. I arrived in the village just a moment ago...
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm just here on a little business trip. I arrived in
the village just a moment ago...
jpnChrName: クク、ちょっとした野暮用で さっき村に着いたばかりなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ちょっとした野暮用で
さっき村に着いたばかりなんだが。

engChrName: ...and imagine my surprise when I see a familiar truck at the entrance.
engSearchText:
...and imagine my surprise when I see a familiar truck
at the entrance.
jpnChrName: 入口に見覚えのある車があったから あの時の詫びがてら挨拶に来ただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
入口に見覚えのある車があったから
あの時の詫びがてら挨拶に来ただけだ。

engChrName: I figured I'd swing by and say hello. I still owe you an apology, so I thought I'd smooth things over and ask you to take on another—
engSearchText:
I figured I'd swing by and say hello. I still owe you an
apology, so I thought I'd smooth things over and ask
you to take on another—
jpnChrName: ついでと言っちゃなんだが “依頼”でも頼もうと思ってなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ついでと言っちゃなんだが
“依頼”でも頼もうと思ってなァ。

engChrName: Let me stop you right there. I am NEVER taking a job from you again.
engSearchText:
Let me stop you right there. I am NEVER taking a
job from you again.
jpnChrName: ……アンタの依頼は二度と受けねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ……アンタの依頼は二度と受けねえよ。

engChrName: Frankly, I don't give two shits about what brought you here. Now get the hell out of our room.
engSearchText:
Frankly, I don't give two shits about what brought
you here. Now get the hell out of our room.
jpnChrName: 野暮用ってのも興味はねえ。 とっとと出て行ってもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
野暮用ってのも興味はねえ。
とっとと出て行ってもらおうか。

engChrName: Damn, Arkride. Why you gotta be like that?
engSearchText: Damn, Arkride. Why you gotta be like that?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、嫌われたモンだ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、嫌われたモンだ。

engChrName: I thought you took jobs from anyone, so why're you givin' me the cold shoulder?
engSearchText:
I thought you took jobs from anyone, so why're you
givin' me the cold shoulder?
jpnChrName: 他のナンバーにはたまに 融通してるって聞いたんだがなァ？
jpnSearchText:
他のナンバーにはたまに
融通してるって聞いたんだがなァ？

engChrName: 'Cause you're an asshole.
engSearchText: 'Cause you're an asshole.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 相手を選んでるってだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
相手を選んでるってだけだ。

engChrName: Oh, and you can forget about that apology. I got my replacement, so we're square.
engSearchText:
Oh, and you can forget about that apology. I got my
replacement, so we're square.
jpnChrName: あの時の詫びも必要ねえ。 一応、代わりは受け取ったからな。
jpnSearchText:
あの時の詫びも必要ねえ。
一応、代わりは受け取ったからな。

engChrName: But bein' square and goin' back to square one ain't the same thing. You not only burned this bridge—you demolished it. Literally.
engSearchText:
But bein' square and goin' back to square one ain't the
same thing. You not only burned this bridge—you
demolished it. Literally.
jpnChrName: だが許せる事と許せねえ事がある。 ──それだけのことさ。
jpnSearchText:
だが許せる事と許せねえ事がある。
──それだけのことさ。

engChrName: Heheh. Pups like you are a rare breed. I think I'll keep hounding you until you change your mind—or until I wear you down. Whichever comes first.
engSearchText:
Heheh. Pups like you are a rare breed. I think I'll
keep hounding you until you change your mind—or
until I wear you down. Whichever comes first.
jpnChrName: クク、てめえみたいなのは貴重だ。 気が変わるのを気長に待つさ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、てめえみたいなのは貴重だ。
気が変わるのを気長に待つさ。

engChrName: Oh, and as for what I came here for...
engSearchText: Oh, and as for what I came here for...
jpnChrName: ところで野暮用の話だが──
jpnSearchText: ところで野暮用の話だが──

engChrName: ...I'm lookin' for a wild mutt who's been let off his leash—a guy with mint green hair. Ring any bells?
engSearchText:
...I'm lookin' for a wild mutt who's been let off his
leash—a guy with mint green hair. Ring any bells?
jpnChrName: ──若造を見なかったか？ ナヨっとした、ミント髪のヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
──若造を見なかったか？
ナヨっとした、ミント髪のヤツだ。

engChrName: I'll take that silence as a yes. So he's in the village, then?
engSearchText:
I'll take that silence as a yes. So he's in the
village, then?
jpnChrName: なるほど、この村で見たわけか。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、この村で見たわけか。

engChrName: I won't confirm or deny. I'm curious, though. Why're you after him?
engSearchText:
I won't confirm or deny. I'm curious, though.
Why're you after him?
jpnChrName: チッ…… 答えるつもりはねえが──何者だ？
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
答えるつもりはねえが──何者だ？

engChrName: Oh, we're just playing a little game of hide and seek. That's all.
engSearchText:
Oh, we're just playing a little game of hide and seek.
That's all.
jpnChrName: クク、ちょっとした 追いかけっこをしている最中でなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ちょっとした
追いかけっこをしている最中でなァ。

engChrName: I'm not in any rush, though. I think I'll chill here for tonight.
engSearchText:
