I'm not in any rush, though. I think I'll chill here
for tonight.
jpnChrName: ──まあ急ぐ用でもねぇ、 俺も今夜はこの宿でゆっくりするか。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ急ぐ用でもねぇ、
俺も今夜はこの宿でゆっくりするか。

engChrName: I'll stay out of your hair, but remember, I'm always happy to lend a helping hand. Just throwin' it out there.
engSearchText:
I'll stay out of your hair, but remember, I'm always
happy to lend a helping hand. Just throwin' it
out there.
jpnChrName: てめえらの邪魔をするつもりもねえ…… 何なら手を貸すぜ？
jpnSearchText:
てめえらの邪魔をするつもりもねえ……
何なら手を貸すぜ？

engChrName: GET. OUT.
engSearchText: GET. OUT.
jpnChrName: いらねえっつの！
jpnSearchText: いらねえっつの！

engChrName: Whew...
engSearchText: Whew...
jpnChrName: ……はああああっ………
jpnSearchText: ……はああああっ………

engChrName: Feri! Are you all right?!
engSearchText: Feri! Are you all right?!
jpnChrName: フェ、フェリちゃん……！？
jpnSearchText: フェ、フェリちゃん……！？

engChrName: Y-Yeah, I'm fine... That was just...really intense.
engSearchText: Y-Yeah, I'm fine... That was just...really intense.
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫です…… ……ちょっと気が抜けただけで。
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫です……
……ちょっと気が抜けただけで。

engChrName: Who was that guy, Van? He was terrifying...
engSearchText: Who was that guy, Van? He was terrifying...
jpnChrName: あの、ヴァンさん。 今の恐ろしい人はいったい……？
jpnSearchText:
あの、ヴァンさん。
今の恐ろしい人はいったい……？

engChrName: You're, uh, better off not knowing. And that goes double for you, Agnès.
engSearchText:
You're, uh, better off not knowing. And that goes
double for you, Agnès.
jpnChrName: あー……知らない方が身のためだ。 特にアニエス、お前なんかはな。
jpnSearchText:
あー……知らない方が身のためだ。
特にアニエス、お前なんかはな。

engChrName: I'm guessing he's another person from the criminal underworld?
engSearchText:
I'm guessing he's another person from the
criminal underworld?
jpnChrName: それって…… 裏の世界の人っていう事ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
それって……
裏の世界の人っていう事ですよね？

engChrName: In a way, yeah. He's got the bite to back up his bark, so steer clear of him.
engSearchText:
In a way, yeah. He's got the bite to back up his bark,
so steer clear of him.
jpnChrName: 裏も裏、一番ヤバイ手合いだ。
jpnSearchText: 裏も裏、一番ヤバイ手合いだ。

engChrName: I don't envy that self-proclaimed bohemian. He must be in some deep shit if he's the Direwolf's next prey.
engSearchText:
I don't envy that self-proclaimed bohemian. He must
be in some deep shit if he's the Direwolf's next prey.
jpnChrName: あの若造、何をしたか知らねえが 《痩せ狼》に追われてるとは……
jpnSearchText:
あの若造、何をしたか知らねえが
《痩せ狼》に追われてるとは……

engChrName: If that guy knows what's good for him, he'll drop everything and run for the hills.
engSearchText:
If that guy knows what's good for him, he'll drop
everything and run for the hills.
jpnChrName: 今ごろケツまくって 村から逃げてるかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
今ごろケツまくって
村から逃げてるかもしれねえな。

engChrName: I'd probably turn tail if I was in his shoes. I'm staying faaar away from that bloodthirsty bloodhound.
engSearchText:
I'd probably turn tail if I was in his shoes. I'm staying
faaar away from that bloodthirsty bloodhound.
jpnChrName: ……かもしれません。 死をもたらす獣が迫ってるなら。
jpnSearchText:
……かもしれません。
死をもたらす獣が迫ってるなら。

engChrName: Ditto.
engSearchText: Ditto.
jpnChrName: あ、あはは……
jpnSearchText: あ、あはは……

engChrName: (Hmm... I'm beginning to wonder if that guy really is a 'bohemian'...)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... I'm beginning to wonder if that guy really is
a 'bohemian'...)
jpnChrName: （そうなるとあの人の   旅行者という肩書きも……？）
jpnSearchText:
（そうなるとあの人の
旅行者という肩書きも……？）

engChrName: All right. It's almost seven, which means dinner should be ready by now.
engSearchText:
All right. It's almost seven, which means dinner
should be ready by now.
jpnChrName: ──ま、危険なオッサンだが とりあえずは放置しといていい。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、危険なオッサンだが
とりあえずは放置しといていい。

engChrName: The food oughta help us take our mind off that jackass.
engSearchText:
The food oughta help us take our mind off
that jackass.
jpnChrName: そろそろ７時だ。 俺たちは夕食にするぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ７時だ。
俺たちは夕食にするぞ。

engChrName: He's probably drinkin' himself under the table as we speak, but we can just ignore him.
engSearchText:
He's probably drinkin' himself under the table as we
speak, but we can just ignore him.
jpnChrName: 下でヤツが飲んでそうだが構うもんか。
jpnSearchText: 下でヤツが飲んでそうだが構うもんか。

engChrName: I'll treat you all to some ice cream galettes with caramel sauce. A dessert a day keeps the bastards at bay.
engSearchText:
I'll treat you all to some ice cream galettes with
caramel sauce. A dessert a day keeps the bastards
at bay.
jpnChrName: 厄払いにキャラメルソースがけの アイスクリームガレットも付けてやる！
jpnSearchText:
厄払いにキャラメルソースがけの
アイスクリームガレットも付けてやる！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: September 7th, 8:02PM
engSearchText: September 7th, 8:02PM

engChrName: The food was wonderful...but I think I would've enjoyed it more if I wasn't so uneasy.
engSearchText:
The food was wonderful...but I think I would've
enjoyed it more if I wasn't so uneasy.
jpnChrName: ……美味しかったですけど ちょっとだけ緊張しましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……美味しかったですけど
ちょっとだけ緊張しましたね。

engChrName: I just zeroed in on my food and put everything else out of my mind.
engSearchText:
I just zeroed in on my food and put everything else
out of my mind.
jpnChrName: その……わたしは美味しくて 食べるのに夢中になっちゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
その……わたしは美味しくて
食べるのに夢中になっちゃいました。

engChrName: Which is, uh, probably not something a Kruga warrior should be bragging about.
engSearchText:
Which is, uh, probably not something a Kruga
warrior should be bragging about.
jpnChrName: クルガの戦士としてまだまだです。
jpnSearchText: クルガの戦士としてまだまだです。

engChrName: Well, I'm sure the chef would be thrilled that you enjoyed their cooking so much.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm sure the chef would be thrilled that you
enjoyed their cooking so much.
jpnChrName: あはは……折角の料理ですし 何よりですよ、フェリちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……折角の料理ですし
何よりですよ、フェリちゃん。

engChrName: Nothin' wrong with getting the most out of your meals. Eating good food is one of life's finest pleasures.
engSearchText:
Nothin' wrong with getting the most out of
your meals. Eating good food is one of life's
finest pleasures.
jpnChrName: 喰えるときに喰って楽しむ。 それが人生の秘訣ってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
喰えるときに喰って楽しむ。
それが人生の秘訣ってヤツだ。

engChrName: Those galettes were out of this world.
engSearchText: Those galettes were out of this world.
jpnChrName: デザートガレットも絶品だったぜ。
jpnSearchText: デザートガレットも絶品だったぜ。

engChrName: Anyway, now that we've all calmed down, we should get back to business.
engSearchText:
Anyway, now that we've all calmed down, we should
get back to business.
jpnChrName: 《痩せ狼》とあの若造はともかく、 足りないピースを集める必要がある。
jpnSearchText:
《痩せ狼》とあの若造はともかく、
足りないピースを集める必要がある。

engChrName: So we know that Aida's shown up at night multiple times.
engSearchText:
So we know that Aida's shown up at night
multiple times.
jpnChrName: 手がかりは“夜”── 《火喰鳥》が現れたタイミングだ。
jpnSearchText:
手がかりは“夜”──
《火喰鳥》が現れたタイミングだ。

engChrName: This is a prime opportunity to ask people about that. Heck, if we're lucky, we might run into the woman herself.
engSearchText:
This is a prime opportunity to ask people about that.
Heck, if we're lucky, we might run into the
woman herself.
jpnChrName: ……ひょっとしたら 本人が現れるかもしれねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
……ひょっとしたら
本人が現れるかもしれねぇしな。

engChrName: That'd be great!
engSearchText: That'd be great!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: I imagine most people have gone home, but there's sure to be a few who are out and about.
engSearchText:
I imagine most people have gone home, but there's
sure to be a few who are out and about.
jpnChrName: もう帰宅された方も いらっしゃると思いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
もう帰宅された方も
いらっしゃると思いますけど……

engChrName: Both the residents and the visitors might have some useful information for us.
engSearchText:
Both the residents and the visitors might have some
useful information for us.
jpnChrName: 改めて村の人や滞在客から 話を聞くべきかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
改めて村の人や滞在客から
話を聞くべきかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Wow! That's one cool-looking machine. Is it a vehicle?
engSearchText:
Wow! That's one cool-looking machine. Is it
a vehicle?
jpnChrName: わぁ……凄そうな機械ですね。 乗り物、なんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……凄そうな機械ですね。
乗り物、なんでしょうか？

engChrName: Yes, this is called an orbal bike. It's kind of like a bicycle that's powered by orbal energy.
engSearchText:
Yes, this is called an orbal bike. It's kind of like a
bicycle that's powered by orbal energy.
jpnChrName: ええ、導力バイク── 自転車に似た導力器（オーブメント）ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、導力バイク──
自転車に似た導力器（オーブメント）ですよね。

engChrName: Surprised you knew that much.
engSearchText: Surprised you knew that much.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、よく知ってるな。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、よく知ってるな。

engChrName: They first became a thing in the Empire three years ago, but Verne had been looking into the idea around then, too.
engSearchText:
They first became a thing in the Empire three years
ago, but Verne had been looking into the idea around
then, too.
jpnChrName: ３年前、帝国で実用化されたんだが、 ヴェルヌも研究していたらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
３年前、帝国で実用化されたんだが、
ヴェルヌも研究していたらしくてな。

engChrName: A year after that, the four big manufacturers here started flooding the market with 'em.
engSearchText:
A year after that, the four big manufacturers here
started flooding the market with 'em.
jpnChrName: 翌年、四大ライセンシーから 競うように色んなタイプが発売された。
jpnSearchText:
翌年、四大ライセンシーから
競うように色んなタイプが発売された。

engChrName: This bad boy is Red Star's largest bike—and it's fast as hell. Top speed's 2,300 selge an hour.
engSearchText:
This bad boy is Red Star's largest bike—and it's fast
as hell. Top speed's 2,300 selge an hour.
jpnChrName: こいつはレッドスターの大型バイク…… 時速2300セルジュを叩き出すモンスターだ。
jpnSearchText:
こいつはレッドスターの大型バイク……
時速2300セルジュを叩き出すモンスターだ。

engChrName: I'm gonna go out on a limb and guess this thing belongs to the Direwolf.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna go out on a limb and guess this thing
belongs to the Direwolf.
jpnChrName: 多分──というか間違いなく、 《痩せ狼》が乗ってきたんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分──というか間違いなく、
《痩せ狼》が乗ってきたんだろう。

engChrName: I think you're right on the money.
engSearchText: I think you're right on the money.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… いかにもそんな雰囲気ですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
いかにもそんな雰囲気ですね。

engChrName: You'd have to be pretty tall to ride it.
engSearchText: You'd have to be pretty tall to ride it.
jpnChrName: これだけ大型の乗り物、 背が高くないと無理そうです。
jpnSearchText:
これだけ大型の乗り物、
背が高くないと無理そうです。

engChrName: This model just hit the market, so it probably had a hefty price tag. Definitely heftier than my truck's.
engSearchText:
This model just hit the market, so it probably had a
hefty price tag. Definitely heftier than my truck's.
jpnChrName: 出たばかりの新モデルだから ピックアップ以上の値段のハズだ。
jpnSearchText:
出たばかりの新モデルだから
ピックアップ以上の値段のハズだ。

engChrName: Figures that a filthy Enforcer would be rolling in mira.
engSearchText:
Figures that a filthy Enforcer would be rolling
in mira.
jpnChrName: さすが《執行者》、 ミラには困ってなさそうだなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
さすが《執行者》、
ミラには困ってなさそうだなぁ～。

engChrName: It's just not fair. He doesn't deserve a sweet ride after what he did to MY ride.
engSearchText:
It's just not fair. He doesn't deserve a sweet ride after
what he did to MY ride.
jpnChrName: ……俺の愛車を あんな目に遭わせといてよぉ～……
jpnSearchText:
……俺の愛車を
あんな目に遭わせといてよぉ～……

engChrName: I...feel like I'm missing something.
engSearchText: I...feel like I'm missing something.
jpnChrName: え、えと……
jpnSearchText: え、えと……

engChrName: What exactly happened between you two?
engSearchText: What exactly happened between you two?
jpnChrName: あんな目というのは一体……？
jpnSearchText: あんな目というのは一体……？

engChrName: I'm glad you asked. Lemme give you the full rundown: it all started two and a half years ago...
engSearchText:
I'm glad you asked. Lemme give you the full
rundown: it all started two and a half years ago...
jpnChrName: ──よくぞ聞いた。 あれは２年半くらい前の話だ。
jpnSearchText:
──よくぞ聞いた。
あれは２年半くらい前の話だ。

engChrName: U-Umm, wait! Could you just give us the short version plea—
engSearchText:
U-Umm, wait! Could you just give us the short
version plea—
jpnChrName: え、いえあの、 そんなに詳しくなくても──
jpnSearchText:
え、いえあの、
そんなに詳しくなくても──

engChrName: Nope. I'm not skimpin' on any details, so buckle up.
engSearchText: Nope. I'm not skimpin' on any details, so buckle up.
jpnChrName: いいから聞け、裏ルートで 《痩せ狼》の依頼を受けたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いいから聞け、裏ルートで
《痩せ狼》の依頼を受けたんだ。

engChrName: A while back, I got a request from the Direwolf. He runs with a dangerous crowd, so I was hesitant to take it on at first.
engSearchText:
A while back, I got a request from the Direwolf.
He runs with a dangerous crowd, so I was hesitant to
take it on at first.
jpnChrName: “所属”も含めてヤバイ野郎だが、 依頼内容については納得できた。
jpnSearchText:
“所属”も含めてヤバイ野郎だが、
依頼内容については納得できた。

engChrName: But the job sounded simple enough, and there was someone in need of help. Figured it couldn't hurt to back him up.
engSearchText:
But the job sounded simple enough, and there was
someone in need of help. Figured it couldn't hurt to
back him up.
jpnChrName: 何より困ってるヤツがいたから、 運転手とサポートを引き受けて……
jpnSearchText:
何より困ってるヤツがいたから、
運転手とサポートを引き受けて……

engChrName: The two of us drove someplace and beat the shit outta some scumbags.
engSearchText:
The two of us drove someplace and beat the shit outta
some scumbags.
jpnChrName: ゲス極まる連中を叩きのめして 無事、仕事を終えた筈だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ゲス極まる連中を叩きのめして
無事、仕事を終えた筈だったんだ。

engChrName: Then, just when I thought it was all over, they brought out the big guns: a giant Erebonian weapon.
engSearchText:
Then, just when I thought it was all over, they
brought out the big guns: a giant Erebonian weapon.
jpnChrName: ──だが連中はあろうことか、 帝国からの横流し兵器を繰り出してきた。
jpnSearchText:
──だが連中はあろうことか、
帝国からの横流し兵器を繰り出してきた。

engChrName: It was a seven-arge tall humanoid robot that the Empire's nobles used in a war several years back. I imagine they got it off the black market.
engSearchText:
It was a seven-arge tall humanoid robot that the
Empire's nobles used in a war several years back.
I imagine they got it off the black market.
jpnChrName: 全高７アージュ、帝国の貴族軍が 使っていた機械で動く巨大な人型だ。
jpnSearchText:
全高７アージュ、帝国の貴族軍が
使っていた機械で動く巨大な人型だ。

engChrName: I knew immediately that it was way out of our league. I told the Direwolf we should fall back, but he had another bright idea...
engSearchText:
I knew immediately that it was way out of our league.
I told the Direwolf we should fall back, but he had
another bright idea...
jpnChrName: さすがに生身で敵う相手じゃねえ。 撤退するようアイツに言ったら──
jpnSearchText:
さすがに生身で敵う相手じゃねえ。
撤退するようアイツに言ったら──

engChrName: That freakin' bastard threw MY TRUCK at the robot!
engSearchText:
That freakin' bastard threw MY TRUCK at
the robot!
jpnChrName: 俺の……色々カスタムした愛車を 片手で掴んで投げ飛ばしやがった。
jpnSearchText:
俺の……色々カスタムした愛車を
片手で掴んで投げ飛ばしやがった。

engChrName: The attack did the job, of course. He was able to finish it off barehanded after that.
engSearchText:
The attack did the job, of course. He was able to
finish it off barehanded after that.
jpnChrName: 人型は中破──後はヤツが 拳と蹴りだけでブチ壊していった。
jpnSearchText:
人型は中破──後はヤツが
拳と蹴りだけでブチ壊していった。

engChrName: Too bad it came at the expense of my poor baby! He turned her into a pile of scrap metal!
engSearchText:
Too bad it came at the expense of my poor baby!
He turned her into a pile of scrap metal!
jpnChrName: ………俺の愛車？ 完全スクラップに決まってんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
………俺の愛車？
完全スクラップに決まってんだろうが。

engChrName: I-I'm...sorry for your loss.
engSearchText: I-I'm...sorry for your loss.
jpnChrName: そ、その…… ……ご愁傷さまです。
jpnSearchText:
そ、その……
……ご愁傷さまです。

engChrName: But we rode here in it just this morning. I'm guessing you had it fixed at some point?
engSearchText:
But we rode here in it just this morning. I'm guessing
you had it fixed at some point?
jpnChrName: えっと、でも無事、 直せたってことですよね……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、でも無事、
直せたってことですよね……？

engChrName: What? Hell no! You can't fix a car that's been chucked at a giant robot!
engSearchText:
What? Hell no! You can't fix a car that's been
chucked at a giant robot!
jpnChrName: そいつは二代目だ！ 完全大破から直せるわけねーだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
そいつは二代目だ！
完全大破から直せるわけねーだろ！？

engChrName: He gave me this one in a vain attempt to extend an olive branch.
engSearchText:
He gave me this one in a vain attempt to extend an
olive branch.
jpnChrName: あの野郎が迷惑料とかいって 代わりの同型車を用意しただけだ！
jpnSearchText:
あの野郎が迷惑料とかいって
代わりの同型車を用意しただけだ！

engChrName: It's the same model as my old one. The cheap asshole bought it used, but it was in decent enough condition, I guess...
engSearchText:
It's the same model as my old one. The cheap asshole
bought it used, but it was in decent enough condition,
I guess...
jpnChrName: 中古車だが状態は良かったから そこん所は我慢するとして……
jpnSearchText:
中古車だが状態は良かったから
そこん所は我慢するとして……

engChrName: But I ain't acceptin' his apology! I poured my heart, soul, and hard-earned mira into decking my old partner out with custom parts.
engSearchText:
But I ain't acceptin' his apology! I poured my heart,
soul, and hard-earned mira into decking my old
partner out with custom parts.
jpnChrName: 手間暇かけてカスタムした愛車を一瞬で スクラップにされた気持ちが分かるか！？
jpnSearchText:
手間暇かけてカスタムした愛車を一瞬で
スクラップにされた気持ちが分かるか！？

engChrName: I had to do it all over again, and that took me two years! TWO YEARS! That's why I'm holdin' on to this grudge till I'm six arge under.
engSearchText:
I had to do it all over again, and that took me
two years! TWO YEARS! That's why I'm holdin' on
to this grudge till I'm six arge under.
jpnChrName: 元通りにするのに２年も掛かったし！ ……ゼッテー許さねえ………絶対にだ。
jpnSearchText:
元通りにするのに２年も掛かったし！
……ゼッテー許さねえ………絶対にだ。

engChrName: Was that a car horn?
engSearchText: Was that a car horn?
jpnChrName: クラクション……？
jpnSearchText: クラクション……？

engChrName: The hell? Who'd honk their horn in the middle of the night?
engSearchText:
The hell? Who'd honk their horn in the middle of
the night?
jpnChrName: こんな時間に誰か来たのか？
jpnSearchText: こんな時間に誰か来たのか？

engChrName: That's a...strange-looking vehicle.
engSearchText: That's a...strange-looking vehicle.
jpnChrName: えっと、普通の 乗用車とは違いますよね……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、普通の
乗用車とは違いますよね……？

engChrName: It's an off-roader from Leno's range. They're good for drivin' on rough terrain.
engSearchText:
It's an off-roader from Leno's range. They're good for
drivin' on rough terrain.
jpnChrName: レノの導力ＬＣ（ランドキャリア）── 悪路にも向いてるタフな車種だな。
jpnSearchText:
レノの導力ＬＣ（ランドキャリア）──
悪路にも向いてるタフな車種だな。

engChrName: But that emblem is...
engSearchText: But that emblem is...
jpnChrName: だがあのエンブレムは……
jpnSearchText: だがあのエンブレムは……

engChrName: The Bracer Guild?!
engSearchText: The Bracer Guild?!
jpnChrName: ……！ 遊撃士協会（ブレイサーギルド）……！？
jpnSearchText:
……！
遊撃士協会（ブレイサーギルド）……！？

engChrName: *sigh* That was a longer drive than I expected. Oh, and that looks like the bus.
engSearchText:
*sigh* That was a longer drive than I expected.
Oh, and that looks like the bus.
jpnChrName: ふう、遅くなったな。 あれが例のバスか……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、遅くなったな。
あれが例のバスか……

engChrName: Guess they finished the repair job. I should speak with the driver and the authorities so I can get up to speed on what's been happening.
engSearchText:
Guess they finished the repair job. I should speak
with the driver and the authorities so I can get up to
speed on what's been happening.
jpnChrName: 見たところ修理は完了したのか？ 駐在と運転手に話を聞かないと……
jpnSearchText:
見たところ修理は完了したのか？
駐在と運転手に話を聞かないと……

engChrName: Daaamn. Is that an Ingert pickup truck? Someone's got good taste.
engSearchText:
Daaamn. Is that an Ingert pickup truck?
Someone's got good taste.
jpnChrName: へえ、インゲルトのピックアップか。 なかなか趣味がいいじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、インゲルトのピックアップか。
なかなか趣味がいいじゃないか。

engChrName: Holy crap! Am I really seeing Red Star's Monster Machine in the flesh?!
engSearchText:
Holy crap! Am I really seeing Red Star's Monster
Machine in the flesh?!
jpnChrName: ！？　なんだこの導力バイクは…… レッドスターのモンスターマシン！？
jpnSearchText:
！？　なんだこの導力バイクは……
レッドスターのモンスターマシン！？

engChrName: Man. That other ETWS bike is pretty cool, too, but this thing is a work of art. What I wouldn't give to get my hands on one of these...
engSearchText:
Man. That other ETWS bike is pretty cool, too, but
this thing is a work of art. What I wouldn't give to
get my hands on one of these...
jpnChrName: エトワスのモデルも凄かったけど…… ……うーん、こっちも格好いいよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
エトワスのモデルも凄かったけど……
……うーん、こっちも格好いいよなぁ。

engChrName: Heheh. Someone's a fan, huh?
engSearchText: Heheh. Someone's a fan, huh?
jpnChrName: よう、結構好きみたいだな。
jpnSearchText: よう、結構好きみたいだな。

engChrName: Whoa! Where'd you come from? Don't scare me like that.
engSearchText:
Whoa! Where'd you come from? Don't scare me
like that.
jpnChrName: わわっ、人がいたのか…… 驚かせないでくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
わわっ、人がいたのか……
驚かせないでくれよ。

engChrName: Were you all passengers on this bus? I'm from the Bracer Guild, and I have some ques—
engSearchText:
Were you all passengers on this bus? I'm from the
Bracer Guild, and I have some ques—
jpnChrName: ひょっとしてバスの乗客かい？ 俺は遊撃士協会の──
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとしてバスの乗客かい？
俺は遊撃士協会の──

engChrName: Oh, no. Not YOU!
engSearchText: Oh, no. Not YOU!
jpnChrName: お、お前は……！？
jpnSearchText: お、お前は……！？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I remember you. You're the guy who was with Zin and Elaine yesterday.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I remember you. You're the guy who was
with Zin and Elaine yesterday.
jpnChrName: 昨日、首都の駅前で会ったな？ 不動とエレインと一緒だったか。
jpnSearchText:
昨日、首都の駅前で会ったな？
不動とエレインと一緒だったか。

engChrName: I heard you took a train out of town for business. I'm guessin' you wrapped that up early.
engSearchText:
I heard you took a train out of town for business.
I'm guessin' you wrapped that up early.
jpnChrName: 列車で何処かに行ってたようだが、 戻ってくるなりこっちまで出張か？
jpnSearchText:
列車で何処かに行ってたようだが、
戻ってくるなりこっちまで出張か？

engChrName: Were you asked to come here afterwards? Phew. No rest for the weary, huh?
engSearchText:
Were you asked to come here afterwards? Phew.
No rest for the weary, huh?
jpnChrName: えっと……お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: えっと……お疲れ様です。

engChrName: Ah, well... It's all part of the job. Everyone else's hands are tied, so I decided to come—
engSearchText:
Ah, well... It's all part of the job. Everyone else's
hands are tied, so I decided to come—
jpnChrName: いや、ジンさんたちと違って こっちの用事はすぐ終わったから……
jpnSearchText:
いや、ジンさんたちと違って
こっちの用事はすぐ終わったから……

engChrName: Wait, that's not important!
engSearchText: Wait, that's not important!
jpnChrName: ───じゃなくて！
jpnSearchText: ───じゃなくて！

engChrName: My name is Alvis. I'm a C-rank bracer.
engSearchText: My name is Alvis. I'm a C-rank bracer.
jpnChrName: ──俺はアルヴィス、 共和国ギルドのＣ級遊撃士だ。
jpnSearchText:
──俺はアルヴィス、
共和国ギルドのＣ級遊撃士だ。

engChrName: There's no need to introduce yourself, Van Arkride. I'm well aware of you and your 'profession.'
engSearchText:
There's no need to introduce yourself, Van Arkride.
I'm well aware of you and your 'profession.'
jpnChrName: 胡散臭い汚れ仕事をやっている ヴァン・アークライドだったな？
jpnSearchText:
胡散臭い汚れ仕事をやっている
ヴァン・アークライドだったな？

engChrName: Instead, why don't YOU explain what you're doing HERE, hmm?
engSearchText:
Instead, why don't YOU explain what you're doing
HERE, hmm?
jpnChrName: 一体どうしてこの村にいる……！？
jpnSearchText: 一体どうしてこの村にいる……！？

engChrName: Classified. If you want that info, you gotta join the Arkride Solutions crew.
engSearchText:
Classified. If you want that info, you gotta join the
Arkride Solutions crew.
jpnChrName: ちょっとした野暮用でな。 ま、お前さんとは関係ないさ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとした野暮用でな。
ま、お前さんとは関係ないさ。

engChrName: You should be glad we were in the area, though, since we saved that bus and everyone on it.
engSearchText:
You should be glad we were in the area, though, since
we saved that bus and everyone on it.
jpnChrName: ちなみに聞いてるかもしれねえが、 昼間バスの危機を救ったのは俺たちだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに聞いてるかもしれねえが、
昼間バスの危機を救ったのは俺たちだぞ？

engChrName: Wh-What? You did?!
engSearchText: Wh-What? You did?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだと……！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだと……！？

engChrName: Wait, no... I remember hearing that. I also heard you demanded compensation for it.
engSearchText:
Wait, no... I remember hearing that. I also heard you
demanded compensation for it.
jpnChrName: ──いやいや、聞いた話によれば 厚かましくも謝礼を要求したそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
──いやいや、聞いた話によれば
厚かましくも謝礼を要求したそうだな？

engChrName: What kind of man seeks to profit off those in peril? No bracer would ever dream of doing such a thing!
engSearchText:
What kind of man seeks to profit off those in peril?
No bracer would ever dream of doing such a thing!
jpnChrName: 緊急時の人命救助でミラを取るなんて 少なくとも遊撃士じゃあり得ない！
jpnSearchText:
緊急時の人命救助でミラを取るなんて
少なくとも遊撃士じゃあり得ない！

engChrName: Not only that, but you have the GALL to charge higher rates than us. Have you no shame?!
engSearchText:
Not only that, but you have the GALL to charge
higher rates than us. Have you no shame?!
jpnChrName: ギルドより割高な依頼料も含めて 恥ずかしいとは思わないのか！？
jpnSearchText:
ギルドより割高な依頼料も含めて
恥ずかしいとは思わないのか！？

engChrName: Uhh. Not really?
engSearchText: Uhh. Not really?
jpnChrName: って言われてもねぇ……
jpnSearchText: って言われてもねぇ……

engChrName: Urgh! At least try to come up with an explanation for your actions!
engSearchText:
Urgh! At least try to come up with an explanation for
your actions!
jpnChrName: 耳をホジるなあああっ！
jpnSearchText: 耳をホジるなあああっ！

engChrName: Excuse me. May I interject for a moment?
engSearchText: Excuse me. May I interject for a moment?
jpnChrName: ──あの、ちょっといいですか？
jpnSearchText: ──あの、ちょっといいですか？

engChrName: I initially had reservations about his handling of the bus incident as well.
engSearchText:
I initially had reservations about his handling of the
bus incident as well.
jpnChrName: 私もバスの件については最初、 少し気になっていたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
私もバスの件については最初、
少し気になっていたんですけど……

engChrName: However, I've come to the conclusion that Van's price was perfectly reasonable, given the risk involved.
engSearchText:
However, I've come to the conclusion that Van's price
was perfectly reasonable, given the risk involved.
jpnChrName: 謝礼と言っても常識の範囲内でしたし、 ヴァンさんは遊撃士ではありません。
jpnSearchText:
謝礼と言っても常識の範囲内でしたし、
ヴァンさんは遊撃士ではありません。

engChrName: Also, I would like clarification on one of your points: why should he be expected to behave like a bracer when he isn't one?
engSearchText:
Also, I would like clarification on one of your points:
why should he be expected to behave like a bracer
when he isn't one?
jpnChrName: 同じ対応を要求するのは筋違いでは？
jpnSearchText: 同じ対応を要求するのは筋違いでは？

engChrName: H-Huh? Well, umm...
engSearchText: H-Huh? Well, umm...
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Furthermore, the guild receives financial aid from the Epstein Foundation. Unlike you, Van doesn't have that privilege.
engSearchText:
Furthermore, the guild receives financial aid from the
Epstein Foundation. Unlike you, Van doesn't have
that privilege.
jpnChrName: ギルドの運営費はエプスタイン財団の 基金からも賄われているそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの運営費はエプスタイン財団の
基金からも賄われているそうですし。

engChrName: So it only makes sense that he would charge a little more than you. He has to make ends meet, too, you know.
engSearchText:
So it only makes sense that he would charge a little
more than you. He has to make ends meet, too,
you know.
jpnChrName: 後ろ盾が無いことを考えると、 多少割高な依頼料も仕方ない気がします。
jpnSearchText:
後ろ盾が無いことを考えると、
多少割高な依頼料も仕方ない気がします。

engChrName: I truly admire the guild's ideals—and that's precisely why I'm disappointed to see you chastise one of the people you are sworn to protect and serve.
engSearchText:
I truly admire the guild's ideals—and that's precisely
why I'm disappointed to see you chastise one of the
people you are sworn to protect and serve.
jpnChrName: ……ギルドの理念は尊敬していますけど、 ちょっとだけ言い方が乱暴のような……
jpnSearchText:
……ギルドの理念は尊敬していますけど、
ちょっとだけ言い方が乱暴のような……

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: え、いや、その……
jpnSearchText: え、いや、その……

engChrName: Got 'em.
engSearchText: Got 'em.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。 確かにその通りかもです。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど。
確かにその通りかもです。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: (Ugh. First Elaine stuck up for this no-good punk, and now this girl's doing the same... Why?!)
engSearchText:
(Ugh. First Elaine stuck up for this no-good punk,
and now this girl's doing the same... Why?!)
jpnChrName: （……くっ、エレインさんだけじゃなく、   こんな娘さんまで味方に付けて……）
jpnSearchText:
（……くっ、エレインさんだけじゃなく、
こんな娘さんまで味方に付けて……）

engChrName: (He must've brainwashed them all! That's the only explanation!)
engSearchText:
(He must've brainwashed them all! That's the
only explanation!)
jpnChrName: （よく見ればそっちも女の子？   なんなんだ、コイツは……！？）
jpnSearchText:
（よく見ればそっちも女の子？
なんなんだ、コイツは……！？）

engChrName: Okay, okay. I'll admit that I was a BIT out of line. And you have my thanks for saving the bus...
engSearchText:
Okay, okay. I'll admit that I was a BIT out of line.
And you have my thanks for saving the bus...
jpnChrName: ──言いがかりだったのは認めよう。 バスを救ったのも良くやった。
jpnSearchText:
──言いがかりだったのは認めよう。
バスを救ったのも良くやった。

engChrName: ...but I suggest you back off from here, spriggan! The Bracer Guild's on the case now, so your presence is no longer required!
engSearchText:
...but I suggest you back off from here, spriggan!
The Bracer Guild's on the case now, so your presence
is no longer required!
jpnChrName: だが、いい気になるなよ裏解決屋！？ ここから先は遊撃士の仕事だ！
jpnSearchText:
だが、いい気になるなよ裏解決屋！？
ここから先は遊撃士の仕事だ！

engChrName: We'll have this monster mystery squared away in no time flat, so if you could mosey on over to the sidelines, that'd be swell!
engSearchText:
We'll have this monster mystery squared away in no
time flat, so if you could mosey on over to the
sidelines, that'd be swell!
jpnChrName: おかしな魔獣の件、こちらの解決を 指を咥えて眺めているんだな──！
jpnSearchText:
おかしな魔獣の件、こちらの解決を
指を咥えて眺めているんだな──！

engChrName: ...Wow. Rude much?
engSearchText: ...Wow. Rude much?
jpnChrName: ……わたしの知っている 遊撃士とはちょっと違うような。
jpnSearchText:
……わたしの知っている
遊撃士とはちょっと違うような。

engChrName: I've never met a hot-headed bracer before. All the ones I've run into back home were pretty chill.
engSearchText:
I've never met a hot-headed bracer before. All the
ones I've run into back home were pretty chill.
jpnChrName: 戦士団とは対立していたものの、 落ち着いた人たちでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
戦士団とは対立していたものの、
落ち着いた人たちでしたが……

engChrName: Oh, I didn't realize the guild had branches in the Central East.
engSearchText:
Oh, I didn't realize the guild had branches in the
Central East.
jpnChrName: あ、大陸の中東部にも ギルドの支部はあるんですね？
jpnSearchText:
あ、大陸の中東部にも
ギルドの支部はあるんですね？

engChrName: Wouldn't be living up to their ideals if they didn't.
engSearchText: Wouldn't be living up to their ideals if they didn't.
jpnChrName: それが連中の理念だからな。
jpnSearchText: それが連中の理念だからな。

engChrName: He ain't exactly mature, but he's gotta be at least a little strong if he made it to C-rank.
engSearchText:
He ain't exactly mature, but he's gotta be at least a
little strong if he made it to C-rank.
jpnChrName: ヤツも若造丸出しだが Ｃ級ならそこそこ腕は立つ筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツも若造丸出しだが
Ｃ級ならそこそこ腕は立つ筈だ。

engChrName: Might be able to make use of him later. Heheheh.
engSearchText: Might be able to make use of him later. Heheheh.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… いざって時はアテにしておくか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
いざって時はアテにしておくか。

engChrName: Umm, Van? You do realize you're sounding like a villain, right?
engSearchText:
Umm, Van? You do realize you're sounding like a
villain, right?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん…… また何か考えています？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……
また何か考えています？

engChrName: I wonder where he ran off to?
engSearchText: I wonder where he ran off to?
jpnChrName: ……あの人、 どこに行ったんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
……あの人、
どこに行ったんでしょう？

engChrName: Probably the police station. We can make our way over there later.
engSearchText:
Probably the police station. We can make our way
over there later.
jpnChrName: 多分、駐在所だろうな。 気が向いたら行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
多分、駐在所だろうな。
気が向いたら行ってみるか。

engChrName: Well, we managed to gather a lot of information in record time.
engSearchText:
Well, we managed to gather a lot of information in
record time.
jpnChrName: ……気になる情報が 色々と入ってきましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……気になる情報が
色々と入ってきましたね。

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.

engChrName: I think we can just ignore that bracer for now.
engSearchText: I think we can just ignore that bracer for now.
jpnChrName: ギルドの若造が来たのはいいとして。
jpnSearchText: ギルドの若造が来たのはいいとして。

engChrName: Though I'm surprised we never ran into that mint-haired guy.
engSearchText:
Though I'm surprised we never ran into that
mint-haired guy.
jpnChrName: 《痩せ狼》が追ってる あの若いのは村で見かけなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
《痩せ狼》が追ってる
あの若いのは村で見かけなかったな。

engChrName: Then there's the story we heard at the factory.
engSearchText: Then there's the story we heard at the factory.
jpnChrName: それと──工房で聞いた話か。
jpnSearchText: それと──工房で聞いた話か。

engChrName: The one about the gasoline, right? Yeah...
engSearchText: The one about the gasoline, right? Yeah...
jpnChrName: はい……ガソリン、ですね。
jpnSearchText: はい……ガソリン、ですね。

engChrName: That liquid was once a common fuel source for machines, but now it's mainly used as a solvent or for starting fires...
engSearchText:
That liquid was once a common fuel source for
machines, but now it's mainly used as a solvent
or for starting fires...
jpnChrName: 昔の機械に使われてた、今は溶剤か 燃焼剤としてのみ使われる液体……
jpnSearchText:
昔の機械に使われてた、今は溶剤か
燃焼剤としてのみ使われる液体……

engChrName: Our clan keeps some in storage for certain weapons, too.
engSearchText:
Our clan keeps some in storage for certain
weapons, too.
jpnChrName: クルガの里でも一部の武器用に 保管されていた覚えがあります。
jpnSearchText:
クルガの里でも一部の武器用に
保管されていた覚えがあります。

engChrName: I heard you can find the substance it's made from in the Central East.
engSearchText:
I heard you can find the substance it's made from in
the Central East.
jpnChrName: たしか大陸中東の地下から 原料が採取されるんでしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
たしか大陸中東の地下から
原料が採取されるんでしたよね。

engChrName: But why would Aida need something like that?
engSearchText: But why would Aida need something like that?
jpnChrName: でも……一体どうしてそんなものを？
jpnSearchText: でも……一体どうしてそんなものを？

engChrName: Could ask the same thing about the wires.
engSearchText: Could ask the same thing about the wires.
jpnChrName: 手に入れた大量のワイヤーにも 関係してそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
手に入れた大量のワイヤーにも
関係してそうだが……

engChrName: Ah! There you are!
engSearchText: Ah! There you are!
jpnChrName: ──あ、お客さん！ ちょうど良かったよ！
jpnSearchText:
──あ、お客さん！
ちょうど良かったよ！

engChrName: Oh, hey. What's up?
engSearchText: Oh, hey. What's up?
jpnChrName: ？　どうした嬢ちゃん。
jpnSearchText: ？　どうした嬢ちゃん。

engChrName: You know that woman you were asking about earlier?
engSearchText: You know that woman you were asking about earlier?
jpnChrName: どうしたもこうしたも……
jpnSearchText: どうしたもこうしたも……

engChrName: Well, she just dropped by the inn!
engSearchText: Well, she just dropped by the inn!
jpnChrName: ──つい今しがた、 例のお姉さんが立ち寄ってさ！
jpnSearchText:
──つい今しがた、
例のお姉さんが立ち寄ってさ！

engChrName: Wait, what?!
engSearchText: Wait, what?!
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: Aida came here? For real?!
engSearchText: Aida came here? For real?!
jpnChrName: ア、アイーダさんが！？
jpnSearchText: ア、アイーダさんが！？

engChrName: She asked me to do something for her and then darted off before I could mention you were looking for her.
engSearchText:
She asked me to do something for her and then
darted off before I could mention you were looking
for her.
jpnChrName: うん、お客さんたちの話をする間もなく 頼み事をして、すぐ行っちゃってさ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、お客さんたちの話をする間もなく
頼み事をして、すぐ行っちゃってさ。

engChrName: She left three letters with me. One of them is addressed to an...'Eisenschild'?
engSearchText:
She left three letters with me. One of them is
addressed to an...'Eisenschild'?
jpnChrName: 手紙を３つ預かったんだけど…… これは《アイゼンシルト》って所かな？
jpnSearchText:
手紙を３つ預かったんだけど……
これは《アイゼンシルト》って所かな？

engChrName: Another's to the guild branch in the capital, and the last one is to a 'Kruga'... That's not in Calvard, right?
engSearchText:
Another's to the guild branch in the capital, and the
last one is to a 'Kruga'... That's not in Calvard, right?
jpnChrName: あと首都のギルドと、《クルガ》── これは外国に送るものみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
あと首都のギルドと、《クルガ》──
これは外国に送るものみたいだね。

engChrName: She left me some money to mail them out, but when I opened the envelope, there was 10,000 mira inside.
engSearchText:
She left me some money to mail them out, but when
I opened the envelope, there was 10,000 mira inside.
jpnChrName: 一緒に手間賃を貰ったんだけど 封筒に１万ミラとか入っててさ……！
jpnSearchText:
一緒に手間賃を貰ったんだけど
封筒に１万ミラとか入っててさ……！

engChrName: I don't need this much just to send a few letters... That's why I ran out after her.
engSearchText:
I don't need this much just to send a few letters...
That's why I ran out after her.
jpnChrName: こんな大金受け取れないから 慌てて追いかけようとしたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
こんな大金受け取れないから
慌てて追いかけようとしたんだけど……

engChrName: Also, she looked...dreadfully pale. If it's not too much to ask, could you go look for her?
engSearchText:
Also, she looked...dreadfully pale. If it's not too much
to ask, could you go look for her?
jpnChrName: ……そういえば調子も悪そうだったな。 よかったらお客さん達に頼めないかな？
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば調子も悪そうだったな。
よかったらお客さん達に頼めないかな？

engChrName: Aida!
engSearchText: Aida!
jpnChrName: アイーダさんっ……！
jpnSearchText: アイーダさんっ……！

engChrName: Hey, wait up, kiddo! ...We're going after her!
engSearchText: Hey, wait up, kiddo! ...We're going after her!
jpnChrName: おい待て……！ ──俺たちも行くぞ！
jpnSearchText:
おい待て……！
──俺たちも行くぞ！

engChrName: R-Right! We'll take care of this, so don't worry!
engSearchText: R-Right! We'll take care of this, so don't worry!
jpnChrName: は、はい……！ とりあえずお任せください！
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……！
とりあえずお任せください！

engChrName: Heh. Now that's a face I didn't expect to see. Not here, anyway.
engSearchText:
Heh. Now that's a face I didn't expect to see.
Not here, anyway.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 面白ぇ女を見かけたと思えば。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
面白ぇ女を見かけたと思えば。

engChrName: She must be in dire straits if she didn't notice me.
engSearchText: She must be in dire straits if she didn't notice me.
jpnChrName: この俺に気付かなかった事といい、 何やらありそうじゃねえか──
jpnSearchText:
この俺に気付かなかった事といい、
何やらありそうじゃねえか──

engChrName: Aida! Where are you?!
engSearchText: Aida! Where are you?!
jpnChrName: アイーダさん、どこに……！？
jpnSearchText: アイーダさん、どこに……！？

engChrName: Cool your jets, Feri!
engSearchText: Cool your jets, Feri!
jpnChrName: ──おい、落ち着け！
jpnSearchText: ──おい、落ち着け！

engChrName: She can't have gone that far. Let's head to one of the exits and see if we can find her.
engSearchText:
She can't have gone that far. Let's head to one of the
exits and see if we can find her.
jpnChrName: まだ遠くには行ってねえ筈だ。 どちらかの出口に行ってみるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
まだ遠くには行ってねえ筈だ。
どちらかの出口に行ってみるぞ！

engChrName: U-Understood!
engSearchText: U-Understood!
jpnChrName: は、はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ……！

engChrName: If she really is unwell, we should hurry!
engSearchText: If she really is unwell, we should hurry!
jpnChrName: 調子が悪そうだったみたいですし 急いだ方が良さそうですね……！
jpnSearchText:
調子が悪そうだったみたいですし
急いだ方が良さそうですね……！

engChrName: Aida!
engSearchText: Aida!
jpnChrName: アイーダさん……！！
jpnSearchText: アイーダさん……！！

engChrName: Feri?!
engSearchText: Feri?!
jpnChrName: フェリ……！？
jpnSearchText: フェリ……！？

engChrName: Haha... I'm not dreaming, am I?
engSearchText: Haha... I'm not dreaming, am I?
jpnChrName: ハハ、驚いたね…… 夢でも見てんのかい……？
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、驚いたね……
夢でも見てんのかい……？

engChrName: And after I went through all the trouble to write a letter and drop it off at the inn...
engSearchText:
And after I went through all the trouble to write a
letter and drop it off at the inn...
jpnChrName: フフ……ちょうどさっき、 アンタへの手紙を預けた所だよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……ちょうどさっき、
アンタへの手紙を預けた所だよ。

engChrName: I'm gonna assume our regimental commander got in touch with your people. He asked about us, didn't he?
engSearchText:
I'm gonna assume our regimental commander got in
touch with your people. He asked about us, didn't he?
jpnChrName: ひょっとしてウチの連隊長が クルガにも問い合わせたのかい……？
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとしてウチの連隊長が
クルガにも問い合わせたのかい……？

engChrName: Yes! You really had me worried, you know! I thought something might've happened to you!
engSearchText:
Yes! You really had me worried, you know! I thought
something might've happened to you!
jpnChrName: はいっ、それでわたし、 アイーダさんのことが心配で……！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、それでわたし、
アイーダさんのことが心配で……！

engChrName: I just had to track you down. That's why I went straight to Calvard's capital and enlisted the help of a spriggan.
engSearchText:
I just had to track you down. That's why I went
straight to Calvard's capital and enlisted the help of
a spriggan.
jpnChrName: カルバードの首都でこちらの 裏解決屋さんを捜して、それでっ……！
jpnSearchText:
カルバードの首都でこちらの
裏解決屋さんを捜して、それでっ……！

engChrName: Oh, I've heard quite a few stories about you. Heheh. Nice to finally meet you face to face.
engSearchText:
Oh, I've heard quite a few stories about you. Heheh.
Nice to finally meet you face to face.
jpnChrName: アンタは……… ……フフ、噂は聞いていたが。
jpnSearchText:
アンタは………
……フフ、噂は聞いていたが。

engChrName: The pleasure's mine. My name is Van Arkride. Dunno if you remember, but we fought on the same side two years ago.
engSearchText:
The pleasure's mine. My name is Van Arkride.
Dunno if you remember, but we fought on the same
side two years ago.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・アークライドだ。 ２年前に世話になったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・アークライドだ。
２年前に世話になったようだな。

engChrName: Mind telling us what's going on? You, uhh, don't look so hot.
engSearchText:
Mind telling us what's going on? You, uhh, don't look
so hot.
jpnChrName: ……だいぶ辛そうだが何があった？
jpnSearchText: ……だいぶ辛そうだが何があった？

engChrName: You aren't hurt, are you? Here, let me—
engSearchText: You aren't hurt, are you? Here, let me—
jpnChrName: そ、そうですよ……！ どこかケガでも──
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですよ……！
どこかケガでも──

engChrName: Stay away from me!
engSearchText: Stay away from me!
jpnChrName: 近づくんじゃないよ！！
jpnSearchText: 近づくんじゃないよ！！

engChrName: A-Aida? What's wrong?
engSearchText: A-Aida? What's wrong?
jpnChrName: ……！ ア、アイーダさん……？
jpnSearchText:
……！
ア、アイーダさん……？

engChrName: Sorry. Didn't mean to lash out at you.
engSearchText: Sorry. Didn't mean to lash out at you.
jpnChrName: ああ、そんな顔すんな。 アンタが悪いわけじゃない……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そんな顔すんな。
アンタが悪いわけじゃない……

engChrName: But really, there's...nothing you can do for me now.
engSearchText: But really, there's...nothing you can do for me now.
jpnChrName: ちょっとばかり遅すぎた…… ただ……それだけのことさ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとばかり遅すぎた……
ただ……それだけのことさ。

engChrName: I don't think we're quite on the same page here.
engSearchText: I don't think we're quite on the same page here.
jpnChrName: その…… 何か事情がおありなんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
その……
何か事情がおありなんですよね？

engChrName: Could you fill us in on what's going on? There may be something we can do to help.
engSearchText:
Could you fill us in on what's going on? There may
be something we can do to help.
jpnChrName: お力になれるかもしれませんし、 話していただけませんか……？
jpnSearchText:
お力になれるかもしれませんし、
話していただけませんか……？

engChrName: Huh? Who're you?
engSearchText: Huh? Who're you?
jpnChrName: ……？　お嬢ちゃんは……
jpnSearchText: ……？　お嬢ちゃんは……

engChrName: She's a part-timer at my office. More importantly, are you—
engSearchText:
She's a part-timer at my office. More importantly, are
you—
jpnChrName: ウチのバイト助手だ。 それよりアンタ、ひょっとして──
jpnSearchText:
ウチのバイト助手だ。
それよりアンタ、ひょっとして──

engChrName: Hey! What are you doing over there?
engSearchText: Hey! What are you doing over there?
jpnChrName: おい、そこで何をやっている？
jpnSearchText: おい、そこで何をやっている？

engChrName: Ugh, you three again... Wait, hang on. There's a fourth now?
engSearchText:
Ugh, you three again... Wait, hang on. There's a
fourth now?
jpnChrName: ！　またお前たちか。 って、そこのアンタは……？
jpnSearchText:
！　またお前たちか。
って、そこのアンタは……？

engChrName: I haven't seen you around these parts. Are you a tourist? No—
engSearchText:
I haven't seen you around these parts. Are you
a tourist? No—
jpnChrName: 見かけない顔だねぇ。 観光客──いやひょっとして。
jpnSearchText:
見かけない顔だねぇ。
観光客──いやひょっとして。

engChrName: You're a jaeger, aren't you?
engSearchText: You're a jaeger, aren't you?
jpnChrName: まさか………猟兵か？
jpnSearchText: まさか………猟兵か？

engChrName: Ha. So a bracer was here all along, and I wandered in without even noticing. Pitiful.
engSearchText:
Ha. So a bracer was here all along, and I wandered in
without even noticing. Pitiful.
jpnChrName: はは、遊撃士まで来てるのに のこのこ寄っちまうなんてね……
jpnSearchText:
はは、遊撃士まで来てるのに
のこのこ寄っちまうなんてね……

engChrName: The boss is probably rolling in his grave right now. If he saw me like this, he'd be ashamed he ever gave me the name Flameeater...
engSearchText:
The boss is probably rolling in his grave right now.
If he saw me like this, he'd be ashamed he ever gave
me the name Flameeater...
jpnChrName: ……団長に付けてもらった 《火喰鳥》の名が泣くってもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
……団長に付けてもらった
《火喰鳥》の名が泣くってもんだよ。

engChrName: Aida! Let me help you!
engSearchText: Aida! Let me help you!
jpnChrName: アイーダさん……！ わたし、力になりますから！
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさん……！
わたし、力になりますから！

engChrName: There's gotta be something—
engSearchText: There's gotta be something—
jpnChrName: だからどうか──！
jpnSearchText: だからどうか──！

engChrName: Haha. I still had so many things I wanted to teach you.
engSearchText:
Haha. I still had so many things I wanted to
teach you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、アンタには まだ色々と教えたかったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、アンタには
まだ色々と教えたかったんだが……

engChrName: Thanks for looking out for my little sis, Van.
engSearchText: Thanks for looking out for my little sis, Van.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋──この子にここまで 付き合ってくれたんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋──この子にここまで
付き合ってくれたんだろう……？

engChrName: I've got one little favor to ask of you before—
engSearchText: I've got one little favor to ask of you before—
jpnChrName: できればこのまま──
jpnSearchText: できればこのまま──

engChrName: I'm too late!
engSearchText: I'm too late!
jpnChrName: 遅かったか……ッ！
jpnSearchText: 遅かったか……ッ！

engChrName: Wh-What is that...?
engSearchText: Wh-What is that...?
jpnChrName: な、なんだぁっ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだぁっ！？

engChrName: Monsters? Crap. It must be those wolves again.
engSearchText: Monsters? Crap. It must be those wolves again.
jpnChrName: 魔獣の群れ……！？ いや──
jpnSearchText:
魔獣の群れ……！？
いや──

engChrName: Nah. But we're getting closer to what's been driving them to attack.
engSearchText:
Nah. But we're getting closer to what's been driving
them to attack.
jpnChrName: チッ……恐怖で狼型を 突き動かしていた連中か──！
jpnSearchText:
チッ……恐怖で狼型を
突き動かしていた連中か──！

engChrName: Are you serious...?
engSearchText: Are you serious...?
jpnChrName: そ、それって……
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……

engChrName: Looks like time's up. Fate's calling...
engSearchText: Looks like time's up. Fate's calling...
jpnChrName: フフ……これも縁かねぇ。
jpnSearchText: フフ……これも縁かねぇ。

engChrName: Everyone, you have to make it out of here alive, no matter what! And Feri, you have to live, too—for me!
engSearchText:
Everyone, you have to make it out of here alive, no
matter what! And Feri, you have to live, too—for me!
jpnChrName: 何とかこの場は凌いでみせな、 フェリ、裏解決屋に遊撃士も──！
jpnSearchText:
何とかこの場は凌いでみせな、
フェリ、裏解決屋に遊撃士も──！
っ……！？

engChrName: Aaaaah!
engSearchText: Aaaaah!
jpnChrName: ひえええええっ！？
jpnSearchText: ひえええええっ！？

engChrName: Are those military monsters?!
engSearchText: Are those military monsters?!
jpnChrName: ぐ、軍用魔獣か──！？
jpnSearchText: ぐ、軍用魔獣か──！？

engChrName: Yeah, but they ain't exactly normal.
engSearchText: Yeah, but they ain't exactly normal.
jpnChrName: ああ、しかもコイツら……
jpnSearchText: ああ、しかもコイツら……

engChrName: Aida, wait!
engSearchText: Aida, wait!
jpnChrName: ！　待ってアイーダさん……！
jpnSearchText: ！　待ってアイーダさん……！

engChrName: Get out of my way!
engSearchText: Get out of my way!
jpnChrName: っ……どいてよおっ！！
jpnSearchText: っ……どいてよおっ！！

engChrName: Ferida, you gotta focus on what's in front of us! 'Fight to survive'—that's what your friend would tell you, right?!
engSearchText:
Ferida, you gotta focus on what's in front of us!
'Fight to survive'—that's what your friend would tell
you, right?!
jpnChrName: 今は後だ── 《火喰鳥》も言っただろうが！？
jpnSearchText:
今は後だ──
《火喰鳥》も言っただろうが！？

engChrName: Everyone, you have to make it out of here alive, no matter what! And Feri, you have to live, too—for me!
engSearchText:
Everyone, you have to make it out of here alive, no
matter what! And Feri, you have to live, too—for me!
jpnChrName: 何とかこの場は凌いでみせな、 フェリ、裏解決屋に遊撃士も──！
jpnSearchText:
何とかこの場は凌いでみせな、
フェリ、裏解決屋に遊撃士も──！

engChrName: Tch...
engSearchText: Tch...
jpnChrName: くっ……！
jpnSearchText: くっ……！

engChrName: Wh-What are we supposed to do?
engSearchText: Wh-What are we supposed to do?
jpnChrName: ど、どうすれば……！？
jpnSearchText: ど、どうすれば……！？

engChrName: We'll take care of these three!
engSearchText: We'll take care of these three!
jpnChrName: お二人はどうか……！ こちらは任せてください！
jpnSearchText:
お二人はどうか……！
こちらは任せてください！

engChrName: Gah. All right, fine! I don't care what happens to him, but you two stay safe!
engSearchText:
Gah. All right, fine! I don't care what happens to
him, but you two stay safe!
jpnChrName: っ……分かった！ そいつはともかく君たちは気をつけろ！
jpnSearchText:
っ……分かった！
そいつはともかく君たちは気をつけろ！

engChrName: Okay! Let's wipe the floor with these creepy things!
engSearchText: Okay! Let's wipe the floor with these creepy things!
jpnChrName: ──今は切り替えます。 アイゼンシルトの軍用魔獣が３体！
jpnSearchText:
──今は切り替えます。
アイゼンシルトの軍用魔獣が３体！

engChrName: Careful, something's up with 'em. Stay on your guard—especially you, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Careful, something's up with 'em. Stay on your
guard—especially you, Agnès.
jpnChrName: しかもヤバイ状態みたいだ。 アニエス、気をつけてフォローしろ！
jpnSearchText:
しかもヤバイ状態みたいだ。
アニエス、気をつけてフォローしろ！

engChrName: Will do. I'll lend you my support!
engSearchText: Will do. I'll lend you my support!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！ 援護と回復は任せてください！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ……！
援護と回復は任せてください！

engChrName: No way!
engSearchText: No way!
jpnChrName: ああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ああっ……！？

engChrName: We take down three, and another three take their place...
engSearchText:
We take down three, and another three take
their place...
jpnChrName: ま、まるで私たちを 通さないように……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まるで私たちを
通さないように……

engChrName: There's no more room for doubt: these things're what scared the piss out of all those wolves.
engSearchText:
There's no more room for doubt: these things're what
scared the piss out of all those wolves.
jpnChrName: ──高位猟兵団の軍用魔獣。 コイツらが狼型を脅してたんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──高位猟兵団の軍用魔獣。
コイツらが狼型を脅してたんだろう。

engChrName: Their strength and speed are almost uncanny, but what's really gettin' me is—
engSearchText:
Their strength and speed are almost uncanny, but
what's really gettin' me is—
jpnChrName: パワーとスピードも異常だが、 それ以上に……
jpnSearchText:
パワーとスピードも異常だが、
それ以上に……

engChrName: Th-That's not possible...
engSearchText: Th-That's not possible...
jpnChrName: そ、そんなのって……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなのって……

engChrName: Oh, Arusha...
engSearchText: Oh, Arusha...
jpnChrName: ……女神（アルーシャ）様……
jpnSearchText: ……女神（アルーシャ）様……

engChrName: Get back, you two!
engSearchText: Get back, you two!
jpnChrName: ……！ 二人とも下がってろ──！
jpnSearchText:
……！
二人とも下がってろ──！

engChrName: Can't a man enjoy a drink in peace?
engSearchText: Can't a man enjoy a drink in peace?
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 人が静かに飲んでるっつうのによ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
人が静かに飲んでるっつうのによ。

engChrName: Ah!
engSearchText: Ah!

engChrName: You're that man from earlier!
engSearchText: You're that man from earlier!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのお知り合いの……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんのお知り合いの……

engChrName: Never thought I'd say this in a million years, but I'm happy to see your ugly mug.
engSearchText:
Never thought I'd say this in a million years, but I'm
happy to see your ugly mug.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 助かったぜ、《痩せ狼》。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
助かったぜ、《痩せ狼》。

engChrName: I-I managed to take out one of them! How are things going on your—
engSearchText:
I-I managed to take out one of them! How are things
going on your—
jpnChrName: な、何とか一体は倒した！ そっちは──
jpnSearchText:
な、何とか一体は倒した！
そっちは──

engChrName: Ack! There's MORE?! And who in the blue blazes are—
engSearchText:
Ack! There's MORE?! And who in the blue blazes
are—
jpnChrName: ふ、増えてるっ！？ というかアンタは一体──
jpnSearchText:
ふ、増えてるっ！？
というかアンタは一体──

engChrName: Heheh. Leave the small fry to me.
engSearchText: Heheh. Leave the small fry to me.
jpnChrName: クク…… この場は引き受けてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
この場は引き受けてやるよ。

engChrName: In return, I expect you to forget about the car shit and let bygones be bygones.
engSearchText:
In return, I expect you to forget about the car shit
and let bygones be bygones.
jpnChrName: 代わりに車の件はチャラにしろや？
jpnSearchText: 代わりに車の件はチャラにしろや？

engChrName: That's a tall order.
engSearchText: That's a tall order.
jpnChrName: チッ……考えといてやる。
jpnSearchText: チッ……考えといてやる。

engChrName: Don't screw this up, Direwolf! And you back him up, bracer boy!
engSearchText:
Don't screw this up, Direwolf! And you back him up,
bracer boy!
jpnChrName: 任せたぜ《痩せ狼》、遊撃士もな！
jpnSearchText: 任せたぜ《痩せ狼》、遊撃士もな！

engChrName: Where do you think you're going?! ...Wait, did he say DIREWOLF?!
engSearchText:
Where do you think you're going?! ...Wait, did he
say DIREWOLF?!
jpnChrName: どこに行くんだ！？ ──じゃなくて《痩せ狼》ぃっ！？
jpnSearchText:
どこに行くんだ！？
──じゃなくて《痩せ狼》ぃっ！？

engChrName: What's an Enforcer of Ouroboros doing here?
engSearchText: What's an Enforcer of Ouroboros doing here?
jpnChrName: け、《結社》の執行者がどうして……
jpnSearchText: け、《結社》の執行者がどうして……

engChrName: Heheheh. It's time to meet your maker, you damn mutts.
engSearchText:
Heheheh. It's time to meet your maker, you
damn mutts.
jpnChrName: クク…… 犬っコロごときがイキがりやがって。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
犬っコロごときがイキがりやがって。

engChrName: Let me show you the fangs of a REAL wolf.
engSearchText: Let me show you the fangs of a REAL wolf.
jpnChrName: 本物の餓狼の牙、味わってみろや？
jpnSearchText: 本物の餓狼の牙、味わってみろや？

engChrName: This year's been a good one, hasn't it? We've had a bountiful harvest, and the demand's on the up and up.
engSearchText:
This year's been a good one, hasn't it? We've had a
bountiful harvest, and the demand's on the up and up.
jpnChrName: 今年は良かったなぁ。 豊作の上、需要も伸びてるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
今年は良かったなぁ。
豊作の上、需要も伸びてるみたいだし。

engChrName: And it'll keep going up 'cause we have so many new farming techniques for 1209 and beyond. Next year's festival is sure to be better than the last!
engSearchText:
And it'll keep going up 'cause we have so many new
farming techniques for 1209 and beyond. Next year's
festival is sure to be better than the last!
jpnChrName: ああ、新しい農法も試したいし 来年はもっと盛大にやれそうだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、新しい農法も試したいし
来年はもっと盛大にやれそうだぜ！

engChrName: I had loads of fun today, but I would've had even more fun if Lashkar was here...
engSearchText:
I had loads of fun today, but I would've had even
more fun if Lashkar was here...
jpnChrName: すっごく楽しかったけど…… ラシュカル兄ちゃん、どうしたのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
すっごく楽しかったけど……
ラシュカル兄ちゃん、どうしたのかなぁ？

engChrName: Tomorrow's the last day of the festival...
engSearchText: Tomorrow's the last day of the festival...
jpnChrName: 収穫祭、あしたまでなんでしょ……？
jpnSearchText: 収穫祭、あしたまでなんでしょ……？

engChrName: Yeah... I heard the car he was riding in broke down in the capital.
engSearchText:
Yeah... I heard the car he was riding in broke down in
the capital.
jpnChrName: うん…… 首都で車が故障しちゃったんだって。
jpnSearchText:
うん……
首都で車が故障しちゃったんだって。

engChrName: It'll be okay, though. He'll be here tomorrow for sure, so cheer up!
engSearchText:
It'll be okay, though. He'll be here tomorrow for sure,
so cheer up!
jpnChrName: でも大丈夫、明日には戻ってくるから。
jpnSearchText: でも大丈夫、明日には戻ってくるから。

engChrName: Well, lookie here! It's everyone's favorite reporter! Why're you walkin' around town all by your lonesome?
engSearchText:
Well, lookie here! It's everyone's favorite reporter!
Why're you walkin' around town all by
your lonesome?
jpnChrName: よう、記者の兄ちゃん。 こんないい夜に一人で何してんだい？
jpnSearchText:
よう、記者の兄ちゃん。
こんないい夜に一人で何してんだい？

engChrName: Why don'tcha drop by the bar and grab a couple drinks with me? The night's still young!
engSearchText:
Why don'tcha drop by the bar and grab a couple
drinks with me? The night's still young!
jpnChrName: 良かったら酒場で飲まないか？ 収穫祭の夜はまだまだこれからだろ！
jpnSearchText:
良かったら酒場で飲まないか？
収穫祭の夜はまだまだこれからだろ！

engChrName: I, umm, really shouldn't...
engSearchText: I, umm, really shouldn't...
jpnChrName: いや、俺は……
jpnSearchText: いや、俺は……

engChrName: Now, now, dear. Don't pressure the poor man.
engSearchText: Now, now, dear. Don't pressure the poor man.
jpnChrName: あなた、絡んじゃダメじゃない。
jpnSearchText: あなた、絡んじゃダメじゃない。

engChrName: I'm sorry about him. He's just lonely because our daughter couldn't make it in time for the festival.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry about him. He's just lonely because our
daughter couldn't make it in time for the festival.
jpnChrName: ご免なさいね、娘が帰ってこれなくて 寂しがってるのよこの人。
jpnSearchText:
ご免なさいね、娘が帰ってこれなくて
寂しがってるのよこの人。

engChrName: I-I'm not lonely! She said she'd be here tomorrow!
engSearchText: I-I'm not lonely! She said she'd be here tomorrow!
jpnChrName: ば、馬鹿いえ！ 明日には戻ってくるんだからよ！
jpnSearchText:
ば、馬鹿いえ！
明日には戻ってくるんだからよ！

engChrName: Oh, it's that hot reporter guy! Hello! What's the latest scoop?
engSearchText:
Oh, it's that hot reporter guy! Hello! What's the
latest scoop?
jpnChrName: あっ、イケメンの記者さんだ！ ねーねー、お話聞かせてよ～！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、イケメンの記者さんだ！
ねーねー、お話聞かせてよ～！

engChrName: Perhaps he'd be kind enough to do another feature on our inn.
engSearchText:
Perhaps he'd be kind enough to do another
feature on our inn.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ウチの宿のことも 取材で取り上げてくれたし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ウチの宿のことも
取材で取り上げてくれたし。

engChrName: Why don't you stop on by? Drinks are on the house!
engSearchText: Why don't you stop on by? Drinks are on the house!
jpnChrName: お礼に何杯でもサービスしちゃうよ？
jpnSearchText: お礼に何杯でもサービスしちゃうよ？

engChrName: Trust me, I'd love to. Unfortunately, I've got an early start tomorrow—
engSearchText:
Trust me, I'd love to. Unfortunately, I've got an early
start tomorrow—
jpnChrName: ありがたいが、明日早くてな──
jpnSearchText: ありがたいが、明日早くてな──

engChrName: ...On second thought, I'll take you up on that offer. I'll be over soon. Save me a table.
engSearchText:
...On second thought, I'll take you up on that offer.
I'll be over soon. Save me a table.
jpnChrName: いや……少しなら付き合おう。 後で行くから待っててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……少しなら付き合おう。
後で行くから待っててくれ。

engChrName: Yaaay!
engSearchText: Yaaay!
jpnChrName: やった～！
jpnSearchText: やった～！

engChrName: Sounds good. We'll see you there!
engSearchText: Sounds good. We'll see you there!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、待ってるからね。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、待ってるからね。

engChrName: Our moment is at hand, my fellow countrymen.
engSearchText: Our moment is at hand, my fellow countrymen.
jpnChrName: 進め、進めよ我が同胞（はらから）よ……！
jpnSearchText: 進め、進めよ我が同胞（はらから）よ……！

engChrName: We shall vanquish the knights and the noblemen, trample the enemy underfoot, and stain the palace floors with their blood.
engSearchText:
We shall vanquish the knights and the noblemen,
trample the enemy underfoot, and stain the palace
floors with their blood.
jpnChrName: 騎士と貴族を打ち倒し、その血で濡れた 我らの靴で王城を踏みにじるのだ……！
jpnSearchText:
騎士と貴族を打ち倒し、その血で濡れた
我らの靴で王城を踏みにじるのだ……！

engChrName: Fancy seeing you here. I never thought I'd find you casually whistling La Oraciónese.
engSearchText:
Fancy seeing you here. I never thought I'd find you
casually whistling La Oraciónese.
jpnChrName: 『ラ＝オラシオネーズ（オラシオンの歌）』だったか…… まさかアンタがそんなのを口ずさんでるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
『ラ＝オラシオネーズ（オラシオンの歌）』だったか……
まさかアンタがそんなのを口ずさんでるとはな。

engChrName: It's been some time since we last met, Dingo Brad. Though we did cross paths in Tharbad— albeit briefly.
engSearchText:
It's been some time since we last met, Dingo Brad.
Though we did cross paths in Tharbad—
albeit briefly.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりだな、ディンゴ・ブラッド。 ──サルバッドでのあれはさておき。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりだな、ディンゴ・ブラッド。
──サルバッドでのあれはさておき。

engChrName: If we exclude that little encounter, I haven't seen you since your days as a mere informant in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
If we exclude that little encounter, I haven't seen you
since your days as a mere informant in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: お前がメッセルダム界隈で ケチな情報屋をやってた時以来か？
jpnSearchText:
お前がメッセルダム界隈で
ケチな情報屋をやってた時以来か？

engChrName: Yeah, and you were still Enrique's second-in-command back then.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and you were still Enrique's
second-in-command back then.
jpnChrName: ……アンタがエンリケの下で 若頭をやってた時以来だ。
jpnSearchText:
……アンタがエンリケの下で
若頭をやってた時以来だ。

engChrName: I caught wind of your arrival here. I thought the idea was ludicrous at the time, and yet there you stand.
engSearchText:
I caught wind of your arrival here. I thought the idea
was ludicrous at the time, and yet there you stand.
jpnChrName: やっぱり来ていたか──妙な情報が 入ってきたからまさかとは思ったが……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり来ていたか──妙な情報が
入ってきたからまさかとは思ったが……

engChrName: So answer me this: what's your game here, Gerard Dantès?!
engSearchText:
So answer me this: what's your game here,
Gerard Dantès?!
jpnChrName: お供も連れずに一体何をしている……！？ ──ジェラール・ダンテス！
jpnSearchText:
お供も連れずに一体何をしている……！？
──ジェラール・ダンテス！

engChrName: Heheh.
engSearchText: Heheh.
jpnChrName: クク……
jpnSearchText: クク……

engChrName: You're a persistent one, I'll give you that. You've been following our trail for a long time now.
engSearchText:
You're a persistent one, I'll give you that. You've been
following our trail for a long time now.
jpnChrName: なに、各地で俺たちのことを 散々嗅ぎ回ってくれているようだからな。
jpnSearchText:
なに、各地で俺たちのことを
散々嗅ぎ回ってくれているようだからな。

engChrName: And lo and behold, your dogged pursuit has finally borne fruit. Congratulations. I shall bestow upon you a reward—one far greater than any Fulitzer.
engSearchText:
And lo and behold, your dogged pursuit has finally
borne fruit. Congratulations. I shall bestow upon you
a reward—one far greater than any Fulitzer.
jpnChrName: これまでの労をねぎらう意味でも ついでに“招待”させてもらったわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
これまでの労をねぎらう意味でも
ついでに“招待”させてもらったわけだ。

engChrName: Let me guess: the sweet release of death, huh?
engSearchText: Let me guess: the sweet release of death, huh?
jpnChrName: 俺を……始末するつもりか？
jpnSearchText: 俺を……始末するつもりか？

engChrName: Well, yes. It truly is a pity. I do sincerely respect your investigative prowess.
engSearchText:
Well, yes. It truly is a pity. I do sincerely respect your
investigative prowess.
jpnChrName: ああ──といっても 記者としてのお前も買っている。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──といっても
記者としてのお前も買っている。

engChrName: However, before you meet your demise, I will offer you a glimpse of the end of time.
engSearchText:
However, before you meet your demise, I will offer
you a glimpse of the end of time.
jpnChrName: 折角だから、一世一代のスクープを 撮らせてやろうと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
折角だから、一世一代のスクープを
撮らせてやろうと思ってな。

engChrName: Is that...thing made of shards?
engSearchText: Is that...thing made of shards?
jpnChrName: そいつは……シャードってやつか？
jpnSearchText: そいつは……シャードってやつか？

engChrName: Correct. This is the artifact that Basel professor fell just short of completing...
engSearchText:
Correct. This is the artifact that Basel professor fell
just short of completing...
jpnChrName: ああ、理科大学の元天才教授が 届かなかった“最後の一押し”……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、理科大学の元天才教授が
届かなかった“最後の一押し”……

engChrName: Or rather, this is a substitute for it.
engSearchText: Or rather, this is a substitute for it.
jpnChrName: そいつの肩代わりをする代物だ。
jpnSearchText: そいつの肩代わりをする代物だ。

engChrName: W-Wait...
engSearchText: W-Wait...
jpnChrName: ま、まさか──
jpnSearchText: ま、まさか──

engChrName: It's called an explosive lens, or so I hear.
engSearchText: It's called an explosive lens, or so I hear.
jpnChrName: 《爆縮レンズ》って言うそうだぜ？
jpnSearchText: 《爆縮レンズ》って言うそうだぜ？

engChrName: Alas, the professor met an untimely end before he could finalize a formula for the most efficient structure.
engSearchText:
Alas, the professor met an untimely end before he
could finalize a formula for the most
efficient structure.
jpnChrName: 最適構造を導く数式を割り出す前に 逝っちまったようだが──
jpnSearchText:
最適構造を導く数式を割り出す前に
逝っちまったようだが──

engChrName: Though this shard-based replica will suffice—and I can detonate it with my sword.
engSearchText:
Though this shard-based replica will suffice—and I
can detonate it with my sword.
jpnChrName: 面倒だからシャードで再現し、 コイツで強引に“起爆”させてみる。
jpnSearchText:
面倒だからシャードで再現し、
コイツで強引に“起爆”させてみる。

engChrName: Its destructive capabilities are beyond compare. This little village will be history.
engSearchText:
Its destructive capabilities are beyond compare.
This little village will be history.
jpnChrName: 特別製の《古代遺物（アーティファクト）》でな、 多少の無理は効くだろう。
jpnSearchText:
特別製の《古代遺物（アーティファクト）》でな、
多少の無理は効くだろう。

engChrName: A-Are you insane? You'll get caught up in the blast, too!
engSearchText:
A-Are you insane? You'll get caught up in the
blast, too!
jpnChrName: や、止めろ………お前だって 巻き込まれるだけじゃないのか！？
jpnSearchText:
や、止めろ………お前だって
巻き込まれるだけじゃないのか！？

engChrName: Ah, but I have an ace up my sleeve: teleportation. Still, I'd place my odds of survival at 30%...
engSearchText:
Ah, but I have an ace up my sleeve: teleportation.
Still, I'd place my odds of survival at 30%...
jpnChrName: 一応《転位》ってチートもあってな。 ７：３で巻き込まれそうだが──
jpnSearchText:
一応《転位》ってチートもあってな。
７：３で巻き込まれそうだが──

engChrName: ...but the thrill of the gamble is irresistible.
engSearchText: ...but the thrill of the gamble is irresistible.
jpnChrName: そうじゃないと面白くないだろう？
jpnSearchText: そうじゃないと面白くないだろう？

engChrName: Wait! There are children here! Not even Aidios could forgive such a heinous act!
engSearchText:
Wait! There are children here! Not even Aidios could
forgive such a heinous act!
jpnChrName: ……待ってくれ、村には子供もいる。 女神だってお許しにならないだろう……
jpnSearchText:
……待ってくれ、村には子供もいる。
女神だってお許しにならないだろう……

engChrName: Please give these people time to evacuate. I'm begging you!
engSearchText:
Please give these people time to evacuate. I'm
begging you!
jpnChrName: せめて彼らを逃がす時間だけでも……！
jpnSearchText: せめて彼らを逃がす時間だけでも……！

engChrName: I'm afraid doing that would defeat the entire point of this experiment.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid doing that would defeat the entire point of
this experiment.
jpnChrName: いや──だからこそだろう？
jpnSearchText: いや──だからこそだろう？

engChrName: Every living creature is equal in the face of true fear. Demonstrating that is my life's purpose.
engSearchText:
Every living creature is equal in the face of true fear.
Demonstrating that is my life's purpose.
jpnChrName: 真の“恐怖”の前には誰しもが平等…… それを示すだけの話だ。
jpnSearchText:
真の“恐怖”の前には誰しもが平等……
それを示すだけの話だ。

engChrName: Heh. How fortunate that your camera can now connect to a Xipha.
engSearchText:
Heh. How fortunate that your camera can now
connect to a Xipha.
jpnChrName: クク……ザイファと 連動させていてラッキーだったな？
jpnSearchText:
クク……ザイファと
連動させていてラッキーだったな？

engChrName: Though it will not save you, so why not drop it and fight to the bitter end?
engSearchText:
Though it will not save you, so why not drop it and
fight to the bitter end?
jpnChrName: それとも命がけで止めてみせるか？
jpnSearchText: それとも命がけで止めてみせるか？

engChrName: Because I know I can't stop you...but thanks to this, I can pass the torch to those who will.
engSearchText:
Because I know I can't stop you...but thanks to this, I
can pass the torch to those who will.
jpnChrName: ……俺では貴様を止められん、 だったら“後”に繋げるだけだ……
jpnSearchText:
……俺では貴様を止められん、
だったら“後”に繋げるだけだ……

engChrName: Burn in the pits of Gehenna, Gerard Dantès!
engSearchText: Burn in the pits of Gehenna, Gerard Dantès!
jpnChrName: 煉獄に落ちろ── ジェラール・ダンテス……！！
jpnSearchText:
煉獄に落ちろ──
ジェラール・ダンテス……！！

engChrName: Such bravado! Now take your final shots—and die!
engSearchText: Such bravado! Now take your final shots—and die!
jpnChrName: いい度胸だ─── 撮りきって逝け、ディンゴ・ブラッド！
jpnSearchText:
いい度胸だ───
撮りきって逝け、ディンゴ・ブラッド！

engChrName: (Van... Marielle...)
engSearchText: (Van... Marielle...)
jpnChrName: （ヴァン、マリエル……！）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァン、マリエル……！）

engChrName: Hahaha... AHAHAHAHAHAHA!
engSearchText: Hahaha... AHAHAHAHAHAHA!
jpnChrName: クククク── ハハハハハハハハハハハッ！！！
jpnSearchText:
クククク──
ハハハハハハハハハハハッ！！！

engChrName: Just got back from a hunt, and I heard the news... You tellin' me monsters attacked a bus?
engSearchText:
Just got back from a hunt, and I heard the news...
You tellin' me monsters attacked a bus?
jpnChrName: 今しがた狩りから帰ったところなんだが…… 何でも、バスが魔獣に襲われたって？
jpnSearchText:
今しがた狩りから帰ったところなんだが……
何でも、バスが魔獣に襲われたって？

engChrName: Yeah. Was rollin' by the village and it just got jumped. We fought 'em off, though—no injuries to the passengers.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Was rollin' by the village and it just
got jumped. We fought 'em off, though—no injuries
to the passengers.
jpnChrName: 村に来る途中でな。 俺たちが撃退したから怪我人は出てねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
村に来る途中でな。
俺たちが撃退したから怪我人は出てねえぜ。

engChrName: Good, good... They were lucky to have you there.
engSearchText: Good, good... They were lucky to have you there.
jpnChrName: おお、あんたらがかい。 若いのに大した腕だ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、あんたらがかい。
若いのに大した腕だ。

engChrName: Somethin' about that attack rubs me the wrong way... I noticed the monsters were actin' all sorts of weird out on my hunts.
engSearchText:
Somethin' about that attack rubs me the wrong way...
I noticed the monsters were actin' all sorts of weird
out on my hunts.
jpnChrName: 俺はここいらで猟師をやってるモンでな。 その話を聞いてちょっと気になってたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺はここいらで猟師をやってるモンでな。
その話を聞いてちょっと気になってたんだ。

engChrName: Oh? You've seen them firsthand? What specifically was strange about them?
engSearchText:
Oh? You've seen them firsthand? What specifically
was strange about them?
jpnChrName: 猟師さんでしたか。 気になっていたというのは魔獣のことですか？
jpnSearchText:
猟師さんでしたか。
気になっていたというのは魔獣のことですか？

engChrName: So, I run into these packs of wolves around the village sometimes...and I've noticed 'em gettin' a lot more territorial recently.
engSearchText:
So, I run into these packs of wolves around the
village sometimes...and I've noticed 'em gettin' a lot
more territorial recently.
jpnChrName: ああ、実は最近村の周辺に生息してる 狼型魔獣の様子が変みたいでな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、実は最近村の周辺に生息してる
狼型魔獣の様子が変みたいでな。

engChrName: I can't really call it violent or aggressive, though. It feels like somethin' else...
engSearchText:
I can't really call it violent or aggressive, though.
It feels like somethin' else...
jpnChrName: 今までより凶暴になったというか……
jpnSearchText: 今までより凶暴になったというか……

engChrName: So the monsters are...on edge?
engSearchText: So the monsters are...on edge?
jpnChrName: 狼型の魔獣……
jpnSearchText: 狼型の魔獣……

engChrName: Or otherwise actin' up.
engSearchText: Or otherwise actin' up.
jpnChrName: 凶暴化した、か。
jpnSearchText: 凶暴化した、か。

engChrName: That's what I'm noticin', yeah. It doesn't feel like anger. It feels like...fear.
engSearchText:
That's what I'm noticin', yeah. It doesn't feel like
anger. It feels like...fear.
jpnChrName: ああ……同時に何かに 怯えているようにも見えるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……同時に何かに
怯えているようにも見えるんだが。

engChrName: I dunno what could be rattlin' them so hard, though. They hadn't been causin' trouble until now.
engSearchText:
I dunno what could be rattlin' them so hard, though.
They hadn't been causin' trouble until now.
jpnChrName: なにが理由かまったく見当が付かなくてな、 いままでこんなことはなかったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
なにが理由かまったく見当が付かなくてな、
いままでこんなことはなかったんだが。

engChrName: Y'all watch yourselves out there... Heh, don't mean to nag ya, though. Doubt you need me to remind ya.
engSearchText:
Y'all watch yourselves out there... Heh, don't mean to
nag ya, though. Doubt you need me to remind ya.
jpnChrName: あんたらも気を付けた方がいいぞ。 無用な心配かもしれないがな。
jpnSearchText:
あんたらも気を付けた方がいいぞ。
無用な心配かもしれないがな。

engChrName: Oh, no, by all means, thank you for the warning. Take care on your hunts.
engSearchText:
Oh, no, by all means, thank you for the warning.
Take care on your hunts.
jpnChrName: いえ、ご忠告ありがとうございます。 猟師さんも、狩りの時はお気を付けください。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、ご忠告ありがとうございます。
猟師さんも、狩りの時はお気を付けください。

engChrName: So, Van, does that mean...?
engSearchText: So, Van, does that mean...?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Maybe. We dunno for sure that the wolves that hounded the bus were actin' that same way—all we know, it could've been somethin' else.
engSearchText:
Maybe. We dunno for sure that the wolves that
hounded the bus were actin' that same way—all we
know, it could've been somethin' else.
jpnChrName: バスを襲ったやつらと 同じ群れかどうかは分からねえ。
jpnSearchText:
バスを襲ったやつらと
同じ群れかどうかは分からねえ。

engChrName: But that's a good guess, so let's keep it in mind.
engSearchText: But that's a good guess, so let's keep it in mind.
jpnChrName: だが確かに気にはなるな。 一応覚えておくか。
jpnSearchText:
だが確かに気にはなるな。
一応覚えておくか。

engChrName: So you were the guys who saved those passengers? You have my thanks.
engSearchText:
So you were the guys who saved those passengers?
You have my thanks.
jpnChrName: あんたかい、 バスを助けた客人っていうのは。
jpnSearchText:
あんたかい、
バスを助けた客人っていうのは。

engChrName: No prob. Hey, you mind if I ask you a few questions? Tryna look into the attack myself.
engSearchText:
No prob. Hey, you mind if I ask you a few questions?
Tryna look into the attack myself.
jpnChrName: ちょいと調べ物の途中でね。 少し話を聞かせちゃくれないか？
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと調べ物の途中でね。
少し話を聞かせちゃくれないか？

engChrName: I...see?
engSearchText: I...see?
jpnChrName: ふむ、調べ物ねぇ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、調べ物ねぇ……

engChrName: I do appreciate your help, but I'm not sure I wanna get wrapped up in that whole situation, myself...
engSearchText:
I do appreciate your help, but I'm not sure I wanna
get wrapped up in that whole situation, myself...
jpnChrName: バスについてはありがたいと思ってるが、 あまり揉め事は起こさんでくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
バスについてはありがたいと思ってるが、
あまり揉め事は起こさんでくれよ。

engChrName: Oh, you'll be fine. Real jiffy, I promise.
engSearchText: Oh, you'll be fine. Real jiffy, I promise.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、そう言うなって。 大した時間は取らせないからよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、そう言うなって。
大した時間は取らせないからよ。

engChrName: And full disclosure here: we're actin' on the authority of a certain intelligence department.
engSearchText:
And full disclosure here: we're actin' on the authority
of a certain intelligence department.
jpnChrName: ここだけの話、俺たちはとある 情報筋からの依頼で動いてるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ここだけの話、俺たちはとある
情報筋からの依頼で動いてるんだが……

engChrName: Wha...? You don't mean the CID?
engSearchText: Wha...? You don't mean the CID?
jpnChrName: ……なっ、それってまさか 噂のＣＩＤっていう……？
jpnSearchText:
……なっ、それってまさか
噂のＣＩＤっていう……？

engChrName: Let's just say I got the big boys on speed dial.
engSearchText: Let's just say I got the big boys on speed dial.
jpnChrName: ああ……一応、通信をかければ 分析官殿に確認も……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……一応、通信をかければ
分析官殿に確認も……

engChrName: (Wait, what is he talking about?)
engSearchText: (Wait, what is he talking about?)
jpnChrName: （何を話しているんでしょう？）
jpnSearchText: （何を話しているんでしょう？）

engChrName: (He's, er...very good at stretching the truth. He's not TECHNICALLY lying, but...)
engSearchText:
(He's, er...very good at stretching the truth. He's not
TECHNICALLY lying, but...)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、口八丁と言いますか……   ギリギリ嘘にならない範囲みたいですけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（う～ん、口八丁と言いますか……
ギリギリ嘘にならない範囲みたいですけど。）

engChrName: ...Ahem! W-Well, I suppose it won't kill me. What do you wanna ask about?
engSearchText:
...Ahem! W-Well, I suppose it won't kill me.
What do you wanna ask about?
jpnChrName: ……こほん、事情は分かった。 それで、何を聞きたいんだ？
jpnSearchText:
……こほん、事情は分かった。
それで、何を聞きたいんだ？

engChrName: Right, so, we're lookin' into this band of jaegers that blew through town maybe ten-ish days ago.
engSearchText:
Right, so, we're lookin' into this band of jaegers that
blew through town maybe ten-ish days ago.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺たちが探してるのは 十日前に村を通った猟兵団なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺たちが探してるのは
十日前に村を通った猟兵団なんだが……

engChrName: We're thinkin' they might've come back recently. You seen anything that fits their description?
engSearchText:
We're thinkin' they might've come back recently.
You seen anything that fits their description?
jpnChrName: どうも、その後村に戻った 可能性があるみたいでな。
jpnSearchText:
どうも、その後村に戻った
可能性があるみたいでな。

engChrName: Hmm... Yeah, actually, I do recall bumping into a shady woman loitering around here.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Yeah, actually, I do recall bumping into a
shady woman loitering around here.
jpnChrName: そうだな……それらしい人影なら あの後も巡回中に見かけたな。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……それらしい人影なら
あの後も巡回中に見かけたな。

engChrName: She was in the area, alone, on my patrol three nights ago. I saw her again the following night.
engSearchText:
She was in the area, alone, on my patrol three nights
ago. I saw her again the following night.
jpnChrName: ３日前と一昨日の夜遅い時間だな。 女性のようだったが。
jpnSearchText:
３日前と一昨日の夜遅い時間だな。
女性のようだったが。

engChrName: That has to be her...!
engSearchText: That has to be her...!
jpnChrName: その人は……！
jpnSearchText: その人は……！

engChrName: You said she was alone?
engSearchText: You said she was alone?
jpnChrName: その人だけだったんですか？
jpnSearchText: その人だけだったんですか？

engChrName: She was, yeah—I found that strange myself.
engSearchText: She was, yeah—I found that strange myself.
jpnChrName: ああ、自分も不思議には思ったが、 ２回とも一人で来てすぐに去ったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、自分も不思議には思ったが、
２回とも一人で来てすぐに去ったようだ。

engChrName: And that she only showed up at night made her even more suspicious.
engSearchText:
And that she only showed up at night made her even
more suspicious.
jpnChrName: 両方ともわざわざ夜に来ていてな。 何か事情があったのかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
両方ともわざわざ夜に来ていてな。
何か事情があったのかもしれない。

engChrName: I see... Do you know what her motive might have been?
engSearchText:
I see... Do you know what her motive might
have been?
jpnChrName: 夜に一人で…… 何をしに来ていたんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
夜に一人で……
何をしに来ていたんでしょう？

engChrName: I can't say for certain. None of the villagers reported assault or stolen goods at the time...
engSearchText:
I can't say for certain. None of the villagers reported
assault or stolen goods at the time...
jpnChrName: 村人からは、その猟兵が悪さをしたとか そういう話は全く聞いていないが……
jpnSearchText:
村人からは、その猟兵が悪さをしたとか
そういう話は全く聞いていないが……

engChrName: ...and it's not unheard of for jaegers to stop here for supplies. I don't see any criminal intent in her behavior, suspicious though it was.
engSearchText:
...and it's not unheard of for jaegers to stop here
for supplies. I don't see any criminal intent in her
behavior, suspicious though it was.
jpnChrName: まあ、猟兵が村で物資補給なんかをする事は 珍しくないし、事件性は無いと思うんだが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、猟兵が村で物資補給なんかをする事は
珍しくないし、事件性は無いと思うんだが。

engChrName: Fair enough. I guess she stands out just by being a jaeger, even if she ain't causing trouble.
engSearchText:
Fair enough. I guess she stands out just by being a
jaeger, even if she ain't causing trouble.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……猟兵って立場を考えれば、 際立って不審でもなさそうって事か。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……猟兵って立場を考えれば、
際立って不審でもなさそうって事か。

engChrName: What we do know now is that she came back twice, well after her unit came through...
engSearchText:
What we do know now is that she came back twice,
well after her unit came through...
jpnChrName: とりあえず、部隊が通った後に 二回は確実に来てるって事みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、部隊が通った後に
二回は確実に来てるって事みたいだな。

engChrName: Welcome... Oh! You must be the travelers I've heard about! How can I help you?
engSearchText:
Welcome... Oh! You must be the travelers I've
heard about! How can I help you?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい！　って噂の旅行者さんか。 ウチになにかご用かな？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい！　って噂の旅行者さんか。
ウチになにかご用かな？

engChrName: Anything you need done with your orbments? Maintenance, maybe?
engSearchText:
Anything you need done with your orbments?
Maintenance, maybe?
jpnChrName: オーブメントの調整、それとも整備？
jpnSearchText: オーブメントの調整、それとも整備？

engChrName: You just leave it to me! I'm no greenhorn, despite what the boss says!
engSearchText:
You just leave it to me! I'm no greenhorn, despite
what the boss says!
jpnChrName: 親方には半人前扱いされてるけど、 それくらいならあたしでもこなせるよ！
jpnSearchText:
親方には半人前扱いされてるけど、
それくらいならあたしでもこなせるよ！

engChrName: Thanks. We might hit you up for that in a bit, but right now, I wanna ask you some questions.
engSearchText:
Thanks. We might hit you up for that in a bit, but
right now, I wanna ask you some questions.
jpnChrName: あー、そっちでも世話になるかもしれないが、 その前にちと聞きたい事があってな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、そっちでも世話になるかもしれないが、
その前にちと聞きたい事があってな。

engChrName: You recall seein' a band of jaegers come by around... ten days ago?
engSearchText:
You recall seein' a band of jaegers come by around...
ten days ago?
jpnChrName: ここ１０日間くらいで、猟兵がここに 立ち寄ったりはしてないか？
jpnSearchText:
ここ１０日間くらいで、猟兵がここに
立ち寄ったりはしてないか？

engChrName: Jaegers? Actually, yeah...
engSearchText: Jaegers? Actually, yeah...
jpnChrName: あー、そう言えば……
jpnSearchText: あー、そう言えば……

engChrName: I think I saw the boss talking to this jaeger-looking girl...
engSearchText:
I think I saw the boss talking to this
jaeger-looking girl...
jpnChrName: それっぽい人と親方が話してたのを ちらっと見たかもな。
jpnSearchText:
それっぽい人と親方が話してたのを
ちらっと見たかもな。

engChrName: That would've been, what, the night before last? Yeah, pretty sure.
engSearchText:
That would've been, what, the night before last?
Yeah, pretty sure.
jpnChrName: 確か一昨日辺りの夜だったかな。
jpnSearchText: 確か一昨日辺りの夜だったかな。

engChrName: I'm guessing she needed work done on her weapon... or some supplies, maybe.
engSearchText:
I'm guessing she needed work done on her weapon...
or some supplies, maybe.
jpnChrName: 武器の整備、或いは補給でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: 武器の整備、或いは補給でしょうか。

engChrName: Hmm... No, I think it might've been something else. She asked to borrow our truck.
engSearchText:
Hmm... No, I think it might've been something else.
She asked to borrow our truck.
jpnChrName: うーん、そんな感じでもなさそうだったな。
jpnSearchText: うーん、そんな感じでもなさそうだったな。

engChrName: So I think she was doing some hauling that night. Hauling what, I dunno.
engSearchText:
So I think she was doing some hauling that night.
Hauling what, I dunno.
jpnChrName: でも、一緒に台車を借りてたし、何かしら 重い物の取引をしてたっぽいのは確かだよ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、一緒に台車を借りてたし、何かしら
重い物の取引をしてたっぽいのは確かだよ。

engChrName: ...Yeah, that is odd. Comin' out alone under the cover of darkness just to haul stuff around?
engSearchText:
...Yeah, that is odd. Comin' out alone under the cover
of darkness just to haul stuff around?
jpnChrName: わざわざ一人で出てきて、そんなに重い物を 仕入れていったのか……少し引っかかるな。
jpnSearchText:
わざわざ一人で出てきて、そんなに重い物を
仕入れていったのか……少し引っかかるな。

engChrName: I know, right? It made me awfully curious.
engSearchText: I know, right? It made me awfully curious.
jpnChrName: そうなんだよねぇ、あたしも ちょっと気になってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうなんだよねぇ、あたしも
ちょっと気になってんだ。

engChrName: At the time I thought, like, maybe she just needs some tools or equipment or something?
engSearchText:
At the time I thought, like, maybe she just needs
some tools or equipment or something?
jpnChrName: まあ、何かの工具一式を 借りたとかならあり得るかな？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何かの工具一式を
借りたとかならあり得るかな？

engChrName: Maybe for fixin' up their guns or other stuff... Good to know. Thanks.
engSearchText:
Maybe for fixin' up their guns or other stuff...
Good to know. Thanks.
jpnChrName: 猟兵も銃の整備なんかに使うだろうが…… 一応は記憶にとどめておくか。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵も銃の整備なんかに使うだろうが……
一応は記憶にとどめておくか。

engChrName: The people at the inn said she came through three days ago...
engSearchText:
The people at the inn said she came through three
days ago...
jpnChrName: 宿の人の話は３日前にも見たと 言っていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
宿の人の話は３日前にも見たと
言っていましたが……

engChrName: ...but then she came back the following night, because she talked to the factory boss 'the night before last.'
engSearchText:
...but then she came back the following night, because
she talked to the factory boss 'the night before last.'
jpnChrName: その翌日にも来て、この工房で何かを 仕入れたという事になりますね……
jpnSearchText:
その翌日にも来て、この工房で何かを
仕入れたという事になりますね……

engChrName: Heya, gramps. We're back from our rounds.
engSearchText: Heya, gramps. We're back from our rounds.
jpnChrName: 約束通り来させてもらったぜ、爺さん。
jpnSearchText: 約束通り来させてもらったぜ、爺さん。

engChrName: You remember anything new?
engSearchText: You remember anything new?
jpnChrName: どうだ、そろそろ思い出せそうか？
jpnSearchText: どうだ、そろそろ思い出せそうか？

engChrName: Excuse me, umm... Can we ask you about something?
engSearchText: Excuse me, umm... Can we ask you about something?
jpnChrName: えっと、お爺さん、 聞きたいことがあるのですが……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、お爺さん、
聞きたいことがあるのですが……

engChrName: Do you remember any of those jaegers buying supplies from you when they came into town ten days ago?
engSearchText:
